name: 3GCOM SARL
description:
Founded in 2005, 3GCOM is a global system integrator of IT and telecoms solutions based in Rabat, Morocco providing advanced wireless and wire-line network end to end services and solutions to Telecom actors, enterprises and public administrations.
The original premise for our business was to help our clients to deliver cutting edge engineering services. Over the past years, we had the privilege to work with other North African major operators, manufacturers and network providers offering innovative solutions, insight into cutting-edge technology consulting and delivering solutions that increase business efficiencies. we have worked hand in hand with our clients to realize significant achievements.

name: 2M TV
description:
The Evolution and Impact of 2M: A 36 Year Success Story
Founded in 1989, 2M revolutionized Moroccan media with its focus on sports and cinema, breaking the state-run monopoly. In 1991, it became the region’s first encrypted channel, offering exclusive content like live debates and event coverage.Transition to Free-to-Air and Government Acquisition. In 1997, 2M became a free-to-air channel, broadening its reach. The government’s acquisition reinforced its mission to inform, educate, and entertain, solidifying 2M as a trusted media source.
The Rise of Radio 2M. Launched in 2002, Radio 2M quickly became Morocco’s leading bilingual radio station, offering news, debates, and entertainment. Programs like Nkounou Wadhine and On n’est pas obligé d’être d’accord gained loyal audiences.Digital Expansion. 2M.ma, launched in 2001 and revamped in 2016, became a leading news portal, adapting to digital trends and reinforcing 2M’s dominance across all media platforms.

name: 212 Founders By CDG Invest
description:
Since its launch in 2019, 212Founders has built a strong investment dynamic, not only in Morocco but across the African continent. The program has supported over 150 startups, invested in 24, and achieved two major exits.

Entrepreneurs benefit from mentorship, expert guidance, and investments of up to $1M to accelerate their growth in Morocco and beyond. Targeting Seed+, Pre-Series A, and Series A startups, the program operates in two locations: in Morocco and also at Station F in France. It is open to entrepreneurs with ambitions in Morocco, Africa, or the Middle East.

The program is carried by CDG Invest, the investment arm of CDG, a public institution in charge of investing collected savings into development projects aligned with Morocco’s strategic challenges.

name: 221e
description: Our AI-powered sensor fusion algorithms provide exceptional accuracy and consistent results alongside significant cost advantages. Since 2012, we have delivered innovative sensing solutions to power a wide variety of products, including wearable devices, sports equipment and smart PPE. For over a decade of field testing and scientific research, 221e's advanced sensing technologies have been continuously refined to meet the accuracy requirements of the most demanding applications. Our renowned interdisciplinary support team helps our customers to gain real value right away following a plug and play installation.
sectors: Consumer Tech, Smart Home & Smart Workplace

name: 42Gears
description:
For over 15 years, 42Gears has empowered businesses with innovative device management solutions to enhance productivity and drive seamless digital transformation. Our platforms provide the visibility and control organizations need to secure, manage, and optimize devices across industries and use cases.

At 42Gears, we help businesses stay ahead by enabling smarter device management, streamlining operations, and boosting workforce efficiency through solutions that offer:

- Comprehensive Device Management: Unified oversight of diverse devices, OS, and endpoints.
- Enhanced Security: Advanced tools to protect critical data and ensure compliance.
- Operational Agility: Simplified deployment, management, and scaling to meet evolving needs.

From supporting remote workforces to optimizing frontline operations in retail, healthcare, and logistics, 42Gears provides the digital edge businesses need to thrive.

name: Abrid
description:
Abrid is an innovative platform designed for travel agencies and tour operators to streamline itinerary creation, booking management, and client collaboration. With an intuitive interface, Abrid enables users to design and customize detailed travel itineraries, integrating accommodations, activities, transport, and dining options from both their own database and Abrid’s extensive library.?
The platform offers advanced tools such as a dynamic map builder, real-time quote generation, and a booking manager to simplify operations. Abrid also supports branding customization, allowing agencies to create visually appealing, co-branded itineraries for their clients.?
Abrid optimizes workflow efficiency. By providing a centralized, digital solution, Abrid helps travel professionals enhance their offerings, improve client engagement, and scale their business with ease.

name: A'MANSI
description: A’Mansi, pionnière de la transformation laitière au Niger, intègre le numérique pour moderniser la commercialisation du lait local. Grâce à une plateforme digitale, elle optimise la traçabilité et la distribution via un réseau de boutiques partenaires. A’Mansi ambitionne d’accélérer la digitalisation de la filière en intégrant des solutions IoT et des outils connectés, faisant de l’innovation technologique un levier clé pour valoriser durablement le lait local. Lauréate du PastorHackathon 2024 et du Prix Innovation Numérique au Sahel 2025, A’Mansi vise à transformer l’industrie laitière grâce à des technologies innovantes et inclusives, tout en soutenant les éleveurs locaux et en améliorant l’accès au marché pour les produits laitiers nigériens.

name: A&T Experts
description: A&T Experts, a dynamic Moroccan software development startup, driven by ambitious young engineers. We create innovative custom and standard software solutions for modern businesses. Our skilled team's youthful energy ensures agility and fresh perspectives. Specializing in the full development lifecycle, we offer bespoke solutions and customizable platforms like Maya+ (video streaming), Expertisia (e-learning), and APA Premium (booking), Radio Karaoke (real-time web radio), plus more. Our key strengths: Innovation, agility, client-focus, and local Moroccan expertise with global standards. Poised for growth, A&T Experts aims to become a leading name in the Moroccan tech scene and potentially expand internationally.

name: ABA Technology
description: Our company is a leading global player in the Internet of Things (IoT) value chain, specializing in the design, development, and implementation of innovative digital solutions. With a focus on cutting-edge technologies such as Artificial Intelligence (AI), we are committed to driving transformative changes across industries. We collaborate closely with our partners to create disruptive, high-impact solutions that not only improve operational efficiency but also contribute to building smarter, more sustainable environments. Our expertise spans various sectors, including smart cities, industrial automation, and energy management, where we leverage our deep technological knowledge to deliver measurable results.

name: ABSOLIN
description:
SAP (Société d'Application de Peinture), based in Rochefort (France) since 1830, is mainly engaged in the application of paint, wallpaper, wall, and floor coverings. 

After committing to a CSR (Corporate social responsibility) approach in 2021 with a view to acting responsibly to meet sustainable development objectives, the company has introduced the use of recycled paint or paint based on biosourced components emitting 0% VOCs (Volatile Organic Compounds). A research and development unit has also been created.

The new mission of the company is to develop bio-sourced products for the construction. A new product bio sourced named ABSOLIN  was developed. Made in France from linseed powder, this water-based coating, applied to all types of surfaces (walls and floors, new or old), improves the sound and heat protection of interior spaces and binds ambient formaldehydes.

name: Alakris Group
description: Alakris Group is a fintech company specializing in exporting software products and services. Utilizing blockchain, web3, and smart contracts, it facilitates seamless cross-border payments and wage disbursements. In 2022, over 50% of its revenue came from international markets. Alakris Group provides secure and efficient financial solutions for businesses engaged in global trade, ensuring transparency and reliability in digital transactions. With its own financial infrastructure, the company continues to innovate and support the future of international business.

name: Alaqan
description:
Alaqan is a Kazakhstan-based technology company specializing in biometric payment solutions. We develop proprietary software and hardware for secure and seamless bio-acquiring services using advanced palm vein recognition technology. Our cutting-edge algorithm ensures high accuracy, fraud protection, and seamless user experience, making biometric payments faster and more secure than traditional methods.

Our solutions integrate easily into banks, retail, public services, and access control systems, providing a contactless, hygienic, and convenient payment experience. Alaqan’s technology eliminates the need for cards or smartphones—users simply scan their palm to complete transactions.

With a strong focus on innovation and security, we are expanding our technology across global markets, offering customizable and scalable biometric payment solutions for businesses and financial institutions worldwide.

name: ALEA SOLUCIONES SL
description:
ALEA is a tech company specialized in automating, optimizing and making profitable the access and backhaul network deployments of our customers by providing them, not only with the best equipment from our partners, but also with in-house solutions that allow the management and optimization of their networks, in an aggregated, focused and friendly way; as well as the automation of their processes.
To do so, we base our business in 3 pillars: a) own software systems, "easy service management" suite, covering BSS, OSS, cutting-edge WIFI management and zero-touch automated troubleshooting, plus high throughput transport layer monitoring b) Supply of any network and storage devices thanks to Huawei unparalleled quality c) a set of professional services to plan, design, implement, install configure, support and maintain our projects.

products.name: GOLIX: ALEA light full-stack service orchestration for retail operators
KARAJAN: the light full-stack for wholesale operators
FelixLite / FELIX: light OSS for small ISPs

name: ALCEA ASSA ABLOY
description:
ALCEA is a global provider of total security solutions, specializing in safeguarding critical infrastructure. As part of the ASSA ABLOY Group, ALCEA is dedicated to providing comprehensive security solutions tailored to your needs.

ALCEA protects critical infrastructure such as energy, water, telecom, transportation, mining, oil and gas globally with total security solutions. Their comprehensive portfolio includes hardware and software, keyless and key-based locking, access control, intrusion detection, video management, key management and services from surveys to proactive maintenance. 

Learn more on their website: www.alceaglobal.com

name: ALE INTERNATIONAL MOROCCO BRANCH
description:
Who are we?

Our vision is to deliver the customized technology experiences our customers need. Our mission is to make everything connect by delivering digital age networking, communications and cloud solutions with services tailored for your business success. In the Cloud. On Premises. Hybrid.

ALE is committed to developing technology solutions that work for our customers, connecting people, machine, things and processes, while creating a more sustainable future for all.

name: Alkan CIT
description:
ALKAN CIT is a world-class information technology company and system integrator, providing renowned clients in Egypt, Africa and The Middle East with top-notch solutions and services that help them achieve their business transformation and digitalization goals.

Established in 1994, ALKAN CIT has substantially grown over the years to become one of the most prominent and reliable entities in the region, trusted to deliver seamless projects every single time. Through its subsidiary companies and with more than 1000 of the best-in-the-market calibers, Alkan CIT put together a solutions and services portfolio that spans the entire spectrum of communications and information technology, becoming a one-stop partner to cross-sector market leaders in achieving their strategic transformational objectives.

Propped by our strategic partnerships with global technology leaders, combined with the unparalleled hands-on expertise of our competent teams.

name: ALEXSYS SOLUTIONS
description:
Alexsys Solutions is a pioneering technology company, proudly 100% Made in Morocco, with offices in Casablanca, Rabat, and Paris. We serve both public and private sectors, delivering cutting-edge digital transformation solutions through our four specialized business units:

- Cloud, Infrastructure & Security – Ensuring robust, scalable, and secure IT environments.
- Data & AI – Leveraging advanced analytics and artificial intelligence to drive smarter decision-making.
- Specific Development – Crafting tailored software solutions to meet unique business needs.
- Smart City & IoT – Innovating urban infrastructure with intelligent, connected solutions.

Our SaaS solutions power industries like Ed-Tech, smart city waste management, and more, fostering efficiency and sustainability. At Alexsys Solutions, we are committed to shaping the future with innovative, secure, and high-impact technology.

name: AlProtein
description: AlProtein is a pioneering food-tech startup revolutionizing sustainable protein production through AI-powered biomanufacturing. We specialize in creating high-quality, functional protein ingredients from microalgae and floating plants (lemna), offering eco-friendly, affordable, and scalable solutions for the global food industry. Our flagship products, RubiPro and CheesePro, are tailored for vegan meat and cheese, delivering superior texture, nutrition, and taste while reducing environmental impact. With 85% water recycling, no arable land use, and 200x lower CO? emissions than traditional protein sources, AlProtein is redefining the future of food. We collaborate with F&B manufacturers, leveraging cutting-edge technology to meet the growing demand for sustainable, plant-based protein. Join us in building a greener, healthier food ecosystem.

name: ALGAM
description: Algam is a major player in the distribution and manufacturing of musical instruments, professional audio, and lighting equipment across Europe. With a strong network of brands and partners, the company serves musicians, audio professionals, and integrators by offering a vast selection of high-quality products. From guitars, keyboards, and drums to advanced sound systems and stage lighting, Algam provides solutions for every need, whether for live performances, studio recording, or audiovisual installations. Beyond distribution, Algam also develops its own brands, ensuring innovation and expertise in the industry. With dedicated support, training, and after-sales service, the company stands out as a trusted partner for retailers, event professionals, and institutions. Through passion and commitment, Algam continues to shape the future of music and audiovisual technology, offering cutting-edge solutions for an ever-evolving creative landscape.

description: We are a technology group providing innovative business and financial solutions. **Insoft**, established in 1997, specializes in enterprise software with **Assabil**, a leading **Mobile Sales Force** solution trusted by major distributors, and **weSign**, a powerful **workflow management** platform that optimizes business processes. **Saphir Systems** focuses on financial services, offering **Lean**, a robust platform for **banks, telecoms, and agent network management**. Our solutions are trusted by leading financial institutions, including the biggest bank in Morocco and another major player in France. With years of expertise and a commitment to innovation, we empower businesses with cutting-edge technology to enhance efficiency, optimize workflows, and drive growth. Our solutions cater to a wide range of industries, ensuring seamless operations, scalability, and reliability for our global partners.

name: AccelCity
description: AccelCity is a Moroccan startup transforming urban mobility and smart parking with AI & IoT. Our solution optimize traffic flow, reduce congestion, and enhance city infrastructure through smart parking management, automated vehicle detection, and real-time analytics. We target B2G, B2B, and B2C markets, offering SaaS, licensing, and transaction-based revenue models. With strong demand in Morocco and the GCC area, AccelCity aligns with SDG 11, supporting smart, sustainable cities. We seek strategic partners and investors to scale our AI-driven solutions globally.

name: ACER
description: Acer Inc. is a multinational corporation that designs and manufactures a wide range of electronic products, including personal computers, laptops, monitors, and related peripherals. Known for its innovation in the technology sector, Acer serves both consumer and business markets globally, providing high-performance devices for gaming, education, and professional use. The company focuses on delivering cutting-edge products that enhance productivity, entertainment, and creativity.

name: Acer Europe SA
description:
Founded in 1976, Acer is one of the world's top ICT companies with a presence in more than 160 countries. As Acer evolves with the industry and changing lifestyles, it is focused on enabling a world where hardware, software and services will fuse with one another, creating ecosystems and opening up new possibilities for consumers and businesses alike. Acer's 7,700 employees are dedicated to the research, design, marketing, sale, and support of products and solutions that break barriers between people and technology. 
A member of the RE100 initiative for renewable energy, Acer has been recognized for its efforts in environmental, social and governance, and won numerous industry accolades. It has been listed on the top global sustainability indices, including the Dow Jones Sustainability Indices (DJSI) Emerging Markets Index, the MSCI ESG Leaders Indexes with an “AA” rating, and the FTSE4Good Emerging Index.
Acer Middle East & Africa office started its operations in 1992 in UAE.

description: Pinnacle Technology Corp is a global leading manufacturer of Fiscal Devices, Retail Scales, Point of Sale, Receipt Printer and other POS Peripherals in ACLAS brand. With inception in 1984 in Taipei, Pinnacle has developed into a High-Tech enterprise integrating R & D, production and marketing. With around 40,000 ?self-owned manufacturing plant in Xiamen, China, Pinnacle manufactures annually 1,000,000+ units of commercial devices. Our products are exported to Europe, America, Oceania, MDWA, Africa and more, enjoying great reputation and high brand awareness in the market.

name: ADEP GROUP
description: ADEP Group is an engineering startup specializing in water management, wastewater treatment, and environmental infrastructure. We provide innovative and sustainable solutions for potable water systems, wastewater treatment plants, irrigation networks, and liquid sanitation projects. Our mission is to enhance water resource management through advanced engineering practices. We offer expertise in wastewater treatment, potable water solutions, irrigation systems, and environmental consulting. Committed to sustainability, ADEP Group designs and implements efficient water treatment and resource optimization technologies. With a proven track record in large-scale infrastructure projects, we serve industries, municipalities, and private clients, ensuring high-quality results that meet environmental standards.
sectors: Urban Planning Developers, Consultancy & Project Management

name: Admissions Center
description: Admissions Center, by Education Media Company, is a human-driven, tech-powered lead qualification and student guidance platform for higher education institutions. We help schools & universities convert more leads into enrollments through multichannel engagement (calls, WhatsApp, emails) and personalized support. Our solution bridges the gap between marketing and admissions teams, ensuring every prospective student receives timely, relevant follow-up. Schools benefit from better-qualified candidates, optimized marketing spend, and up to 3x higher conversion rates. Already operating with major actors of education in Morocco and France—such as Universiapolis, the Edvantis Higher Education Group, and Ynov Campus Casablanca—Admissions Center integrates seamlessly with CRMs like HubSpot and custom platforms. With a 30-operator team and a proven track record, we are redefining how institutions engage and enroll students across Francophone Africa and Europe.

name: AdNotes
description:
AdNotes is a multiple award-winning African based Internet Service Provider (ISP) with a reach of 30 million population in South Africa through own and partner networks.

AdNotes is fully licensed by the Independent Communications Authority of South Africa (ICASA) and certified by the Film and Publication Board (FPB) to operate and provide Internet services in South Africa. As members of the Internet Service Provider Association (ISPA) and the Wireless Access Providers Association (WAPA) and uphold the ISPA Code of Conduct.

As AdNotes, a pioneering broadband technology solutions provider based in Africa. We’ve spearheaded a revolution in connectivity solutions through our innovative use of TV White Spaces (TVWS) technology in the hard-to-reach areas.

name: ADRIA
description: In more than 25 countries across the globe, Adria Business & Technology stands out as a leading partner in your digital transformation journey. With a deep-rooted expertise in the banking sector, including software publishing and integration, we offer far more than conventional service providers. We provide tailored solutions at the forefront of technological innovation, supporting you from the inception of your digital transformation project through to the seamless implementation of cutting-edge solutions.

name: ADN
description: Founded in 2010, ADNCORP supports businesses and individuals in their digital transformation journey through a comprehensive suite of services including audits, consulting, web development, and professional training. Our human-centered approach places innovation and quality at the forefront, ensuring that each solution is tailored to the unique needs of our clients. Our multidisciplinary team of experts in new technologies, digital marketing, and instructional design is committed to turning digital challenges into sustainable growth opportunities.

name: Aftermarket
description: Aftermarket is a Côte d’Ivoire-based agritech company revolutionizing food supply by bridging the gap between local producers and urban buyers. We offer a tailored and digitalized delivery service of fresh, locally sourced produce to restaurants, hotels, and households through our ordering platform. With over 30 tons delivered in the past year and a 65% client retention rate, we’ve proven our ability to ensure consistency, traceability, and convenience. Our next phase focuses on sustainable cold storage using solar-powered units to reduce food waste and ensure year-round availability of seasonal crops. We also aim to empower women producers through training and reliable market access. Recognized as Best Logistics Startup at Africarena 2024 and backed by Digital Africa, Aftermarket is positioned to become a key player in the West African food value chain, combining technology, sustainability, and social impact.

name: AGES LOGICIELS SERVICES
description:
Depuis plus de 30ans, AGES LOGICIELS SERVICES accompagne les entreprises avec des solutions performantes et adaptées. Forts de plusieurs centaines de clients, d'une expertise avérée et d'une équipe de consultants certifiés, nous vous aidons à optimiser votre gestion, simplifier vos processus et renforcer votre compétitivité.
NOTRE EXPERTISE : 
- Gestion de la paie et du capital humain
- Gestion du négoce et de la production

name: Aginode
description:
Aginode designs, manufactures & sells connectivity solutions for digital networks in FTTx, Mobile, LAN & Data Centre markets. 

Our goal: to enable the infrastructure which delivers applications that make lives more connected, productive, and enjoyable; today and in future. 

Aginode’s international teams have over 30 years proven track record of developing, implementing, and servicing advanced infrastructure solutions, with Aginode’s diverse product range under brand names:
  LAN & Data Centres: LANmark™ , LANsense™, LANactive
  FTTx & Mobile: XPLORER™, BRIGHTBOX™, INFRABIRD™, UPSKY™

With a state–of-the-art industrial footprint and recognized technological know-how in Europe, Middle East, North-West Africa, and Asia, together with international sales teams and numerous local partners, Aginode is a key player in digitalization and connectivity. 

Make  #smartconnections with Aginode!

UPSKY™ D-CORE shielded or unshielded dual copper conductor cable
Hybrid Power & Data to the Antenna cable
Cables and connectivity and racks for Data Centres and Enterprise

name: AgriEdge
description:
AgriEdge is at the forefront of precision agriculture, delivering cutting-edge solutions to optimize yields and drive sustainable farming. By leveraging advanced technologies, we empower both agricultural and agro-industrial sectors to enhance efficiency while reducing environmental impact.

Originally established in 2017 as a business unit of UM6P, AgriEdge has since evolved into a spinoff of the AgriTech Center of Excellence at UM6P. This transition enables us to capitalize on the Center’s expertise and technological innovations while fully commercializing our solutions.

Our portfolio includes FertiEdge, AquaEdge, YieldEdge, PhytoEdge, SprayEdge, CarboEdge, and TrialEdge—each designed to optimize resource management and improve farming operations.

At AgriEdge, we believe in the power of data to drive informed decisions, helping farmers produce more with less while building a sustainable future.

name: Agirh
description: AGIRH is a leading HRIS provider specializing in comprehensive and customizable human resources management solutions. With a strong presence across 20+ countries, AGIRH serves large and medium-sized enterprises in both the private and public sectors. As a pioneer, AGIRH was the first to introduce a collaborative HR portal, modernizing HR processes with AI-driven features, robust security measures, and flexible cloud or on-premise deployment. Known for its client proximity, integrated solutions, and no-code/low-code customization, AGIRH ensures seamless HR digital transformation while addressing compliance and cybersecurity challenges.

name: Agriwise
description:
Agriwise est une startup marocaine innovante qui développe une solution ERP SaaS modulaire dédiée à l’agriculture. 
Conçu pour les producteurs, coopératives et stations de conditionnement, Agriwise permet de digitaliser l’ensemble de la chaîne de valeur : de la gestion de la ferme (production, traçabilité, parcelles, RH) au conditionnement, à la logistique et à la commercialisation. 
Notre solution est accessible en mode abonnement annuel, avec un support dédié et des modules adaptables aux besoins de chaque client. 
Grâce à une plateforme simple et intuitive, Agriwise aide les acteurs du secteur agricole à améliorer leur productivité, réduire les coûts et garantir la conformité avec les normes de qualité. Déjà adopté par de nombreux clients au Maroc et en afrique, Agriwise ambitionne de devenir un acteur de référence au monde pour l’agritech.

name: Agrosahas International PVT Ltd
description: Digifarmer Agrosahas is a East Africa's AgriTech company leveraging technology to empower smallholder farmers. Through its Digifarmer platform, it provides farmers with financial inclusion, market connectivity, agricultural training, and digital advisory services. The company integrates AI/ML and satellite technology for real-time insights, enhancing productivity and sustainability. Agrosahas is working mainly into staple food products maize, sunflower, and soybean into edible oils, flour, and animal feed while promoting organic farming. We directly sources from 30,000 farmers, 60% of whom are women, improving incomes by 15%. By establishing warehouses, training farmers, and using a circular economy model, Agrosahas minimizes waste and maximizes efficiency. With a $34bn market gap in Uganda’s edible oil and maize flour sector, it aims to scale operations across East Africa, expanding digital and offline farmer services via USSD and Digifarmer agents??.

name: AgroConform
description:
AgroConform is a unique agriculture anticipatory operations platform combining digital twin simulations, AI-powered recommendations & blockchain verification to transform farming from reactive to proactive.
Our three-pillar approach includes:
1- Anticipatory Decision Support Platform with Ideal Crop Cycle "ICC" simulations that let farmers test strategies before implementation.
2-Automated Compliance Platform with our "Book of Crop" creating verifiable records of farming practices.
3- Regenerative Agriculture Intelligence guiding sustainable transitions.
This integrated system helps increase yields by 25%, reduce water usage by 30% & decrease pesticide use by 50% while simplifying compliance and enabling premium market access enabling farmers to simulate before planting, verify while growing, and regenerate while producing.
Our platform serves small to medium farms growing high-value crops in Morocco, Spain, and Italy with plans to expand world wide.

name: Agro Lora
description:
AGRO-LORA is a 100% Moroccan company specializing in Smart Farming. We integrate IoT, satellite imaging, data analytics, and agronomic expertise to support farmers in optimizing yields and managing water consumption.

Our solutions:

-          AGRO-START provides essential farm management insights without requiring equipment.

-          AGRO-IoT enables real-time data collection and analysis for precise monitoring and performance optimization.

-          AGRO-METRI ensures accurate tracking of water consumption, levels, and pressure in pipelines to manage resources and detect anomalies.

-          AGRO-SAT delivers detailed field insights to identify specific parcel needs and enable targeted interventions.
Beyond agriculture, the architecture of our solutions is designed to evolve towards other fields of application, such as aquaculture, Smart Cities and Smart Industry

name: AI CRAFTERS
description: AI Crafters is a company focused on promoting and facilitating the use of artificial intelligence for professionals and managers. We organize first-class Masterclasses and offer our online courses to enable everyone to acquire essential AI skills. Our mission is to demystify AI, provide quality courses such as “The history and mindset of AI”, “Essential AI algorithms for your business” and many others, and help companies automate their departments with tools such as Zapier and generative AI.

We believe in the importance of quality, efficiency, and innovation in achieving sustainable success. Our dedicated team, with extensive expertise, strives to deliver outstanding services. We focus on building long-term relationships with our clients by providing effective solutions that enhance their productivity and operational efficiency. Our vision is to be the first choice for clients seeking reliable and superior services, continuously keeping up with the latest developments in our field to ensure the best possible solutions.

name: Airlod
description: Airlod is a leading NFC technology expert dedicated to transforming the way professionals network, manage online reputation, and engage at events. Through our proprietary application and suite of innovative NFC-enabled products—including digital business cards, NFC tags, and wristbands—we streamline professional interactions, enabling instant sharing of contact details, social profiles, and more. Our solutions empower businesses to efficiently manage their e-reputation, enhance online visibility, and significantly boost customer trust through authentic digital reviews. Designed specifically for today's fast-paced digital landscape, Airlod provides seamless, secure, and eco-friendly networking experiences. Elevate your professional presence, simplify event engagements, and enhance your brand's digital credibility with Airlod’s cutting-edge NFC solutions.

name: Aitek
description:
Founded in 2004 in Côte d'Ivoire, Aitek is Africa’s leading IT value-added distributor. With around 100 employees spread across eight countries (Côte d'Ivoire, Senegal, Burkina Faso, Mali, Togo, Dubai, France, Morocco), our activities revolve around the distribution of IT equipment (infrastructure, PCs, computers, printers, etc.), cybersecurity and cloud solutions, as well as artificial intelligence. We represent over 24 international brands such as Microsoft, HP, Lenovo, Epson, Canon, APC, Nitram, Acronis, Veritas, Symantec, Altair, and many others. We work with nearly 2000 active resellers in more than 20 countries. Convinced that Africa must be built by and for Africans, we prioritize a local approach to drive a dynamic economy. Our core values – teamwork, positivity, innovation, integrity, and responsibility.
www.aitek.fr | info.ci@aitek.fr

name: AiSteth - See The Sound
description:
AsMAP - AiSteth Murmur Analysis Platform has Murmur Detection accuracy of 98.34% with specificity of 99.73% We have screened more than 50,000+ patients across 20+ States of India.

Ai Health Highway is an Ai-first company focused on making the screening of chronic disease cost effective at primary care clinics - the first point of contact for any patient. Each year, 43 million people die of Noncommunicable diseases (NCDs), equivalent to 71% of all deaths globally. Our goal is to reduce 30% of these premature deaths due to NCDs by 2030 and work towards early detection and prediction of Heart/Lung Disorders.

AiSteth (Ai-enabled smart stethoscope) has the potential to screen, detect and predict heart and lung disorders using state-of-the-art signal processing and ML capabilities.

name: Aivis
description: We develop intelligent AI agents that transform how businesses operate across various sectors. Our AI agents work alongside managers to deliver actionable insights rather than overwhelming data. Founded by entrepreneurs with extensive industry experience, Aivis is positioned at the intersection of artificial intelligence, operational efficiency, and sustainability. We're committed to creating AI solutions that don't just monitor operations but actively contribute to better business outcomes.

description: Al Akhawayn University in Ifrane is an independent, public, not-for-profit, coeducational, Moroccan university committed to educating future citizen-leaders of Morocco and the world through a globally oriented, English -language, liberal arts curriculum based on the American system.

description:
Al Namate - IT Services drives digital transformation through advanced portal solutions powered by Liferay. Bridging low-code and deep-code, we enable organizations to accelerate digitalization with secure, scalable, and user-focused platforms.
In Morocco and across Africa, we've led major projects in e-government, digital identity, healthcare, and edtech, delivering end-to-end solutions that ensure performance and reliability.
We build public and internal portals for B2B, B2C, B2E, and B2B2C models. From resident portals to digital workspaces and marketplaces, Al Namate brings the technology and expertise to bring your vision to life.

name: Adtran
description: Adtran is a leading global fiber networking provider focused on open, disaggregated fiber access platforms, intelligent SaaS applications and connected home solutions. With the merger of ADVA, the portfolio expands to include open optical networking solutions delivering cloud interconnect, cloud access, network infrastructure assurance and synchronization. The combined technology portfolio is underpinned by a shared SaaS platform providing AI-driven network control, insights, and optimization. Adtran empowers service providers to deliver intelligent, self-optimizing fiber broadband and cloud connectivity to their customers, unlocking greater value — simply and sustainably at scale. Adtran. Unlocking the future network.

name: Aflu Med Healthcare
description:
Aflu Med Healthcare, founded in 2014 by medical microbiologist and health-tech entrepreneur Lubabalo James Mnyaka, is a South African company focused on centralized healthcare information systems. Its mission is to transform healthcare by addressing inefficiencies in record-keeping, preventing patient file losses, and streamlining care to improve outcomes.

Aflu Med delivers smart, affordable digital tools connecting patients, doctors, and funders. Solutions include electronic health records (EHR), practice management systems, telehealth, remote monitoring, prepaid medical cards, virtual doctor services, medical billing, and a WhatsApp-based healthcare provider directory. These tools reduce admin burdens, support better decisions, and improve access.

Focused on accessibility and efficiency, Aflu Med empowers providers and patients through tech that enables faster, safer, and more personalized care. The company is based in Centurion, Gauteng, South Africa.

name: Advantage Health Africa
description:
Advantage Health Africa is a vertically integrated pharma access business providing last mile medication services via a country-wide network of pharmacies and B2B sales using tech-innovation, relationship marketing and aggregation. Our mission is to improve access, affordability and quality of healthcare through technology, services and products using a platform approach. 

We have created 100+ direct jobs and impacted +600,000 individuals, promote local manufacturing of drugs and enable health innovators focus, earning features on several global platforms and awards. 

Our ventures include myMedicines (D2C medication access via messaging tech), Advantage Pharma (B2B distribution of authentic medication), myPharmacy (strengthening a network of nearly 1000 pharmacies), myAdvantage (subscription-based medication assurance) and The Advantage (pharmacy OS). Our cumulative revenue of +$6.5mil is now set for growth through scalable digital solutions backed with AI and pharma products.

name: Africa IP SME Helpdesk
description:
In today’s knowledge-driven economies, intellectual property (IP) has become a central business asset and driver of innovation, creativity and growth.

The IP Helpdesk provides free-of-charge, first-line support to European small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) on IP management, protection and enforcement. Consisting of six dedicated regional Helpdesk services covering China, Europe, Latin America, India, South-East Asia and Africa, the IP Helpdesk caters to the individual needs of businesses operating in those markets. In addition, the regional Helpdesk for Europe specifically assists EU SMEs and researchers in dealing with IP issues in the context of EU-funded research and innovation projects.

Offering a broad range of informative material, a Helpline service as well as a diverse training calendar, the IP Helpdesk's overall goal is to support IP capacity building along the full scale of IP practices: from awareness to strategic use and successful exploitation.

name: AfricaLink
description:
Africalink is a community of SMEs from Europe and Africa headquartered in Marseille and created in 2017 by a group of European and African entrepreneurs, with the support of local institutions.
They consider that : renewing the Europe/Africa relationship is essential in the development of both continents; South of France has a natural and legitimate vocation to be a crossroads for this relationship; and SMEs are at the heart of growth, stability and sustainable development.
In addition to being a network for business development for its members, Africalink is also a space for reflection and proposals on themes such as collaborative emergence, Africa/France/Europe relationship, diaspora entrepreneurship, women's entrepreneurship, partnerships between SMEs on both continents, welcoming African partners/investors, etc.
Africalink works closely with major groups, national and international institutions, financials and local authorities, with whom it forges regular partnerships.

name: AFRICA MOBILITY SOLUTIONS
description:
Africa Mobility Solutions (AMSO) is a tech-driven company revolutionizing mobility and vehicle management across Africa. We provide smart transportation, fleet optimization, and digital auto services, ensuring efficiency and sustainability.

AMSO CARE, our flagship AutoTech platform, offers connected vehicle diagnostics, predictive maintenance, and mobile servicing. Using IoT-powered OBD devices, AI-driven analytics, and an intuitive mobile app, we bring transparent, fast, and reliable car care to individuals, businesses, and fleet operators.
By integrating smart mobility with data-driven maintenance, AMSO & AMSO CARE are pioneering the future of AutoTech and fleet management, scaling beyond Senegal into Africa and the Middle East.

name: Afrimobility
description:
Afrimobility is Akwa Group's Venture Capital fund, specializing in financing and scaling innovative startups operating in the sectors of mobility and smart cities, HealthTech, FinTech, GreenTech, AI/DeepTech, and Agri-Food Tech. 
Afrimobility's core mission is to invest in disruptive solutions by supporting several high-potential international startups. The fund has a portfolio of 22 startups located in Africa, Europe, and North America. Afrimobility is more than just an investment fund; it is a value-creating company and a driver of innovative and impactful projects.

AfricTRUST (Powered by Eurafric Information)
The leader in digital trust !

Your productivity and profitability are ensured with our products and services, those provide enhanced security, ease of use, and legal reliability, allowing you to remain competitive in a constantly evolving world.

With its unique and innovative offering, AfricTRUST aims to play an active role in the digitalization of public and private enterprises by providing trust services that comply with current regulatory standards.

Backed by over 35 years of expertise from the SATEC Group, Alvatross combines deep industry knowledge with a fresh, modern, and flexible approach, making it well-equipped to tackle today's challenges and capitalize on future opportunities.

name: Alston Systems Inc
description: Alston Systems Inc., is a leading manufacturer of cabling solutions for network infrastructure and industrial applications, data center, power and active solutions. Established in 2002, in Delaware, USA, where the company’s head office remains today. Alston Systems has been dedicated to delivering world class network infrastructure solutions to support business-critical needs for over two decades. Today Alston Systems employs over 300 staff and has a presence in over 50 countries worldwide. The continuous drive for innovation and quality, in house R&D teams, onsite manufacturing and 25-year system warranty allows Alston Systems to offer an extensive range of complete high-performance solutions to address the economic and operational challenges faced by the IT, Infrastructure and data center managers.

description: Amaya AG is a pioneering agritech startup transforming agriculture through advanced AI and digital innovation. Our intuitive platform creates a dynamic ecosystem connecting input suppliers, agronomic advisors, and farmers, empowering them with real-time market intelligence, personalized agronomic advice, and automated insights. By optimizing decision-making, streamlining operations, and enhancing farmer-advisor interactions, we boost productivity, improve profitability, and drive sustainability. Backed by trusted global partners like FAO and Groupe Roullier, we're committed to revolutionizing agriculture—helping our clients stay ahead, maximize resources, and cultivate lasting success.

Our expertise spans multiple industries, including government, finance, healthcare, retail, and energy. With a strong focus on innovation, integrity, and excellence, we aim to be a trusted technology partner, shaping the future of businesses through intelligent and data-driven strategies. description:
Développement des infrastructures :  l’amélioration et  l’expansion des infrastructures de télécommunications  à travers le pays. Cela comprend la connexion Internet haut débit, la création de centres d’accès à l’internet.
Promotion de l’alphabétisation numérique : la promotion, la sensibilisation et la formation aux TIC. 
Développement des services en ligne :  pour les citoyens et les entreprises. Cela inclut le développement de portails gouvernementaux, de plateformes de services en ligne et d’applications mobiles.
Promotion de l’e-gouvernement : Elle vise à améliorer l’efficacité et la transparence des services publics en numérisant les processus administratifs, en fournissant des services en ligne.

name: APOTEK by Lyphon
description: Apotek is an AI-powered platform transforming the way prescriptions are managed across the healthcare ecosystem. We provide real-time clinical decision support for physicians by detecting drug interactions, adjusting dosages, and delivering personalized treatment recommendations. Apotek goes beyond standard prescription tools by offering a connected solution that also empowers patients with medication reminders and treatment tracking, and supports pharmacists through secure digital prescriptions. Designed to reduce medical errors, improve adherence, and optimize treatment outcomes, Apotek ensures safer, smarter, and more efficient care. Our vision is to become the leading AI platform for precision prescribing and therapeutic management in emerging healthcare markets.

name: AquaDeep
description: Aquadeep is pioneering AI-driven computer vision technology for fish hatcheries and aquacultures, offering the first-ever automated larvae counting system with up to 99% accuracy. Our patented innovation replaces manual counting, reducing errors, saving time, and optimizing production. Designed for seamless integration, our SaaS platform provides real-time data, improving decision-making and efficiency. By automating a critical yet time-consuming process, Aquadeep helps hatcheries scale operations while ensuring precision. With a growing global presence, we are raising €1.2 M to expand into new markets, enhance R&D, and drive the future of aquaculture.

name: Aqualana
description:
Aqualana is a solution that allows users to track their water consumption in real time through connected sensors and a mobile application. Its goal is to raise awareness about more responsible water management by providing visibility into consumption, tracking bill evolution, and offering personalized advice to optimize the use of this precious resource.

How it works? A sensor is installed at each water point, connecting to our mobile application. This sensor tracks water usage in real time and transmits data on the amount of water used and its source. The application features a dashboard displaying water consumption, a daily water bill, and a detailed monthly bill at the end of each month. This visibility allows users to identify tasks where they overconsume water. Additionally, the mobile application provides personalized advice to encourage more responsible water usage.

Aqualana promotes responsible water use for households and businesses, driving cost savings and sustainability.

name: ARCTERA
description:
We focus on what matters most.

Data challenges like compliance, ransomware, and downtime are getting tougher. Arctera simplifies data management to keep you secure.

Data Compliance
End-to-end data management for information governance, eDiscovery, and digital surveillance. Address regulatory requirements and reduce risk with the help of AI-powered solutions designed to navigate global privacy and industry regulations, accelerating legal and surveillance review.

Data Resilience
Resilience for mission-critical applications to guarantee seamless operations and rapid recovery across diverse IT environments. Simplify management of high availability and disaster recovery capabilities to enhance efficiency and reduce downtime, keeping your critical applications and data secure, performant, and accessible.

Data Protection
Comprehensive defense against cyberthreats and data loss for small to midsize organizations, designed to safeguard business-critical information with ease and efficiency.

description: Artizal.ma is a revolutionary B2B platform dedicated to bridging the gap between Moroccan artisans, manufacturers, and e-commerce entrepreneurs. Our solution empowers artisans to showcase their products and collaborate with merchants seeking high-quality, locally made goods. Through Artizal.ma, we offer real-time availability, seamless communication, and tools for customization, enhancing both the buying and selling experience. With our vision to modernize and elevate Moroccan craftsmanship, we aim to boost local businesses and promote Moroccan artistry on a global scale.

name: ARWA SOLUTIONS
description:
ARWA Solutions is a Moroccan AgriTech startup empowering farmers with intelligent irrigation technology to optimize water use and boost yields. Our system combines AI-powered recommendations, real-time monitoring, and plug-and-play IoT device to deliver precision irrigation with minimal effort.
Through soil sensors, weather data, and pressure monitoring, ARWA enables sector-based irrigation planning and early detection of leaks or clogs. Farmers access a personalized dashboard and receive real-time alerts and daily insights directly on their mobile phones.
What sets ARWA apart is our unique blend of AI automation and agronomic expertise. In addition to digital tools, we offer human guidance from irrigation specialists to support farmers in every decision ; making smart farming both accessible and actionable.

name: AR DISPLAY
description:
AR DISPLAY: Elevating E-Commerce with AR

AR DISPLAY empowers sellers to reduce returns and boost sales by letting shoppers preview products in their space via smartphone AR. Our platform offers:

No-code AR tools to create immersive 3D product demos.

Virtual try-ons for fashion, decor, electronics, and more.

Data insights to track engagement and ROI.

Why us? Sellers cut costs and increase conversions; buyers shop confidently.

Mission: Make AR-driven shopping accessible, bridging digital convenience with real-world accuracy. Vision: Lead the immersive commerce revolution.

Partner with AR DISPLAY to transform browsing into buying.

Our commitment extends to supporting businesses & public administrations in their digital endeavors, ensuring seamless transitions and fortified cybersecurity measures. 
Through our diverse portfolio of services, we aim to empower organizations with technologies needed to thrive in an ever-evolving digital landscape. From secure data storage to innovative Cloud solutions, our offerings are designed to meet the needs of each client, fostering growth and resilience.
Our mission is to continue serving as a trusted partner, delivering value-driven solutions that prioritize security, reliability, and innovation.

Recognizing the need for innovative solutions, our team of experts in technology, finance, and innovation set out to empower businesses with cutting-edge tools that enhance efficiency and unlock potential.

From AI-driven analytics to seamless cloud migration and tailored digital strategies, we go beyond services—we solve real challenges. At Azm, technology is not just about innovation; it’s about people, businesses, and success stories. We partner with companies to build smarter, faster, and stronger futures.

AZA Petrosolutions specializes in fuel management optimization solutions, leveraging IoT to enhance efficiency, reduce costs, and prevent fuel fraud. 
Our flagship product, AFMS (AZA Fuel Management System) enables real-time tracking, automated stock management, and secure fuel monitoring for fuel stations and fleets.
We serve major industry players in Morocco and are expanding into the Middle East and Africa, with installations in Saudi Arabia. 
Our revenue model includes hardware sales, SaaS subscriptions, and maintenance fees, ensuring scalability.
Committed to green energy transition, we are making AFMS compatible with electric and hydrogen fueling stations. Recognized by Forbes Middle East and international organizations, we continue to drive innovation in fuel management while seeking strategic partnerships and investments for further expansion.

The company provides a platform that allows users to complete tasks without visiting physical branches, reducing waiting times and simplifying processes. Balador’s app features appointment scheduling, allowing users to reserve spots in line at various institutions in advance.

The company serves sectors such as universities, schools, hospitals, government departments, and finance companies, helping them transition to digital operations. Balador is focused on enhancing digital service delivery in Jordan, with plans to expand into the Gulf region. Through its innovative services, Balador aims to eliminate waiting lines and promote digital transformation in institutions, improving efficiency and user satisfaction across various sectors.

description:
BeYs Outsourcing Services is a leading BPO provider with over 20 years of expertise and 2,000 employees across 4 countries. We help businesses optimize costs, manage activity fluctuations, and improve operational efficiency.
Our services include IT support & Helpdesk, Customer Experience (CX), document processing with OCR, KYC compliance, content moderation, and business process management.
Our IT & Helpdesk division offers 24/7 technical support, IT infrastructure management, outsourced IT services, and multilingual user support. We also specialize in process integration and automation to enhance business performance.
We ensure data confidentiality and security, including HDS-certified hosting.

name: BATOOTA.AI
description: Batoota.AI is an AI-driven travel platform accessible via WhatsApp, Telegram, website, and app. It simplifies trip planning by connecting travelers with local businesses, promoting sustainable tourism, and supporting communities. Starting in Morocco with plans to expand globally, Batoota ensures authentic, regulated experiences. The AI agent assists end-to-end: from personalized itineraries (based on budget, travel style, and preferences) to real-time updates, easy bookings with exclusive rates, and curated recommendations. Unique to Batoota is its focus on local voices—multimedia guides created by locals highlight hidden gems in villages and cities, encouraging travelers to explore lesser-known areas and fostering pride in local culture. Whether you’re a budget backpacker or a luxury seeker, Batoota tailors every detail to your needs, making travel effortless and meaningful while uplifting the places you visit.

name: Beekee
description:
Beekee Sàrl – Digital Classrooms Anywhere

Beekee Sàrl is a Swiss startup transforming education with offline-first technology. Our Beekee Box enables organizations to deploy digital classrooms anywhere, without relying on internet or power. Up to 40 learners connect to a single Beekee Box using their smartphones or tablets, accessing high-quality digital content seamlessly.

Beyond the device, Beekee provides instructional design services, implementation support, and the "Beekee Plus" annual SaaS and support package, ensuring a smooth and highly cost-effective learning experience with low admin effort.

Trusted by GiZ, MSF and the ICRC, Beekee helps organizations reduce training costs, improve accessibility, and enhance learning outcomes in the most challenging environments.

Visit us at booth 20C-78 to see Beekee in action!

name: ATOS
description: We are Europe’s top choice for cybersecurity, cloud, employee experiences, digital technology & transformation services. We deliver our tailored, secure, and sustainable end-to-end digital solutions worldwide, powering the success and impact of global businesses for their clients and society at large.

name: Autodesk
description:
Autodesk is changing how the world is designed and made. 
Our technology spans architecture, engineering, construction, product design, manufacturing, and media and entertainment. We empower innovators everywhere to solve challenges, big and small. From greener buildings to smarter products and more mesmerizing blockbusters, Autodesk software helps our customers design and make a better world for all.
Over 100 million people use Autodesk software, like AutoCAD, Revit, Maya, 3ds Max, Fusion 360, SketchBook, and more, to unlock their creativity and solve important design, business, and environmental challenges. It taps the infinite computing power of the cloud to help teams around the world collaborate, design, simulate, and fabricate their ideas in 3D. We’re proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and we consider all quali?ed applicants without regard to race, gender, disability, veteran status, or other protected category. 
To see our culture in action, check out #AutodeskLife.

name: Awar AI
description:
Awar AI, the first Moroccan company developing sovereign AI for underrepresented languages, brings cutting-edge speech and language processing to Amazigh languages (Tarifit, Tamazight, Tachelhit) and Arabic dialects (Moroccan Darija, Gulf Arabic).
Our proprietary Automatic Speech Recognition (ASR), Text-to-Speech (TTS), and Natural Language Processing (NLP) technologies capture linguistic nuances overlooked by mainstream AI systems.
We create efficient, locally-deployable solutions that preserve data sovereignty while delivering exceptional accuracy. Partnering with businesses, governments, and educational institutions, we enable inclusive digital experiences from voice-enabled customer support to heritage preservation tools.
By democratizing language technology, Awar AI isn't just building software—we're preserving cultural identities and empowering millions to engage with technology in their native tongues, ensuring linguistic diversity thrives in the digital age.

Nos produits et solutions: Lecteurs code à barres (Scanners). Terminaux de saisie portable (PDA), Imprimantes thermiques, Tablettes Industrielles, RFID.

name: aX-MENA
description:
aX-MENA SARL, founded in 2023 in Morocco, is part of the international expansion strategy of aXialyze Group, a Belgian consultancy specializing in supply chain, digital transformation, and data science. 

The launch of aX-MENA marked a pivotal stage in the development of FaaS4U – Forecast as a Service, our cloud-based AI and Machine Learning-powered forecasting platform. FaaS4U enhances demand forecasting with seamless Web API integration, requiring no initial investment and offering quick onboarding.

Powered by our proprietary OCTOPUS*L model, it continuously optimizes forecasting methods, combining them for maximum accuracy. FaaS4U leverages a “mixture of experts” approach, integrating external factors like promotions, price elasticity, events  , and weather to minimize errors and maximize forecasts accuracy.

Our mission is to democratize access to reliable and accurate forecasts for all sectors, improving decision-making while making a positive impact on the environment.

name: Axians Morocco
description:
Axians accompagne ses clients - entreprises privées, secteur public, opérateurs et fournisseurs de services – dans l’évolution de leurs infrastructures et de leurs solutions digitales.
 
Pour cela, Axians maîtrise l’ensemble des technologies de l’information et de la communication : solutions applicatives et data analytics, réseaux d’entreprises et espaces de travail digital, datacenter et cloud, infrastructures télécoms, cybersécurité. 
 
Au travers d’activités de conseil, de conception, d’intégration et de services, Axians développe des solutions sur mesure afin de transformer la technologie en valeur ajoutée. 

Axians est une marque de VINCI Energies.

name: Axiros
description:
For over 20 years, Axiros has been a leading provider of software solutions for Device Management in telecommunications and other industries. The company's reputation for excellence and expertise in Device Management has made it a trusted partner for service providers and equipment manufacturers worldwide. 

Axiros specializes in offering Device Management software that enables seamless integration and management of devices and services, leveraging industry standards like TR-069 and USP. 

With a global presence, Axiros is committed to delivering innovative solutions that meet the evolving needs of businesses in today's digital landscape.

name: aXiom Zorn
description: Axiom Zorn is a data-driven enterprise that integrates ICT solutions to empower smallholder farmers with financial access, market linkages, and critical insights. By leveraging its Digital Empowerment Card (DEC), Axiom Zorn enables farmers to access credit, savings, and advisory services, driving financial inclusion and agricultural innovation. With a growing database of over 500,000 rural community members, the company partners with financial institutions and agribusinesses to provide tailored solutions. Axiom Zorn also facilitates credit scoring, data analytics, and market intelligence to enhance decision-making for farmers and stakeholders. Committed to expanding across Africa, the company aims to scale its impact by reaching 1 million farmer households, strengthening partnerships, and optimizing operational processes. Through technology and data, Axiom Zorn is transforming agriculture, improving livelihoods, and fostering economic growth.

With headquarters in Rabat, a key office in Casablanca, and five regional technical branches, AXELI offers nationwide coverage to ensure exceptional service and proximity to clients.

name: Beyond Plans
description:
Consulting and professional Services dedicated to Anaplan Projects

As an Anaplan certified expert, Beyond Plans is a recognized player in performance management and planning for Finance, HR and Supply Chain.

By adapting to each company’s challenges, Beyond Plans designs and implement customized solutions that integrate seamlessly with existing processes. For Beyond Plans, building a strong customer partnership and working collaboratively is essential.

Fully committed, Beyond Plans teams work hand in hand with their customers to bring each project to fruition. 

By combining business and technical skills, they transcend standardized technologies to build highly customized solutions that deliver success. 

At Beyond Plans, model builders, solutions architects and project managers join forces and pool their expertise to enrich each project. Together, they analyze needs, reassess existing solutions, provide relevant advice and guide each company towards new opportunities.

name: Beyond the Map
description:
Beyond the Map is an agentic AI-powered tourism platform that transforms how people explore cultural heritage using augmented reality (AR), AI agents, and text-to-speech technology.

Built for scalability, our AI-driven historical agents fetch and curate data from archives, museums, and local sources, reconstructing artifacts, architecture, and narratives. Users can see, hear, and walk through history like never before.

Starting with 14.7 million tourists in Morocco, Beyond the Map redefines cultural tourism, allowing travelers to explore cities, monuments, and landmarks from their origins. Whether it’s Marrakech under the Saadian dynasty, our platform delivers deeply immersive, interactive experiences.

With global applicability and multi-market potential, Beyond the Map is set to disrupt the $1.3 trillion tourism industry, preserving, educating, and enhancing cultural appreciation at scale.

Join us in revolutionizing cultural tourism.

name: Bictorys
description:
Bictorys is a leading FinTech company transforming digital payments with secure, interoperable, and seamless transactions. Our omnichannel payment gateway enables businesses to accept payments in-store, online, and remotely via credit cards, mobile money (Orange Money, Wave), and bank transfers.  

We provide e-commerce plugins, instant payment processing, and financial inclusion solutions, ensuring fast, secure, and scalable transactions. Serving SMEs, enterprises, and e-commerce merchants, Bictorys simplifies digital payments with cutting-edge technology. Our platform enhances business efficiency, reduces complexities, and integrates seamlessly with financial infrastructures.  

Committed to innovation, security, and reliability, we bridge digital and traditional banking, empowering businesses across Africa and the Middle East. By enabling interoperability, we drive financial inclusion and economic growth, ensuring seamless and accessible transactions for businesses and consumers.

The key areas of our business are Smartphones, Tablets, computer equipment, Printing equipment, and telecommunication equipment.
Today, the company unites several specialized department for working with corporate clients, and company main markets are Middle East, Europe, Africa, South America and Asia.
Our company's mission is to provide high-quality service and supplies to retailers. High professionalism and automation make it possible to supply from small store chains to large regional representatives of retail chains.

name: Biolife Tech
description: BioLife Tech is an agritech company dedicated to developing the largest agri-food distribution network in West Africa. By building a strong ecosystem of local producers and distribution partners, the company facilitates seamless market access for farmers. Its e-pineA platform connects local and global agribusiness buyers with producers committed to sustainable farming. Using real-time production data and predictive algorithms, e-pineA provides visibility on field maturity levels, product availability by zone, quality standards, and quantities, ensuring an optimized and traceable supply chain. The platform also enables agribusinesses to source efficiently traceable products and make secure digital payments, transforming how agricultural products are traded and distributed in the region.

Millions of BIXOLON printers are used today in retail, hospitality, healthcare, banking, ticketing, post/parcel, warehousing and other transaction-intensive industries. In 2023, for the 10th consecutive year BIXOLON was named global mobile receipt printer market leader by Japanese research company Chunichisha.

description:
Bluepsol (BLUE POWER SOLUTION) est une start-up innovante qui a pour embêtions de révolutionner l’activité de la pèche et amélioré la vie des pécheurs tous en minimisent l’impact environnemental de cette activité. 
Nous avons fabriqué un générateur électrique écologique, économique et intelligent :
Il se charge via les panneaux solaires et récupère l'énergie produite par le bateau a fin de faire fonctionner les projecteur led d’une puissance et couleur bien déterminer pour une pèche sélectif et durable. Il permet aussi la localisation et la communication de pêcheur présent dans les annexes avec le bateau mère. La localisation GPS, l’image de sondeur l'état météo seront transmet au bateau mère a fin de crée une base de données.et au finale grâce à l'intelligence artificielle (IA), nous pourrons prédire les maintenances et optimiser les temps et les lieux de pêche. Cad créés un indice de pêchabilité

name: BODIT
description:
In June 2022, we successfully secured SEED-stage investment, and in July 2022, we were selected for the TIPS program, where we are currently conducting an R&D project.

In August, we won the grand prize at the ICT Smart Device Competition, receiving the Minister of Science and Technology Award. In September, we received the Excellence Award at the Agri-Food Startup Contest, earning the Minister of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs Award.

By December 2022, we were recognized as an Outstanding R&D Innovation Product and were selected for the KOICA CTS program.

Since 2023, we have been expanding into international markets, developing a business model for developing countries in Africa (Kenya) and building networks in Australia and Canada to establish a business model for advanced economies.

We currently provide solutions in the livestock sector (FarmersHands) and the sports sector (BodyStemo). However, our technology has the potential to expand into a wide range of industries.

name: BOIFIOK NIGERIA LIMITED
description:
A social commerce for group grocery buying in Nigeria. Empowers consumers with affordable, quality foodstuffs via collective purchasing, aiding local vendors with market reach. 

We aim to transform Nigeria's grocery sector with accessible, collaborative platform that will lead to community-driven commerce, driving growth, bonds, ethical practices. 

Services: Online marketplace, bulk facilitation, vendor sales, support. 
Target: Price-sensitive consumers, local vendors, community groups, urban dwellers. 
Model: Commissions, bulk fees, vendor subscriptions. Advantages: First-to-market, community focus, vendor empowerment, affordability, local knowledge, adaptable tech.

Management: Youth Johnson (CEO), Zekinat Akinwande (Product), Uwakmfon Ekong (CTO), Advisors: Hanson Johnson (Start Innovation Hub), Dr. Itoro Emembolu (TechQuest), Aniedi Udo-Obong (Google), Mark Essien (Hotels.ng). 
Boifiok aims to revolutionize Nigeria's grocery market, fostering economic growth and equitable access.

name: Booking Container
description:
Booking Container – Company Profile
Booking Container is an innovative digital platform that provides real-time comparisons of container shipping rates and routes from global carriers. Our goal is to streamline and optimize freight booking with a fast, transparent, and efficient solution.

name: Brain Station 23
description:
Brain Station 23 is a global leader in digital transformation, delivering cutting-edge solutions in software development, cloud computing, AI, machine learning, and blockchain. Our bespoke technology solutions drive innovation, efficiency, and business growth while ensuring top-tier quality, on-time delivery, and budget adherence.  

With a presence in 30+ countries and offices in the USA, UAE, Malaysia, Bangladesh, and Germany, we have successfully completed 2500+ projects with 800+ skilled professionals. name: Branche Épargne-Prévoyance de la CDG
description:

name: Boowme
description:
Boowme is the first matchmaking and relationship coaching app designed to truly understand the nuances of Arab culture. We help people find their life partner and build a healthy relationship.

When it comes to serious relationships, Arab people are very selective. At Boowme, we encourage quality interactions by limiting users to 5 conversations at a time, fostering deeper and more intentional connections; validating them with 3 strong AI match tests with more than 60 questions. Boowme is all about respect, we are the first in the world to introduce an anti-ghosting feature, ensuring meaningful connections. 

With in-app relationship coaching, we offer users in the Arab world the marriage guidance they may not receive from family, to help them navigate relationships with confidence.

We have the trust of women—our platform has 40% more female members than global dating apps. We have 300K downloads, growing 20% each month. We register 62% MAU, proving the impact of our approach.

name: BOSTON LIMITED
description:
Boston Ltd is a leading provider of high-performance, power-optimised technologies for various markets. We offer bespoke solutions based on products that include servers, storage, workstations and clustered solutions with value-added services, such as global on-site maintenance packages and life cycle management for IT equipment. What sets Boston apart is our expertise in integrating, testing and validating high-performance custom solutions. We can fully brand and package our solutions to meet the specific needs of our customers. 
We also have extensive experience in AI, ML and data. We offer end-to-end services like training, advisory services and implementation to help organisations navigate the complexities of digitalisation successfully and solutions that automate processes, optimise operations, and provide valuable insights from data. 
If you are looking for a high-performance technology partner that can help you stay ahead of the curve, then Boston is the right choice for you

name: Breet
description:
Breet is an OTC crypto exchange designed for effortless, secure, and swift crypto-to-cash/crypto-to-crypto transactions. 

Whether you’re cashing out Bitcoin, swapping crypto, or paying bills, Breet eliminates the usual delays and high fees, offering a hassle-free experience. 

With instant settlements, competitive rates, and built-in price alerts, users can get the most value and stay ahead of market changes.

Our mission is to simplify crypto conversions—no complex jargon, just instant results. Built for individuals and businesses alike, Breet offers auto-settlements to bank accounts, hands-free withdrawals, and crypto invoicing for merchants.

We prioritize security with strict KYC & AML compliance, ensuring a safe space for transactions. Our vision? To become Africa’s leading platform for frictionless cross-border fiat transfers via crypto. 

Backed by premium customer support and continuous innovation, Breet is redefining the crypto experience—one smooth transaction at a time!

name: BRITICOM

Our products ensure seamless voice, data, and video transmission with a focus on quality, innovation, and sustainability. We offer fibre optic cables, patch panels, copper cabling, server racks, and specialized AV cabling. Briticom excels in quality, customer relationships, and global reach. Partner with us for future connectivity.

description:

Designed for both retail and institutional investors, Penelope boosts market profitability while helping brokers enhance client retention and financial performance with proprietary predictive technology.

Backed by deep expertise in AI and finance, BXT.AI is 100% bootstrapped, demonstrating our commitment, innovation, and execution power. We’ve gained traction at global fintech events like Web Summit, Singapore Fintech Festival, and North Star Dubai, backed by INNOVIT in San Francisco, NVIDIA Inception, and AWS Startup, earning media recognition.

With Penelope, we’re not just predicting markets—we’re shaping the future of intelligent investing. Join us in revolutionizing AI-powered finance.

CDG Développement is a long-term operator and investor, reconciling financial performance and collective utility, offering innovative development tools and high-performance products and services that generate progress for the community in all its areas of activity.
