name: Chekkit Inc (www.chekkitapp.com & ChekkitApp)
description:
Chekkit addresses the pervasive issue of counterfeit food and drugs, a $300B or 40% market share loss that gravely impacts communities in Africa and the Middle East. Over 500,000 people die annually from consuming fake or substandard products, according to WHO, because traceability adoption was elusive, causing a lack of transparency in supply chains. Fueled by weak, inconsistent regulatory oversight, corruption, and poor infrastructure. Manufacturers and importers in Africa struggle with ineffective monitoring systems, allowing dangerous counterfeit goods to flood markets. 

Chekkit uses cryptographic unique identifiers on farm inputs, CPGs, pharmaceuticals, and other physical products, along with our proprietary automated AI workflow, to digitize supply chains in emerging markets. This protects brands and consumers from counterfeits and boosts supply chain operational efficiency by 30x, connecting all stakeholders from manufacturing through distribution, retail, and the last mile.

name: China Mobile International
description:
China Mobile International Limited (CMI) is a wholly-owned subsidiary of China Mobile. In order to provide better services to meet the growing demand in the international telecommunications market, China Mobile established CMI in December 2010, headquartered in Hong Kong, China. CMI has expanded its footprint in 39 countries and regions.
Leveraging the strong support by China Mobile, CMI is a trusted partner that provides comprehensive international information services and solutions to international enterprises, carriers and mobile users.

name: Chapa
description:
Chapa is an online payment gateway licensed by the National Bank of Ethiopia (NBE) and approved by the Information Network Security Administration (INSA). We empower businesses, entrepreneurs, and government agencies to accept payments online from anywhere in the world. The name "Chapa" is a popular slang term for "money" among Ethiopian youth, making our brand relatable and familiar.
Our platform features a user-friendly dashboard that streamlines payment collection and disbursement for businesses of all sizes. We also enable individuals and small businesses to effortlessly create payment, donation, and event links.
Chapa is dedicated to addressing payment challenges in developing countries, partnering with customers to explore new business opportunities, and empowering both businesses and developers. Our core values of security, privacy, loyalty, and quality drive us to create a brighter future for Ethiopian commerce.

name: ChipChip
description: ChipChip is a fast-growing social commerce platform expanding into fintech solutions for both customers and sellers. By integrating digital payments, BNPL, and financial tools, ChipChip enhances trust and accessibility in online group buying and trade.

name: Chitosan
description:
A bio.technology company specialized in extracting a natural material (chitosan) from shrimp shells, which can be used in more than 240 applications in several industries like, medical, pharmaceutical, water treatment, agricultural, bioplastics..etc, our first penetrated market was agricultural to formulate and manufacture organic fertilizers, pesticides and fungicides to substitute chemical and to turn conventional farming way into organic way with higher efficiency and lower cost, 
we have 11 products till now ranging from seed treatment, passing by flowering, vegetation, fungicides, and pesticides, to reaching post-harvest treatment, all of our products are fully organic, with an average extra yield increasing by 44% compared with chemicals, reflecting on the ROI for the farmer with an average of 7.3x if he compared the extra yield he gets with the price of the products he buys from the company.

name: CIS INTEGRATION
description:
CIS Integration is part of CIS (Computer Information Systems), a leading ICT information systems provider established for four decades with a diversified portfolio of IT solutions and services, and 53 offices spanning across 30 countries in the Middle East and Africa. CIS strategic partners are Oracle, HPE, Microsoft, Cisco, Huawei, OpenText, Dell Technologies, and VMWare to name a few. CIS specialization: Artificial Intelligence, Information Technologies, Data Center, Front-End solutions, Networking, Security and Cybersecurity, Software Technology, Bid Data Analytics, Test and Measurement equipment and this across industries: Financial, Telecom, Public, Health Care, Energy & Utilities. The value-added services range from end-to-end accountability, Audit& Consultancy, Deployment & Integration, Maintenance & Technical Assistance, Outsourcing, Cloud Services and Managed Services.  
CIS obtained ISO 9001:2015 and ISO/IEC 27001:2022.

name: CIH BANK
description: Depuis sa création en 1920, CIH Bank a su évoluer et se positionner comme un leader de l'innovation bancaire au Maroc. Plus qu'une banque, CIH Bank est un catalyseur de transformation digitale, propulsant l'expérience client vers de nouveaux horizons. Avec plus de 2 millions d'utilisateurs actifs sur nos plateformes, nous redéfinissons les standards grâce à notre application primée CIH Mobile, un modèle d'avant-garde dans les services financiers digitaux. Alliant tradition et modernité, CIH Bank forge l'avenir de la banque, en collaborant avec l'écosystème Fintech pour bâtir des solutions qui anticipent les besoins de demain.

description: CIO AFRICA is the leading technology content and insights platform serving senior technology professionals in Africa with latest information in technology through our publication, online portal and amazing events.

name: Calyans Maroc
description:
Stockbooking is a B2B online marketplace and technological platform that allows logistics services providers and companies with spare capacity to connect with businesses requiring on demand warehousing and associated logistics services. 
Our solution helps, on one side, Businesses to benefit from dynamically scalable warehousing and logistics services with no lease commitments. On the other side, it helps logistics services providers and companies to have additional income for unused space and associated logistics services.
With our solution, Businesses are able to reduce costs and their carbon footprint because they can store their goods as close as possible to their procurement or delivery sites.
Stockbooking acts also as a collaboration tool and a control tower to enable a consolidated real time visibility on the inventory wherever it is located thanks to our integrations with WMS, ERP, TMS...

name: Capital Banking Solutions
description:
For over 25 years, Capital Banking Solutions has been developing and integrating innovative banking solutions tailored to various international banks. Leveraging our expertise, extensive experience, and ongoing research and development efforts, we offer a broad range of innovative products to address the needs and challenges of the banking market and our 200 banking and financial institution clients.

We are leaders in universal banking, retail banking, corporate banking, private banking, Islamic banking, microfinance, neo-banks, family offices, and asset management and brokerage companies. Our software solutions are open architecture, modular, and available on both cloud and on-premises platforms. With 300 expert employees based in France, Switzerland, Dubai, Lebanon, Ivory Coast, Egypt, Morocco and the USA, we ensure seamless product support, services, and a close relationship with all our clients.

name: CAPITALETECH
description:
CAPITALETECH stands out for its ability to design innovative and customized solutions that meet the specific needs of professionals and contribute to their digital transformation.
• Software Development: Creation of robust, high-performance software solutions tailored to the specific requirements of each client.
• Artificial Intelligence (AI) Development: Implementation of AI-based solutions, such as predictive models, intelligent automation systems, and advanced analytics tools, enabling businesses to improve productivity and accuracy.
• Custom Software: Design of tailored software solutions to optimize business processes and enhance companies' competitiveness.
• Strategic Support: Consulting for the definition and implementation of effective digital strategies.
• Training: Customized training sessions to help teams fully leverage technological tools.

name: CapitalNumbers Infotech Limited
description:
Capital Numbers is a top-rated custom software development company with over 300 glowing 5-star reviews on B2B platforms. 

Our 800+ team, skilled in 100+ technologies and with 12+ years of experience, ensures exceptional digital solutions for global clients like Volvo, Cinepolis, Reuters, Conde Nast, NANA and Ejada.

Our Services include:
- Custom Software: Scalable web & mobile apps  
- AI/ML & GenAI: Drive efficiency & insights  
- Cloud Solutions: Optimize performance & scalability  
- Data & Analytics: Salesforce, Tableau, Power BI  
- E-commerce: Build & grow online stores  
- Staff Augmentation: Top-tier tech talent on-demand  

Why Choose Us? 
- Rated #1 on Clutch, G2 & Trustpilot  
- 800+ skilled professionals

Meet us at Gitex to explore tailored solutions for your business.  
Contact us at info@capitalnumbers.com, and let’s bring your vision to life.

products.name: Backend & Frontend Development with Agile Pods

name: CASINFO
description: Founded in 1994, CASINFO is a company specializing in the import and distribution of computer equipment and consumables, for both professionals and individuals. Since its inception, CASINFO has distinguished itself on the market thanks to its expertise and know-how. Over the years, we have consolidated our position by gaining a significant share of the market, thanks to our commitment to customers and our constant desire to provide solutions adapted to their needs.

name: Casanet
description:
Fort de notre expertise de plus de 25 ans, nous oeuvrons pour accompagner les entreprises dans la réussite de leur transformation digitale. Nous sommes surtout des femmes et des hommes passionnés. 
Acteur majeur dans les services numériques au Maroc, nous contribuons à développer de manière significative l'usage des nouvelles technologies, et ce, à travers le lancement de concepts pionniers. Le dernier en date étant le lancement de Mycloud.ma, première marketplace cloud au Maroc. 
Notre position solide nous a permis d'amorcer notre développement international, notamment en Afrique.

name: CDG
description:
Founded in 1959, CDG is a public financial institution, playing a major role in the Moroccan Economy. It’s consolidated balance sheet accounts for more than 25% of GDP (22 billion US $).
The CDG Economic model is based on three pillars : 1/ Credibility, trust and expertise 2/ Additionality and alignment with national objectives  3/ Governance and Risk Management. It’s organization revolves around 5 major fields of activity : Savings and Pension Funds / Territorial Development /Tourism / Investment / Banking & Finance.
CDG’s mission consists in creating a long-term value as part of this double mission :  1/ Collecting, securing and growing depositors’ regulated savings ( profitability-oriented mandate) ; 2/Supporting the National Development Strategy through positive externality-generating projects (Development-oriented mandate).

name: CAST
description: A sustainable, economically viable, and scalable solution to address global challenges in water, food, and energy distribution. By the CAST advanced micro plasma sterilization technology, it ensures local based high resource efficiency and decent environmental impact. Furthermore, the business model demonstrates strong commercial potential, offering scalability across diverse markets while delivering sustainable economic growth and creating value for both communities and stakeholders.

products.name: WAFED (Water, Food, Energy and Distribution)  Facility
AWS Series (Sterilizing Water, No Chemical Required)
STG-X Storage (Cold room storage with sterilization)

name: CBI
description:
CBI Maroc est un intégrateur IT leader, spécialisé dans la cybersécurité, le cloud, les infrastructures et la transformation digitale. Forts de notre expertise et de partenariats stratégiques avec des acteurs technologiques de renom, nous accompagnons les entreprises dans la sécurisation et l’optimisation de leurs systèmes d’information.

Nos services incluent : solutions de cybersécurité avancées, infrastructures cloud et on-premise, gestion des identités et accès, réseaux sécurisés et services managés. Nous offrons une approche sur mesure, adaptée aux besoins de chaque organisation, pour renforcer leur résilience face aux cybermenaces et améliorer leur performance IT.

Avec une équipe d’experts certifiés et une vision tournée vers l’innovation, CBI Maroc s’engage à être le partenaire technologique de confiance des entreprises souhaitant accélérer leur transformation numérique en toute sécurité."

name: CBX ACADEMY
description:
CBX Group operates in three key areas: consulting, training, and research & development. Our mission is to support companies in their digital transformation with innovative, AI-centered solutions.

CBX Academy offers cutting-edge training to meet market needs. Our immersive approach prepares talents to quickly integrate into companies, reducing contract gaps for IT services companies. We also provide executive programs on digitalization and AI for business leaders.

Our programs: DevOps, IT Architecture, Big Data, Dev AI and Immutable Infrastructure.

CBX R&D develops 100% AI-powered solutions for sectors such as finance and HR. Our products include: JobBoard AI, CBX Agent, and RH AI.

CBX Group provides companies with the tools and expertise needed to thrive in a constantly evolving digital world.

name: CISCO
description: Cisco is the worldwide technology leader that is revolutionizing the way organizations connect and protect in the AI era. For more than 40 years, Cisco has securely connected the world. With its industry leading AI-powered solutions and services, Cisco enables its customers, partners and communities to unlock innovation, enhance productivity and strengthen digital resilience. With purpose at its core, Cisco remains committed to creating a more connected and inclusive future for all.

name: CitizOn
description:
CitizOn is a digital audio guide platform designed for urban exploration, offering self-guided tours of Moroccan cities. The web app provides structured itineraries with GPS navigation, allowing users to explore at their own pace while listening to expert commentary.

Focusing on architectural and cultural heritage, CitizOn currently covers Casablanca, with plans to expand to Marrakech, Tangier, Fez... Each tour includes historical context, urban evolution, and key landmarks, making local heritage more accessible to visitors and residents alike.

Designed for individual travelers, groups, and professionals in tourism and culture, the platform provides an alternative to traditional guided tours. Its format enables users to discover cities independently while benefiting from curated content.

CitizOn combines digital tools with cultural storytelling, adapting to modern tourism trends and making urban heritage exploration more engaging and accessible.

name: CLAIM
description: CLAIM is an innovative platform dedicated to bridging the gap between education and employment in Africa. We offer tailored online courses designed to meet the evolving needs of learners and align with market demands, ensuring they acquire relevant, in-demand skills. Our platform connects learners to job opportunities through career support and a network of employer partnerships, reducing unemployment rates. We provide personalized career coaching, job matching, and curated training in high-demand fields. With an accessible, mobile-friendly design, CLAIM offers flexible learning experiences anytime, anywhere. By facilitating a seamless transition from education to employment, we empower individuals to unlock their full potential while meeting the workforce needs of businesses across Africa.

name: CITRIX
description: MiCloudSW Ltd. (an Affiliate of Midis Group) is Cloud Software Group’s Strategic Partner for the majority of Africa, Eastern Europe and Middle East. A leading technology partner providing managed IT services and consultancy, system integration, cloud and data center capabilities, infrastructure, software, and hardware solutions, the Midis Group serves customers through a network of 170 companies across 70 countries. This expansive network, coupled with the in-territory skills and support infrastructure within the Midis Group, will ensure partners and customers get the backing needed to define and implement superior technology deployments. Regional resellers and distributors in these territories will get fast and easy access to their Cloud Software Group products (the majority of the Citrix and TIBCO solutions), through MiCloudSW, benefiting from its extensive local market knowledge, expertise, and in-country resources.

name: ClearTrail Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description: ClearTrail Technologies is a 23-year-old company focused on creating powerful intelligence and investigation technologies for federal and state level security agencies globally. Their suite of solutions is deployed across 15 countries, enabling security agencies to understand cyber threats through communication data interception, data integration and advanced data analytics by leveraging artificial intelligence models on big data.

name: Click Doc
description: Click Doc is an all-in-one medical practice management software designed to simplify healthcare professionals’ daily operations. It integrates advanced features such as teleconsultation, secure lab result sharing, and artificial intelligence to optimize patient management. With its drug interaction analysis module, Click Doc helps doctors prevent risky prescriptions. Available as a SaaS solution or an offline installable version, it adapts to the needs of both independent practitioners and healthcare facilities. Its intuitive interface streamlines appointment scheduling, medical records, and administrative tasks, enhancing care quality and doctor-patient interactions. Operating in Morocco and Senegal, Click Doc aims to revolutionize healthcare digitalization in Africa by offering a modern, reliable, and secure solution for medical professionals.

name: CloudPlexo
description:
CloudPlexo is a leading cloud-native IT and AI consulting firm, delivering innovative solutions across Africa, Europe, and America. As an Advanced AWS Partner, we help businesses adopt cloud strategies that enhance agility, scalability, security, and cost efficiency.

Our expertise spans cloud migration, cost optimization, security, AI-driven analytics, architecture design, and DevOps. We empower enterprises and startups to streamline operations, automate workflows, and optimize IT infrastructure.

With a team of seasoned cloud architects, DevOps engineers, AI specialists, and dedicated Project/Account managers, CloudPlexo delivers tailored solutions that align with business objectives. Committed to innovation and operational excellence, we enable organizations to scale confidently in an evolving digital landscape.

name: ClientX.ai
description: ClientX.ai is an AI-driven voice automation platform that helps businesses qualify leads, handle customer inquiries, and automate routine calls. Our custom-built voice agents speak naturally, understand context, and provide accurate, real-time responses to boost customer experience and productivity. Whether for real estate, education, restaurants or retail, we tailor our agents to each industry’s needs. With fast deployment, seamless CRM integration, and measurable ROI, ClientX.ai is redefining customer interaction in the MENA region and beyond.
sectors: Customer Relationship & Experience Management - CRM & CEM

name: CO-SOLAR
description:
CO-SOLAR is transforming the agricultural landscape with innovative solar drying systems. 
Our solutions combine efficiency, sustainability, and quality to empower businesses and communities in Tunisia and beyond.

-Eco-Friendly Innovation: Harnessing solar energy for sustainable drying solutions.
-Customizable Systems: Adapting to your needs with tailored designs for capacity and functionality.
-Premium Quality: Ensuring optimal drying with protection against dust, insects, and rain.
-Cost-Effective Operations: Delivering economic advantages through hybrid energy solutions.

We envision a future where solar energy transforms agriculture, enabling producers to reduce waste, add value, and scale their operations. CO-SOLAR is dedicated to being a key partner in this journey, delivering reliable, innovative, and sustainable drying systems.
Let’s Collaborate: Join the growing community of agricultural innovators who trust us. Together we can shape a greener more sustainable future.

name: CLOUDFLARE
description:
Cloudflare, Inc. (NYSE: NET) is the leading connectivity cloud company on a mission to help build a better Internet. It empowers organizations to make their employees, applications and networks faster and more secure everywhere, while reducing complexity and cost. Cloudflare’s connectivity cloud delivers the most full-featured, unified platform of cloud-native products and developer tools, so any organization can gain the control they need to work, develop, and accelerate their business. 

Powered by one of the world’s largest and most interconnected networks, Cloudflare blocks billions of threats online for its customers every day. It is trusted by millions of organizations – from the largest brands to entrepreneurs and small businesses to nonprofits, humanitarian groups, and governments across the globe.  

Learn more about Cloudflare’s connectivity cloud at cloudflare.com/connectivity-cloud. Learn more about the latest Internet trends and insights at radar.cloudflare.com.

name: COLIPRO
description:
Colipro est née d'un partenariat entre Sapress, opérateur historique de logistique et messagerie couvrant tout le royaume, et M2T, leader dans les multiservices avec les marques Chaabi Cash et Tasshilat. 
Colipro représente l'association parfaite entre expertise et innovation dans le domaine de la livraison en point relais.
Conscients des défis et des exigences croissantes du marché de la livraison, Colipro s'engage à offrir une solution complète et fiable pour répondre aux besoins variés de ses clients. Colipro se distingue par la proximité et la flexibilité des horaires de son réseau. 
Grâce au partenariat stratégique entre Sapress et M2T, nous sommes en mesure de tirer parti de notre expertise respective pour offrir un service inégalé sur le marché.
Notre vision chez Colipro est de simplifier et d'améliorer l'expérience d'envoi de colis pour nos clients, en leur offrant des solutions pratiques, efficaces et économiques.

name: Colibghiti
description:
Colibghiti is a women-led social enterprise in Morocco, revolutionizing food waste management through innovative technology. Our digital platform connects food donors with beneficiaries, ensuring surplus food is efficiently redistributed while reducing CO? emissions. By optimizing logistics and data tracking, we minimize waste, lower carbon footprints, and enhance food security.
Imagine turning waste into hope — every kilogram of food saved reduces greenhouse gas emissions, transforming potential loss into tangible social and environmental value. Our model is scalable, transparent, and accountable, combining logistics expertise with a deep understanding of local needs.
Colibghiti is more than a service; it's a movement for a sustainable, inclusive future. Join us to make a real difference — for people, for the planet.
#TechForGood #FoodWasteReduction #CO2Impact

name: Coldbox Store
description:
Manamuz Electric is a Nigerian business that is headquartered in Enugu State, Nigeria and advances the productive use of Renewable Energy for Agriculture productivity. The company was founded in 2016 as a solar installation company and in 2021, pivoted to developing and operating solar powered cold chain infrastructure for Agriculture. 

Through the Coldbox Store (www.coldboxstore.com) Project, Manamuz Electric develops a decentralized network of Refrigerated aggregation centers,  powered by offgrid solar which offers a productivity first approach to  energy and food security

name: Codeit softwares limited
description:
Codeit Softwares Ltd. is a multi-skilled software service provider with a highly competent workforce and across the globe presence. With years of perfected expertise in cross-platform skills and quality-integrated methodologies, Codeit adopts a competent global delivery model in providing value-based solutions as well as professional services to clients worldwide.

What makes us unique is our ability to help clients meet both challenges. We help them enhance productivity by ensuring that vital business functions work faster, cheaper and better. And, our ability to conceptualize, architect and implement new and expanded capabilities allows clients to transform legacy models to take their business to the next level.

name: COHESITY
description: Cohesity is the leader in AI-powered data security. Over 13,600 enterprise customers, including over 85 of the Fortune 100 and nearly 70% of the Global 500, rely on Cohesity to strengthen their resilience while providing Gen AI insights into their vast amounts of data. Formed from the combination of Cohesity with Veritas’ enterprise data protection business, the company’s solutions secure and protect data on-premises, in the cloud, and at the edge. Backed by NVIDIA, IBM, HPE, Cisco, AWS, Google Cloud, and others, Cohesity is headquartered in Santa Clara, CA, with offices around the globe. To learn more, follow Cohesity on LinkedIn, X, and Facebook.

name: Colis.ma
description: Colis.ma is a logistics startup that serves as a vital link, connecting individuals and SMEs in Morocco with international transporters spanning +6 European countries. Our platform facilitates seamless cross-border logistics, bridging continents and enabling efficient shipping. At Colis.ma, we provide a comprehensive logistics solution, benefiting both our transporter partners (TMS) and clients (mobile and web platform), ensuring a reliable and optimized experience for all.

name: Commvault
description: Commvault (NASDAQ: CVLT) is the gold standard in cyber resilience. The company empowers customers to uncover, take action, and rapidly recover from cyberattacks – keeping data safe and businesses resilient. The company’s unique AI-powered platform combines best-in-class data protection, exceptional data security, advanced data intelligence, and lightning-fast recovery across any workload or cloud at the lowest TCO. For over 25 years, more than 100,000 organizations and a vast partner ecosystem have relied on Commvault to reduce risks, improve governance, and do more with data.

name: Concentrix
description:
Concentrix is a global leader in AI-powered customer experience solutions, providing a range of services that help businesses enhance their customer engagement and drive growth. We specialize in business process outsourcing (BPO), delivering services that include CX management, analytics and insights, technology, and consulting. Our solutions are designed to create seamless interactions across channels, ensuring consistent and personalized customer experiences.

Concentrix's consulting services leverage digital capabilities to innovate and optimize business processes, adapting to the evolving digital landscape. Our portfolio includes GenAI solutions like iX Hello, alongside predictive analytics and data management services, delivering real-time insights for strategic decision-making. Our 'Design, Build, Run' approach ensures long-term success and scalability, promoting ongoing operational excellence and brand loyalty.

name: Connect Financial Services
description: CONNECT is Your comprehensive API for African financial expansion. Empowering fintechs & e-commerce with a unified platform, simplifying access to diverse financial services. One integration unlocks: robust KYC, seamless local & global payments (bank, cash, mobile, cards), multi-currency business & individual wallets, virtual cards, bill payments, and international remittances. CONNECT revolutionizes African payments, streamlining merchant collections, bulk disbursements, and inbound remittances with secure, integrated local rails. International merchants benefit from swift, secure settlements in USD, EUR, GBP, or preferred currencies. We provide a secure, scalable platform, enabling businesses to effortlessly launch and expand their financial offerings across Africa's dynamic market.

name: CONNECT SCREEN
description:
Since our establishment in 2014, our company has been committed to providing innovative collaborative solutions, including interactive displays, connection dongles, cameras, and a range of accessories tailored to modern needs. We have built a strong network of resellers and distributors across various countries, and we are continuously looking for reliable partners, especially in African countries, to enhance our influence on the continent.

We take pride in equipping an increasing number of educational institutions as well as businesses, delivering customized solutions to improve communication and collaboration. In Morocco, our partnership with Digital allows us to strengthen our market presence, with recent achievements in prestigious locations such as the Casablanca Medical Center, the Royal Mansour in Marrakech, and facilities in Tamuda Bay. We are ready to support our partners in specific projects and implement targeted marketing strategies to ensure their success.

name: Corning Optical Communications
description:
Corning Optical Communications is part of Corning Incorporated, a leading innovator in materials science. Our invention of the first low-loss optical fibre, over fifty years ago, ignited the critical spark that began a communications revolution across the world. Now, our optical connectivity solutions are delivering high-quality broadband capabilities across the enterprise, carrier, and wireless markets, as well as the expanding frontier of consumer electronic devices. With demand for bandwidth skyrocketing as network usage proliferates and new technologies develop, Corning is responding with innovations for fibre to the premise (FTTP), wireless technology, in-building networks and data centres.  

https://www.corning.com/emea/en/products/communication-networks/products.html

name: COROSOLS
description:
COROSOLS is developing an AI-powered BIM Layout Printing Robot to revolutionize construction efficiency. The solution tackles major financial, energy, and material losses caused by rework, which costs the Moroccan construction industry over $2.5 billion annually. Our goal is to cut rework by more than 50% and boost productivity by over 300%, driving energy efficiency and sustainability.

Our core activities include supporting large-scale construction firms (such as JESA, TGCC, SGTM, etc.) in optimizing BIM models for printing, accurately transferring BIM layouts onto the field with millimeter precision using our robots, and generating detailed reports with insights into the printing process.

name: Credify Africa
description:
Credify Africa Inc. is revolutionizing global trade for African importers through an end-to-end supply chain platform. We simplify logistics, provide trade financing, and offer real-time shipment tracking, ensuring seamless cross-border transactions. Our mission is to break trade barriers, making global markets accessible to African businesses of all sizes.

With our platform, importers can book, ship, finance, and track shipments effortlessly. We offer innovative trade finance solutions, helping businesses secure capital, optimize cash flow, and mitigate risks. Our expertise in customs processes, supply chain finance, and business analytics ensures that SMEs and enterprises can trade confidently and efficiently.

At Credify, we are committed to transparency, efficiency, and customer success. By offering flexible financing, eliminating trade complexities, and ensuring timely deliveries, we empower African businesses to compete on a global scale and achieve sustainable growth.

name: CPX HOLDING L.L.C.
description: CPX delivers transformative cyber and physical security solutions that safeguard digital landscapes and empower communities to thrive in a rapidly evolving world.

name: CRIF SpA
description: CRIF is a global company specializing in credit bureau reporting & business information systems, analytics, outsourcing, and processing services, as well as advanced digital solutions for business development and open banking.

name: Crossware
description: Crossware Email Signature is the premier global solution for professional and consistent email signatures, compatible with a wide range of platforms including Microsoft 365 (previously known as Office 365), Google WorkSpace, Microsoft Exchange, and HCL Domino. Recognised for its excellence and versatility, this powerful software enables businesses of all sizes to design, manage, and implement cohesive email signatures across various devices and email clients. Crossware Email Signature is committed to maintaining the highest level of security and data protection. With strict adherence to industry standards and best practices, your company's data remains safe and secure at all times.

name: Crop2Cash
description:
Crop2Cash revolutionizes African agriculture through AI-driven financial inclusion and knowledge access. Our USSD and Voice platform works on basic mobile phones, overcoming connectivity barriers in rural areas.

Our credit scoring system analyzes farming practices and alternative data points to enable loans for previously "unbankable" farmers without traditional collateral. Our AI agricultural advisory service processes natural language queries in multiple local languages, delivering personalized farming guidance 24/7.

Since launch, we've onboarded 500,000 farmers across Nigeria and Kenya, facilitated $3 million in loans, and generated $1.5 million in revenue. Farmers using our platform have seen average income increases of 70%. 

Backed by investors including Google Black Founders Fund, Katapult Africa and Village Capital, we're expanding to 10 countries within 12 months, making African agriculture more profitable and sustainable through accessible AI-powered solutions.

name: Cryptr
description: Cryptr is a plug-and-play B2B authentication platform built for SaaS companies.?In just a few lines of code, you can deploy and manage all your authentication strategies: Single Sign-On (SSO), Directory Sync, TOTP, Magic Link, and more, while meeting the security and UX standards expected by enterprise customers.
sectors: Authentication User, Biometric Authentication and PKI

name: Cudy
description:
Cudy is a tech-driven company in the networking & telecommunication industry, providing reliable networking solutions to consumers, small-medium enterprises, and Internet service providers. Established in the year 2018 and headquartered in Shenzhen, Cudy strives to provide worldwide users with "Cool", "Unique" and "Distinctive" products covering Wi-Fi routers, Mesh systems, 4G/5G routers, PoE, switches, business Wi-Fi, and outdoor/industrial networking equipment.

When our sharing and exchanging natures clash with the digital barriers, Cudy pledges to make high-performance yet easy-to-use communication technology to help people experience extraordinary and purposeful daily lives. "Create Unique Everyday" is a motto that encourages Cudy to deliver innovation everyday.

name: CSU/HAYO
description:
CSU, with its trademark, HAYO, has implemented the necessary means to achieve the goals of its specifications thanks to a GSM network and access to Internet with high-speed connectivity.
In order to meet a strong need for communication between families and the Senegalese diaspora, the operator has put into service a VoIP telephony application, Hayo App, available on the various stores.
Hayo APP allows users to make phone calls and thus stay in touch with their loved ones at affordable prices. It also has a world wide coverage

name: Cybervergent Limited
description:
Cybervergent is a cybersecurity technology company building the future of digital trust and safety. We enable businesses and organizations to manage cybersecurity, privacy, risk, and governance across digital ecosystems. Our use of technology and automation simplifies safeguarding businesses' assets and offers a diverse range of comprehensive solutions at a large scale.

Cybervergent delivers cybersecurity solutions through its AI-native platform, Datavergent. Datavergent is a comprehensive solution to enhance organizations' data security, compliance, risk, and privacy management. With both on-premises and cloud capabilities, it seamlessly integrates with third-party APIs, platforms, and systems. Features include the Trust platform, Assist, Monitor, Footprint, and Flow.

Our business operations are certified to the global standards in security and privacy to instil confidence in our customers that span all four major geographic zones in Africa

name: Cyber Sqool
description:
Cyber Sqool is an educational platform that teaches kids (4–16), parents, and schools how to stay safe online using animation, storytelling, and games. We make cybersecurity simple and fun through our products:

Cyber Kid: Superhero series for ages 7–16

Cyber Jungle: Animal adventures for ages 4–7

Cyber Family: Real-life scenarios for parents

Cyber Day: School events with group games and digital safety lessons

We offer monthly subscriptions for families and custom programs for schools. Our goal: help every child grow up cyber-smart in a digital world.

Launched in Morocco, expanding to the MENA region and beyond.

cybersqool.com | contact@cybersqool.com

name: CYBRID THRUST
description:
Cybrid Thrust is a young deep tech company, with specialist expertise in systems with autonomous functions, advanced robotics, and sensors. We solve the most challenging issues with innovative and out-of-the box thinking.
Cybrid Thrust helps organisations to qualify, integrate, and deliver turnkey solutions based on cutting edge technology. We generate actionable and meaningful insights to enhance our customers’ vision and contribute to safely achieve their digital transformation.

name: Cynoia
description: Cynoia is an African-built, all-in-one collaboration platform that brings together project management, team chat, video calls, shared calendars, and notes in a single workspace. Built for low-bandwidth environments and available in both French and English, Cynoia helps teams reduce tool overload, cut costs, and stay aligned whether working remotely or on-site. Already used by SMEs, startups, and institutions across Senegal, Tunisia, France, and beyond, Cynoia now integrates AI to boost productivity with smart task suggestions, meeting summaries, and intelligent scheduling. We offer affordable, scalable solutions tailored to the realities of African businesses. Our mission is to empower teams with accessible, locally-relevant technology and become the leading work platform made in Africa, for Africa.

name: Cypherleak
description: Cypherleak allows organisations to have full visibility on their leaked credentials, dark web exposure, attack surface, and vulnerabilities affecting their internet exposed assets, which is key in understanding how a hacker can target their entity. Using AI, Cypherleak both generates advanced risk models and scores, alongside customized recommendations and remediations actions for the customer.

name: DABAN TECH (SARLAU)
description:
inDrive is a global mobility and urban services platform. The inDrive app has been downloaded over 280 million times, and has been the second most downloaded mobility app for the third consecutive year. In addition to ride-hailing, inDrive provides an expanding list of urban services, including intercity transportation and delivery. In 2023, inDrive launched New Ventures, a venture and M&A arm.

inDrive operates in 888 cities in 48 countries. Driven by its mission of challenging social injustice, the company is committed to having a positive impact on the lives of one billion people by 2030. It pursues this goal both through its core business, which supports local communities through its signature fair pricing model as well as through its non-profit arm. inDrive’s community empowerment programs help to advance education, sports, arts and sciences, gender equality and other vital initiatives.

name: DamaneSign
description: Damanesign est un Prestataire de Services de Confiance agrée par la DGSSI qui offre des solutions de confiance, souveraines et sécurisées dans le but de répondre à la fois aux besoins des organismes à la recherche de moyens digitalisés pour finaliser les processus contractuels et aux besoins des utilisateurs en recherche de supports électroniques rapides et sécurisés?, conformément à la Loi n°43-20.

name: Dashy
description: Dashy turns WhatsApp into a powerful business engine, enabling businesses to sell, manage orders, and process payments, all in one place. In emerging markets, where WhatsApp is the primary communication tool for businesses and customers, Dashy enhances its potential by bringing everything together in a single, intuitive platform. Businesses can seamlessly handle customer interactions, orders, and payments without switching between multiple tools. With DashyPay, our SoftPOS solution, they can accept secure card payments directly on a smartphone, eliminating the need for extra hardware. Meanwhile, our AI-powered DataSmart provides real-time insights, helping businesses track sales, understand customer behavior, and make informed decisions. Whether responding to inquiries, confirming orders, or collecting payments, Dashy streamlines every step, making business operations faster, more efficient, and fully optimized for growth.

name: Datamellon
description:
Datamellon empowers businesses with innovative solutions in AI, cloud and data. As a leader in AI, Cloud and Data development, we are dedicated to driving business growth through cutting-edge technology and data-driven strategies. 

Our commitment is to help clients unlock new opportunities, streamline operations, and innovate continuously.

name: Datadog
description: Datadog is an observability and security platform that unifies metrics, traces, logs, security signals, and other telemetry data across your stack into a single pane of glass. Observe any stack at any scale, secure applications from code to cloud, and act faster with automated workflows all on the Datadog platform.

name: DataGreen
description:
The exponential demand for computing and storage brings major challenges:
• Energy consumption
• Land shortages
• Ecological impact
• Digital sovereignty
• Retrofitting existing, high-energy, polluting data centers.

At DataGreen, we tackle these with breakthrough innovations, after 5 years of R&D by an international team based in Nice (France), awarded at CES 2025 and by Dassault Systèmes, backed by 3 patents:
• Efficient Chip Cooling: Ultra-high-performance cooling, close to the chip, without water tanks.
• IP67 Sealed Servers: Waterproof, dust-free, no A/C needed.
• 98% Heat Recovery: Reused for heating or cooling.
We retrofit data centers for sustainable transformation.

Our turnkey, in-house data centers are:
? A/C-free
? Dust-free
? Water-free
? Miniaturized
? 100% sovereign & confidential
? AI-integrated & decentralized
With DataGreen, we build efficient, sustainable, sovereign data centers—shaping the future today.

name: DATAPROTECT
description: DATAPROTECT is a leading cybersecurity firm specializing in risk management, compliance, and cyber resilience. With a strong presence in Africa and beyond, we provide cutting-edge solutions to help organizations protect their digital assets, mitigate cyber threats, and ensure regulatory compliance. Our expertise spans security audits, SOC implementation, cloud security, and digital trust services, making us a trusted partner for financial institutions, enterprises, and government entities.

name: DataScientist.fr
description:
DataScientist.fr revolutionizes online learning through its innovative, interactive, and personalized training platform dedicated to artificial intelligence, data science, and Microsoft azure certifications. 

Our advanced, browser-based coding environment enables real-time coding practice, immediate feedback, and continuous learning support through a 24/7 AI assistant powered by our agent.

We offer an extensive selection of intensive bootcamps, official Microsoft certification pathways, and targeted short courses in cutting edge fields like generative AI. All our trainings includes live sessions with leading industry professionals, delivering hands-on experience, practical insights, and personalized mentorship.

With over 7,000 learners across France and Africa, DataScientist.fr leads Francophone tech education, certifying 500+ professionals in Microsoft technologies. Our 92% completion rate and 4.8 satisfaction rating from 250+ reviews highlight our impactful training.

name: Dataware Tech
description: Dataware Tech is a leader in data analytics solutions, offering cutting-edge tools and services that enable organizations to harness the full potential of their data. From predictive modeling to real-time analytics, we deliver customized solutions tailored to meet the unique needs of our clients across industries. Our mission is simple: to help businesses turn data into a strategic asset. With a focus on innovation, precision, and impact, we provide our partners with the clarity they need to make smarter, faster, and more confident decisions.

name: Dawnergy
description:
Dawnergy is an ISO qualified fiber optic solution provider. With solid production capacity, leading R&D strength and strong customization capabilities, we have supplied fiber optic products to over 69 countries around the world.

Our main products are: Fiber Optic Cables, Fiber Optical Splitters, Patch Cord, Pigtails, Fiber Distribution Boxes, Fiber Optic Sockets, Optical Distribution Cabinets/Hubs, and Outdoor Telecom Cabinets, etc. Our shareholders have a large market share in the centralized procurement of China Telecom, China Mobile, China Unicom and China Tower. And we are also a qualified supplier for globally renowned equipment manufacturers and OFC manufacturers. Our products are widely used in special networks such as radio broadcast, television, electric power and military.

Through direct supply, partnership with distributors, or cooperation with communication solution providers, our products have been widely used in the FTTH networks of main international operators.

name: DBS GROUP
description:
DBS GROUP IS A LOGITECH STARTUP SPECIALIZING IN INTERNATIONAL FREIGHT TRANSPORT
DBS OFFERS A LOGISTIC PLATFORM TO SEND GOODS THROUGH An APP ALLOWING SHIPPERS TO OPTIMIZE THEIR LOGISTICS COSTS.
4 advantages of our App:

1- Simulation of online rates
Our customers can simulate the transport rate of their package and or document.

2- Track your package in real time
In a few clicks, our platform allows shippers of all sizes, VSEs/SMEs to track their shipments in real time from your smartphone or our platform.

3- Schedule a delivery or pick-up
Schedule a delivery or pick-up
we offer our customers the opportunity to be able to send their package/document without moving. Customer experience is one of the key values at DBS Group

name: Deepleaf
description:
DeepLeaf is an AI-driven agritech company transforming crop health monitoring. Our technology detects over 700 crop diseases, pests, and nutrient deficiencies with 96% accuracy by analyzing a single image of an infected leaf or fruit. We empower farmers with early disease detection, optimized pesticide use, and improved yields, reducing food loss and enhancing agricultural sustainability.

Our Mission
To revolutionize agriculture with AI-powered crop diagnostics, enabling farmers to minimize losses, maximize productivity, and meet global export standards while promoting sustainable and data-driven farming.

name: DealDox Software - CRM CPQ CLM
description: DealDox, founded in 2024 and headquartered in Bangalore, India, is a trailblazing AI-powered CPQ (Configure, Price, Quote) startup revolutionizing pre-sales automation for B2B companies. It specializes in handling complex product and service portfolios, seamlessly integrating with CRM and ERP systems to enable rapid quote generation, personalized proposals, and multilingual document creation. By eliminating manual processes like spreadsheets, DealDox streamlines pricing, approvals, and deal closures, boosting efficiency and ROI. Serving industries such as manufacturing, IT, automotive, construction, engineering, interior design, and healthcare, it counts Geberit Sanitry Products, Utkarsh India - High Mast, Transmission Tower Manufacturer and Marino Group among its clients. In 2024, DealDox secured $43K in seed funding from a Saudi Arabian NRI investor, reaching a $45K post-money valuation. The DealDox application is targeting the $7.96 billion CPQ market by 2031.

name: DEALKHIR DaaS
description:
Dealkhir is a fintech innovator revolutionizing corporate social responsibility through embedded donation solutions. With its ‘Donation-as-a-Service’ (DaaS) model, Dealkhir enables businesses to integrate digital giving into transactions, fostering customer engagement and impact. 
Our API-driven solutions cover multiple giving formats: direct donations, round-ups, and corporate-funded contributions. 
These solutions are designed for seamless integration into e-commerce, retail, and financial services. 
Additionally, we provide corporate giving platforms for HR & CSR teams to mobilize employees around meaningful causes. 
By leveraging cutting-edge financial technologies, we ensure secure, transparent, and seamless charitable giving experiences. 
Our missions : 
1. Transform everyday transactions into opportunities for social impact.
2. Help companies align business success with purpose and generosity.

name: deeplinq
description: Deeplinq is an AI-powered enterprise platform that transforms scattered, complex data into intelligent, actionable services. Built to streamline business operations, Deeplinq connects to existing systems (ERP, CRM, PABX, IoT, etc.) and offers a growing catalog of ready-to-use AI services for finance, HR, procurement, customer support, and more. Its middleware layer (MCP) ensures secure, seamless integration with full deployment flexibility—cloud or on-premise. Deeplinq also powers DeepDiligence, an APSP-type solution for advanced data fusion, detection, and automated decision-making in high-stakes environments such as defense, surveillance, and compliance. With a modular architecture enriched by LLMs and knowledge graphs, Deeplinq empowers teams to automate processes, enhance insights, and collaborate across complex ecosystems.

name: DeepSource
description: Welcome to DeepSource, your premier partner for comprehensive IT and AI services.  At DeepSource, we excel in connecting businesses with top-tier multilingual talent, specializing in Information Technology and Artificial Intelligence. Our expertise lies in sourcing highly skilled professionals and providing tailored talent solutions that enable companies to accelerate growth, drive innovation, and embrace digital transformation.  As your trusted partner, DeepSource empowers you to find the right talent and harness AI-driven solutions, ensuring your business remains competitive and agile in today’s dynamic digital landscape.

name: Delinea Middle East FZ-LLC
description: Delinea is a pioneer in securing identities through centralized authorization, making organizations more secure by seamlessly governing their interactions across modern enterprise. It applies context and intelligence throughout the identity lifecycle, covering cloud and traditional infrastructure, data, and SaaS applications to eliminate identity-related threats. Delinea uniquely provides intelligent authorization for all identities, allowing precise user identification, appropriate access assignment, interaction monitoring, and swift response to irregularities. The Delinea Platform accelerates adoption and boosts productivity, deploying in weeks, not months, requiring just 10% of the resources compared to competitors.

name: Defendis
description:
Defendis is a cybersecurity startup specialising in Dark Web Monitoring for banks, businesses, and government agencies. We provide advanced data leak insights to help organisations proactively identify and mitigate security threats before they lead to financial and reputational damage.

Our platform continuously monitors dark web marketplaces, forums, and hidden channels for exposed information, giving you a 360° view of all exposed data linked to your employees, customers, or partners:
- Identify leaked credentials along with insights into how the leak occurred.
- Monitor for issued payment cards exposed on the dark web and at risk of fraudulent transactions.
- Detect and analyse leaks involving confidential business information, trade secrets, and intellectual property.

Our mission is to empower organisations with cutting-edge cybersecurity solutions to adapt to the threat landscape and regulatory requirements.

name: delaware
description:
delaware est un intégrateur SAP Platinum, comptant plus de 5000 professionnels à travers 37 bureaux dans 19 pays, avec un chiffre d'affaires de 600 millions d'euros.
Nous sommes une entreprise internationale spécialisée dans les solutions et services TIC avancés, aidant nos clients à réussir leurs transformations commerciales et numériques.

name: Deloitte Morocco Cyber Center
description:
Deloitte Morocco Cyber Center (DMCC), inaugurated on February 22, 2023, is a leading cybersecurity hub located in Casablanca Finance City. As the sixth center of its kind globally, it plays a crucial role in enhancing cybersecurity capabilities in Morocco and across Africa.

Spanning 2,000 square meters over four levels, DMCC is equipped with cutting-edge technologies and a team of 100 cybersecurity engineers, with plans to expand significantly by 2025. The center provides innovative and strategic cybersecurity solutions tailored to businesses, financial institutions, and government entities.

Its services include threat monitoring, diagnostics, consulting, and the implementation of robust cybersecurity strategies to address the increasing demand for cyber resilience and regulatory compliance. By combining local expertise with Deloitte’s global knowledge, DMCC helps organizations secure their digital assets and navigate evolving cyber threats.

name: DIGI FIRM
description: DIGI FIRM specializes in business digitalization through innovative technological solutions. Our flagship product, DIGI-RETAIL, is a modular ERP designed for the retail sector, enabling efficient management of inventory, sales, purchases, and invoicing. We also integrate Business Intelligence (BI) modules to provide real-time analytics and strategic reports, optimizing decision-making. Additionally, AI agents specialized by role (inventory management, sales forecasting, customer service, etc.) automate processes, enhancing productivity and responsiveness. Our mission is to deliver flexible, scalable, and secure solutions tailored to the specific needs of retail, facilitating digital transformation and improving business performance.

name: DEV4SMART
description:
Founded in 2016, Dev4smart is a Nigerien Startup based in Niamey and specialized in custom Software, Website, and Mobile Apps Development. We also offer expertise in Digital Communication and the Integration of Telecom Services, including eRecharge, SMS, USSD, IVR, AI, and Fintech solutions. 

Our mission is to provide innovative and tailored digital solutions to citizens, businesses and institutions, helping them enhance efficiency and achieve their goals.

Beyond software development, Dev4smart is a trusted integrator of network solutions, voice-over IP (VoIP), and IT infrastructure, including servers, storage, LAN/WAN networks, workstations, IPBX, and PABX. Our team ensures seamless implementation and reliable support.

Since 2018, we have emerged as a dynamic and dependable technology partner for both national and international organizations, fostering digital transformation across industries and strengthening connectivity through cutting-edge innovations.

name: Delta Oil
description: Delta Oil is a cleantech platform that connects households and businesses with sustainable waste management solutions. Through our technology-driven platform, users can trade used cooking oil for fresh oil or cash, ensuring proper disposal while creating economic opportunities. We collect, process, and supply waste oil to biodiesel refineries in Europe, contributing to a circular economy. Our integrated model serves both B2B and B2C markets, offering a seamless experience for waste collection and fresh oil procurement. By leveraging technology and data, we optimize logistics, enhance traceability, and drive environmental impact at scale.

name: DigDash
description:
DigDash supports over 500 customers in data management, exploration, and communication projects, ensuring complete data sovereignty. This French publisher offers an agnostic, intuitive, and high-performance platform accessible on all devices. 
Its founders aim to democratize data access, particularly for non-experts. Designed to meet business needs, DigDash enhances user autonomy while guaranteeing data security and freedom in technology and infrastructure for informed decision-making.
Pilot: Key indicators at a glance for quick, informed decision-making.
Exploration: Interactive graphs and tables for teams to dive into data autonomously.
Communication: Clear, documented visuals to share insights with non-expert audiences.
Ambitions & Values: Simplify maintenance with a unified semantic layer, deliver lightning-fast analytics on billions of rows, and ensure data security with independent, proprietary-free technology and French hosting.

name: DIGIMATE
description:
DIGIMATE distribute many brands in North Africa ( Morocco - Algeria & Tunisia ) :
 - LENOVO - HP - ASUS - CANON - TOSHIBA - AMD- LEXAR - TEAMGROUP - VERBATIM - ZOTAC - BIOSTAR - HYBROK- LEADER TV - BENQ - LG -

name: DIGILEO
description:
Building and delivering high-trust digital products and services for citizens, enterprises and Trust Service Providers (TSP). 
We provides high-trust e-security products focusing on :
- Digital signatures
- Digital seals
- Timestamps
- Public Key Infrastructure
- Digital Wallet

DIGILEO delivers a complete eSignature solution enabling organisations to workflow documents for digital signature approval.  When integrated into core business applications or used standalone, DIGILEO eSign optimises how internal and external users can review, approve and sign documents at any time on any device.

name: DIGIN FACTORY
description:
DIGIN FACTORY is a Cloud and Software development and integration company based in Abidjan, Ivory Coast and specialized in the development of Web and Mobile Apps, the digitalization of services and the integration of Cloud solutions.
For more information, please email us at info@diginfctory.com or visit our website on https://www.diginfactory.com

name: Digital 54ND
description:
Digital Sand is redefining RegTech with a solution tailored to the complex needs of the financial sector. Leveraging our unique “All Star App” approach, we combine our in-house RegTech technology with a curated ecosystem of startups and partners to deliver a complete, modular, and interoperable platform.
Our RegTech low code / no code platform enables automation of regulatory controls, centralized reporting, full data traceability, and adaptability to evolving regulatory requirements.
Backed by shared technical expertise and an agile architecture, Digital Sand ensures rapid delivery, strong security, and ongoing compliance—while reducing project time and cost. We empower institutions to meet regulatory demands with confidence, efficiency, and innovation.

name: Digiparc
description: Digiparc, based in Rabat, Morocco, provides a leading vertical ERP solution focused on fleet management, transportation, and geolocation. With over 18 years of experience, it serves in industries like transportation, construction, and retail. Its cloud-based platform features 20+ modules, including cost management, fuel tracking, maintenance (CMMS), telematics, and CRM. Fully web-based, it offers real-time fleet monitoring, GPS tracking, geofencing, and driver behavior analysis to enhance efficiency and reduce costs. Hosted on secure, high-availability servers, Digiparc ensures data safety and scalability. Tailored to each business’s needs, it minimizes downtime, extends vehicle life, and optimizes TCO. Regular updates, included at no extra cost, keep the platform cutting-edge. Digiparc empowers companies to streamline operations and boost productivity with data-driven insights and a user-friendly interface, making it a trusted partner for operational excellence.

name: DIGITAL VIRGO
description:
Digital Virgo Group is a key partner of Telecom Operators worldwide, specializing in payment solutions & monetization strategies. Its suite of solutions is made of a robust payment management platform and a portfolio of trendy and high-value services across various verticals including Entertainment, Education, TV, Video on Demand, Music, Esports, and Gaming. It also provides dedicated solutions to boost Carrier Billing usage with digital tickets, SMS donations and interactivity programs.
 
With operations in over 50 countries and generating €400+ million in revenue per year, its dedicated team of 800+ experts reflects its commitment to operational efficiency. Digital Virgo Group maintains trusted partnerships with over 150 Carriers and more than 300 Merchants, emphasizing its extensive reach and impact.

name: Digital Africa
description:
Digital Africa empowers African tech startups by offering funding, tailored hands-on support, capacity-building, and access to key networks.

We accelerate high-impact innovations that address local challenges and drive inclusive growth. Through initiatives like Fuzé, our Platform support offering and Talent 4 Startups, we support entrepreneurs in navigating market challenges and scaling their solutions.

Our ecosystem fosters collaboration between investors, policymakers, and innovators to create a thriving digital economy in Africa.

By providing strategic guidance and financial support, Digital Africa ensures that homegrown innovations contribute to sustainable development across the continent.

name: DIMO Maint
description:
A subsidiary of DIMO Software, DIMO Maint has specialised in publishing maintenance management software for 30 years. With 2,200 clients worldwide and its locations in Toronto, Mexico, Munich, Paris, Lyon, Nantes and Kuala Lumpur, DIMO Maint is positioned today as a major player on the new generation cloud and on-premise CMMS solutions market.  
DIMO Maint supports the digital transformation of maintenance departments within organisations from SMEs to key international accounts in all business sectors (industry, energy, environment, healthcare, mines, quarries, public works, hotels, services, etc.)
ISO27001 certified, scalable, user-friendly and easy to deploy, DIMO Maint’s CMMS solutions simplify and secure maintenance teams’ everyday lives. They are interoperable and facilitate communications within and between departments.

name: Econocom
description:
Since its inception 50 years ago, the Econocom group has been a pioneer in creating solutions to support the digital transformation of companies and public bodies.
Econocom supplies, finances and provides managed services for workplace, audiovisual and infrastructures. 
This includes equipment purchasing, configuration and customization, maintenance and repair, refurbishment and end-user support.

Operating in 16 countries with over 8,450 employees, Econocom achieved €2.744 billion in revenue in 2024. 
The group is listed on Euronext Brussels and is part of the Tech Leaders, Bel Small, and Family Business indices.

name: Echo
description:
Echo is a next-generation networking platform designed to create meaningful real-life connections through shared interests, curated events, and interactive experiences. Unlike traditional social media or dating apps, Echo focuses on personal growth, authentic interactions, and building valuable relationships.

Echo fosters an exclusive and prestigious environment where being a member is a mark of distinction. With multi-language support, AI-driven matchmaking, and data-driven insights, Echo redefines modern networking, ensuring every interaction is meaningful and impactful.

name: EDCH
description:
Since 1994, EDCH has been a trusted and reliable Mobile Solutions provider to Operators worldwide. Designed as per the GSMA standards, the EDCH suite of products enables mobile operators to offer a high quality and seamless customer experience to its subscribers.

EDCH enables mobile operators to enhance their revenues while reducing operational costs by offering comprehensive solutions in the areas of Roaming, SIM, eSIM, Messaging,Fintech  and eHealth solutions among other customized value-added services.

EDCH’s Headquarters is in Dubai, United Arab Emirates, with sales presence all over the globe including Canada, USA, Nigeria, DR Congo, Argentina, Sri Lanka, Turkey and India. Having achieved certifications such as ISO 27001: 2013 and ISO 9001: 2015. EDCH always takes necessary steps to protect sensitive Data in compliance with Data Privacy.

name: Ecowatt Morocco
description: Ecowatt is a Moroccan company based in the Souss Massa region, specialized in sustainable energy solutions, solar energy, industrial electricity, and hydraulics. It offers a range of solar products and services, including professional installation, expert technical studies, and real-time maintenance. Ecowatt is committed to driving the energy transition by providing innovative solutions that improve user experience through digital solutions such as our E-shop website and mobile appliaction. Ecowatt Morocoo offers also the calculation note, injection simulator, and pompage simulator tools to optimize energy consumption. and ensure effective and sustainable practices.
sectors: Components for Equipment for Energy Storage Systems

description: EF Group est une société spécialisée dans la commercialisation de matériels et consommables informatiques, l'intégration des technologies de l'information et de la communication dans l'enseignement et déploiement de technologie d'affichage interactif. Elle propose, outre l'installation et le paramétrage, des solutions clé en main et un accompagnement technique personnalisé et adapté aux besoins de chacun de ses clients.

name: Ederest
description:
Ederest is an AI-powered learning platform that transforms how people learn complex enterprise software. Using only screenshots, we create real-world interactive simulations without the need for software licenses or installations.
 
Our platform personalizes each learning path with adaptive AI, making training faster, more engaging, and practical.

Companies use Ederest to reduce training costs by up to 80 percent, accelerate software adoption, and increase productivity. With features like gamification, KPI tracking, and virtual machine integration, we deliver hands-on training experiences aligned with real business workflows.

For individuals, our freemium model offers access to practical training and certification, making professional upskilling more accessible across Africa and beyond.

Trusted by major organizations and growing across the EMEA and GCC regions, Ederest is redefining software learning to be faster, smarter, and more accessible.

name: Elcimai Software and Services
description:
Elcimaï Software and Services is a subsidiary of the Elcimaï Group, a 380 headcount French Engineering company.

We provide IT Services and software development capabilities to bank, insurances, and other fintech actors.  

At the core of our product offering lies WeBank, a digital, white-label banking app. WeBank revolutionises the way users and banks interact, providing a secure, easy to use, and performant application to freely access all the e-banking services a customer needs.

WeBank is a modular and evolutive application, allowing it to answer comply with strategic needs be it automatisation and simplificaton of process,

name: EKLEER MOVVI
description:
EKLEER is revolutionizing digital access in emerging markets by transforming smartphones into full-scale workstations. With low PC ownership and limited infrastructure, millions struggle to access education, remote work, and digital services. EKLEER’s affordable 21.5-inch smart display connects seamlessly via USB-C, enabling a desktop experience without expensive hardware. Our MOVVI app, featuring AI-powered multilingual voice support, enhances usability and accessibility.

Africa, India, and Southeast Asia represent a massive opportunity, with over 2.5 billion smartphone users lacking an affordable computing solution. By partnering with telecom operators, EKLEER accelerates market entry while integrating with mobile money platforms to drive financial inclusion. As a first-to-market player, EKLEER’s unique combination of affordability, innovation, and social impact positions it as the leader in bridging the digital divide and unlocking new economic opportunities worldwide.
sectors: Learning management infrastructure, methods and systems

name: Eliotron
description: Eliotron is a SaaS startup transforming e-commerce by equipping sellers and brands of all sizes with AI-driven tools like sales forecasting, competitor benchmarking, omni-channel analytics, and supplier matching. Leveraging these tools, businesses worldwide gain actionable insights to predict trends, optimize strategies, and uncover new opportunities. Eliotron enables e-commerce players to navigate the global market with confidence and achieve success in an ever-evolving industry.
sectors: Data & Analytics - Big Data Analytics & Insights

name: eLimu World
description: eLimu World, an edtech company owned by Co-creation HUB (CcHUB), is a leading innovator in the field of education. We are on a mission to revolutionize learning by offering a comprehensive repository of educational resources designed to transform learning into an engaging adventure. We accomplish this through a blend of interactive games, captivating content, and personalized learning experiences, all aimed at helping children master crucial skills and concepts such as mathematics, science, language, critical thinking, problem-solving, and creativity. Since our inception, we have assisted over 200,000 learners in achieving exceptional educational outcomes, equipping them with the skills necessary for a future dominated by technology.

name: DWEE Healthcare
description: DWEE Healthcare is a Tunisian-Canadian startup dedicated to enhancing mobility and independence for individuals with physical disabilities. Our flagship innovation, the D-Kit, is a lightweight and portable device that automates manual wheelchairs without permanent modifications. Designed for accessibility, it empowers users—especially professionals and students—to maintain active, independent lifestyles. Combining engineering excellence and affordability, DWEE aims to disrupt the assistive technology sector by offering practical and scalable solutions. Currently expanding through partnerships, we are targeting markets in North Africa, Africa, and beyond to make mobility aids more inclusive and widely accessible.

name: DXC-CDG
description:
DXC.CDG, also known as Enterprise Services CDG, has been established in the Kingdom of Morocco since 2007 as a joint venture between DXC Technology and CDG.
This strategic alliance provides DXC.CDG with a unique positioning in the Moroccan market, combining cutting-edge expertise at scale with trusted digital services designed to support third-party accounts.

Adhering to both national and international standards, DXC.CDG leverages its deep understanding of the Moroccan market to assist Vital Importance Institutions and their ecosystems in their transformation journeys. Its end-to-end services, delivered from Morocco, encompass solutions for Hosting, IT Outsourcing, Cloud Migration, Application Modernization, Big Data, Artificial Intelligence, User-Centric Workspace Redefinition, Service Outsourcing & Digitization, Cybersecurity, and Consulting.

name: DWTC Test 1

Design & Product Development - Engineering and part design

name: E-Tafakna
description: E-Tafakna is an AI-powered LegalTech platform designed to simplify and automate the creation, management, and execution of contracts for businesses and individuals. Our solution enables seamless contract creation through customizable templates, automates the entire contract workflow, and allows for secure e-signatures, all while maintaining legal control. With a focus on efficiency, security, and user-friendliness, E-Tafakna empowers users to collaborate on contracts, ensure compliance, and manage legal documents in a streamlined, cost-effective manner. Powered by AI, our platform includes advanced features like contract reading, translation, risk flagging, contract summaries, health checks, and tailored recommendations. Contracts are available in Arabic, French, and English, providing multi-language support for diverse users across the MENA region. E-Tafakna aims to make legal services accessible, affordable, and easy to use for everyone.

name: DWTC Test
description: DWTC

name: E-stations
description: E-Stations is a leading EV charging startup, making electric mobility seamless and accessible. We provide a smart, reliable network with ultra-fast, fast, and standard chargers, along with a dedicated charging solution for e-bikes. Our user-friendly mobile app lets users locate stations, track usage, and make secure payments effortlessly. Committed to sustainability, we integrate clean energy and advanced technology to reduce carbon emissions and promote eco-friendly transportation. Whether for electric cars, e-bikes, businesses, or fleets, E-Stations ensures efficient, convenient, and future-ready charging solutions, driving the transition toward a greener, smarter future.

name: EBOS Technologies Ltd
description:
eBOS is an innovative client-focused software company providing state-of-the-art RegTech and Fintech solutions that automate risk and compliance management for organisations on a worldwide basis.

Our product portfolio includes a wide range of web-based customisable regulatory technology applications powered by Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning.

Our core offering – WiseBOS Suite, is a revolutionary fully integrated business aligned solution, designed to help manage risk, carry out customer due diligence and follow the best security standards, easily adaptable to the ever-changing business needs of companies.

Our diversified portfolio of clients include Banks, Government, as well as small, medium and large forward-thinking organisations, representing a wide range of industries where comprehensive, cost-effective and progressive solutions are fundamental to continued growth and survival in this unprecedented era of rapid digital advancement.

name: EAST PHOTONICS
description:
East Photonics located in Republic of Korea is leading manufacturer of high quality optical components and integrated modules for the fiber optics industry such as PON (Passive Optical Network). 
Our products are specialized to reduce CAPEX and OPEX enhancing quality of network service you provide. As the expert in PON field, we can provide the most suitable solution for you. East Photonics supports optimized solutions and network designs that are customized to your situation. 
We also support your business precisely and help you to find a better strategy for your network system.

name: Eagle Fleet Solutions
description: Eagle Fleet Solutions, fleet management services. Their intuitive, full-featured solutions assist businesses and government entities in effectively managing drivers and vehicles by providing accurate, real-time, and historical trip data. Our software services are designed to enhance service delivery, increase productivity, and improve safety while reducing fuel consumption and ensuring compliance. We enables organisations to access critical business intelligence and benchmarking data, thereby strengthening their operational efficiency.  We offers cutting-edge, customised solutions tailored to align with clients’ unique business cultures. Key services include time management through online employee vehicle booking, driver biometric authentication technology and vehicle inspection facilitation to ensure smooth operations and compliance. Our commitment to delivering high-quality, tailored solutions has positioned us as a leader in fleet management industry.

name: Direct Go
description:
Direct Go is the first 100% digital platform that has revolutionized ecommerce and delivery in Niger. More than just food delivery, Direct Go develops innovative digital solutions tailored to the country's realities.
Winner of the 2021 e-takara award (20M XOF), our team has worked relentlessly to expand services, including:
 • Integration of supermarkets and shops
 • "International Orders", enabling users worldwide to order from Niger for their loved ones
 • The first 100% digital DRIVE system in Niger
 • Geolocation of pharmacies with essential information
 • Real-time geolocation of ATMs with available cash
With concrete, high-impact technology, Direct Go is shaping the future of digital services in Africa. Now in a fundraising phase, we aim to accelerate growth and become a leading African tech champion.

name: EAU RO VANNE
description:
EAU RO VANNE is an innovative startup introducing a patented breakthrough in electrovalve technology, enabling the creation of ultra-low power electro valves consuming only 0.1W. These valves are unique in that regardless of the time between opening and closing, their energy consumption is limited to just 0.1J. Additionally, their size does not affect their energy usage, adhering to the 0.1J limit. Thanks to their minimal energy demand, these electrovalves can operate autonomously with a mini solar panel, eliminating the need for power cables, and It can be controlled remotely through IoT. EAU RO VANNE's invention is ideal for agriculture, efficient irrigation  that ensure optimal water and energy conservation, smart cities, and large-scale irrigation projects.
EAU RO VANNE is dedicated to improving agricultural efficiency and environmental impact through its patented, energy-saving electrovalves, creating a greener and more sustainable future.
