name: Disty Technologies
description:
Disty Technologies is a leading IT distributor in Morocco, providing a wide range of cutting-edge technology solutions and products. We specialize in the importation and distribution of IT hardware, software, networking solutions, and cloud services, catering to resellers, integrators, and businesses across various industries.   

As a trusted partner of top global brands, we ensure access to the latest innovations, high-quality products, and expert support. Our portfolio includes laptops, desktops, servers, storage solutions, peripherals, and cybersecurity solutions.   

With a commitment to excellence, competitive pricing, and strong logistics capabilities, Disty Technologies helps businesses stay ahead in the ever-evolving digital landscape. Whether you're looking for enterprise solutions or consumer electronics, we provide reliable, efficient, and tailored IT distribution services.   

Join us in shaping the future of technology in Morocco!

As the exclusive distributor of Absen, LUMENS, ATEN, SATEL, FINSECUR, and PREMIUM LINE in Morocco, Districap ensures high-quality, innovative solutions tailored to sectors such as corporate, education, government, retail, events, and critical infrastructure.

With a customer-centric approach, Districap not only provides top-tier products but also offers technical expertise, training, and after-sales support. Committed to excellence and innovation, the company continues to expand its reach, shaping the future of AV, security, and IT infrastructure solutions in Morocco.

name: DRONE CAST COMPANY
description:
Drone Cast Company is a service provider specializing in drone-based solutions. Our services are structured around three main areas:
Events, primarily featuring drone light shows.
Services, offering clients a range of drone solutions for industrial inspection, security, precision agriculture, drone wash and more. Our drones are equipped with HD cameras and specialized sensors (LiDAR, thermal, infrared).
Sports, by developing Drone Soccer in Morocco, a rising sport popular in Asia and North America.

Our team includes professional pilots, engineers, graphic designers, and 3D creators.
We are also the only authorized provider of drone light shows in Morocco. Whether it’s a public celebration, corporate event, product launch, or special occasion, our aerial shows take events to the next level, leaving a lasting impression. Using cutting-edge technology and creative vision, we personalize each show for an unforgettable experience.

name: doo!
description:
doo! is a fintech company based in Abidjan, transforming Mobile Money points into one-stop shops for everyday services.
Our service aggregation platform enables agents to offer administrative documents, public service payments, bill management, financial transactions, lottery, and more.
By leveraging Africa’s vast Mobile Money network, doo! provides citizens with seamless access to multiple services at their trusted local agents. This model boosts agent incomes, expands service providers’ reach without infrastructure costs, and enhances financial inclusion.
Launched in November 2023, doo! is rapidly scaling across Côte d'Ivoire, operating over 500 points, to bridge the digital and physical divide, making essential services more accessible to everyone. Through technology, strategic partnerships, and AI-driven fraud prevention, we are building a robust ecosystem where service providers, agents, and users all benefit.

name: DrillBit Plagiarism and AI text Detection
description:
DrillBit SoftTech India Private Limited. is established in Bangalore, India in the year of 2016. DrillBit has recognised by Startup India.
DrillBit Plagiarism and AI text Detection software is a cloud-based SaaS product used by academic institutions across the globe to verify the authenticity of content submitted by their students, comparing it with online sources and internal database. End users include students, authors, researchers, scientists, professors, faculty members, teachers, and librarians.
Our Mission: 
To raise the bar for plagiarism detection and in doing so help cultivate creativity, originality, and new ideas in tomorrow’s thought leaders.
Our Vision:
To outperform ourselves daily in creating the gold standard for plagiarism detection software.
DrillBit is trusted by 1800+ academic Institutions across 13 countries.
(India, Philippines, Nigeria, Kenya, Uganda, Ghana, Indonesia, Colombia, Bangladesh, Bhutan, UAE, Sri Lanka, Nepal)

name: Emaratech
description:
With a commitment to innovation, emaratech have achieved numerous milestones, contributing to Dubai's smart vison. Our journey is marked by a dedication to quality, security, and sustainable growth, aimed at empowering organizations and communities in the digital age. From launching pivotal projects to setting industry standards, each milestone reflects our ongoing pursuit of excellence. 
From Smart Government Solutions that streamline citizen services to advanced Border Control Solutions, our offerings reflect a commitment to technological excellence. As the gateway to one of the world’s most dynamic cities, Dubai’s borders require cutting-edge technology that seamlessly combines security, efficiency, and a smart travel experience. emaratech plays a pivotal role in achieving this vision, providing advanced border solutions that support Dubai’s status as a leader in smart and seamless passenger journey.

name: ENERGIC
description:
Energic delivers tailored electric vehicle charging solutions for: governments, facility owners, CPOs, fleet managers, petrol stations, and car dealers. 

Our cloud platform, Energic Control, powers the efficient management and operation of charging stations, enabling partners to scale their infrastructure seamlessly. On the consumer side, Energic ChargeX provides EV owners with a streamlined charging experience through real-time tracking, smart scheduling, and easy payments. Together, these solutions offer a comprehensive ecosystem that supports both charging station operators and EV drivers while promoting sustainability.

name: Elytis
description:
Elytis is a value-added distributor for more than 20 leading global brands in IT equipment and software. Based in Mauritius with worldwide connectivity, proven skills, industry-approved certification, market
acumen and bilingual (French and English) abilities, we serve territories in Africa, the Indian Ocean, and the French Pacific region. Elytis represents a diverse array of leading global brands such as Arctera, Barracuda Networks, Broadcom, Cohesity/Veritas, Corelight, CrowdStrike, Dropsuite, LetSignIt, Microsoft, Norton & Varonis
Our 60+ members of staff bring to our resellers and to their clients a unique blend of technical knowhow, business knowledge and training abilities. Elytis has a clear edge spanning over all the territories
we serve, creating greater value and catalyzing rewards for our partners and for their customers.

name: Englshool
description: Englshool is Morocco’s first digital ed-tech marketplace, connecting learners with qualified English tutors through live one-on-one & group courses. Learners can explore a variety of options based on their goals, schedule, and budget for a personalized experience. Selected tutors are granted access to the platform, where they can share their expertise and teach with creativity. By offering these opportunities, the platform helps tackle Morocco’s employment gap, creating income opportunities for English graduates and teachers. Englshool is Morocco’s innovative solution to a real challenge. English must be accessible, and local talent must be empowered. By bridging the gap between learning and opportunity, we’re driving learning, digital transformation, and economic growth, shaping Morocco’s future.

name: Enghouse Networks
description:
Enghouse Networks provides solutions that empower service providers with digital transformation, network modernization, and enhanced customer experiences. Our portfolio spans BSS, OSS, VAS, and cloud-based communication platforms, enabling seamless operations, monetization, and subscriber engagement.

We offer industry-leading solutions such as USSD Gateway, SMSC, Call Completion, and STIR/SHAKEN compliance to optimize messaging, voice services, and fraud prevention. Our Signaling Transfer Point (STP) and Session Border Controller (SBC) ensure secure and efficient network traffic management.

With a strong global presence and proven deployments, we help operators, MVNOs, and enterprises improve service quality, reduce costs, and accelerate innovation. Whether transitioning to 5G, enhancing network security, or expanding revenue streams, Enghouse Networks delivers the agility and reliability your company needs.

name: ENQURA
description:
Enqura FinTech Five empowers banks and fintechs with plug-and-play AI solutions eliminating lengthy integrations and accelerating digital transformation. Leveraging AI on Mobile Edge Technology, Enqura delivers faster, more secure and cost-efficient AI adoption across key financial operations
EnQualify – AI-powered digital ID verification enabling real-time onboarding in under 5 seconds with a 90% success rate
EnSecure – Multi-factor authentication securing logins, transactions and document verification while meeting regulations
EnConnect – AI-driven virtual assistant and secure communication platform offering real-time chat, messaging and AI-enhanced video verification
EnWallet – Comprehensive payment system and open banking platform integrating digital wallet, payment facilitator, gateway, SoftPOS and 120+ financial services
EnNovate – Scalable digital channels platform enhancing mobile and web apps with AI-powered automation and customer-centric engagement tools

name: ENGIE North Africa
description: Our group is a global reference in low-carbon energy and services. Together with our 97,000 employees, our customers, partners and stakeholders, we are committed to accelerate the transition towards a carbon-neutral world, through reduced energy consumption and more environmentally-friendly solutions. Inspired by our purpose (“raison d’être”), we reconcile economic performance with a positive impact on people and the planet, building on our key businesses (gas, renewable energy, services) to offer competitive solutions to our customers.

name: eProgram
description:
eProgram is a one-stop digital platform that simplifies and modernizes employee benefits and perks. We provide a comprehensive solution that redefines employee experience and fosters a strong, distinct employer brand. 

Our platform is renowned for offering localized and personalized benefits, promoting inclusivity and diversity in the workplace.

name: eSusFarm Africa
description: eSusFarm is a climate-focused agritech startup leveraging AI, blockchain, and mobile-based financial solutions to empower smallholder farmers across Africa. Our platform provides weather-indexed blockchain insurance, AI-driven advisory, and financial inclusion services via USSD, WhatsApp, and SMS. With operations in South Africa, Nigeria, Uganda, and Eswatini, eSusFarm bridges the gap between farmers, insurers, financial institutions, and agribusinesses. We enable farmers to access affordable inputs, mitigate climate risks, and improve productivity while providing financial institutions with farmer behavior scoring to optimize lending. Recognized by global organizations such as UNICEF, FSD Africa, and the Expo Live Dubai Foundation, eSusFarm is at the forefront of digital transformation in agriculture. Through strategic telco and fintech partnerships, we scale our impact by delivering seamless, data-driven agricultural solutions.

name: eShandi
description:
eShandi is a Pan-African challenger bank revolutionizing financial access for underserved communities and SMEs. Our AI-powered platform provides instant, collateral-free digital loans, seamless payments, insurance, and banking solutions—accessible anytime, anywhere.

With cutting-edge credit scoring, mobile-first technology, and strategic partnerships with global payment networks like Mastercard, we are breaking down financial barriers and driving economic empowerment at scale. Over 1.5 million customers have already benefited from our innovative approach, fueling financial inclusion and sustainable business growth across Africa.

At eShandi, we believe finance should be a tool for opportunity, not exclusion. By leveraging technology, we are transforming the way Africans access, manage, and grow their financial resources—creating a future where no one is left behind.

description: Ericsson’s high-performing, programmable networks provide connectivity for billions of people every day. For nearly 150 years, we’ve been pioneers in creating technology for communication. We offer mobile communication and connectivity solutions for service providers and enterprises. Together with our customers and partners, we make the digital world of tomorrow a reality.

name: Evercity
description:
Established in 2021 in Berlin, Evercity is an award-winning platform that streamlines green debt and carbon origination. Launched at COP26 in Glasgow, the platform provides cutting-edge tools for transparent, efficient, and scalable climate investments.

Evercity reduces green finance project time and costs by up to 70%, combining blockchain with monitoring tools to boost transparency, avoid greenwashing, and enable issuance of fully traceable green digital assets (green and sustainability-linked bonds, carbon credits and forwards).

With 14 years of climate finance experience, 9,000+ global connections, and a track record at major events, Evercity brings unique opportunities to clients.

Used across four continents (incl. North America, Europe, Africa, and Asia) Evercity has proven its reliability and impact. The platform has received multiple awards, including Best Ecosystem Solution from the International Telecommunication Union and inclusion in the UNDP Digital X catalog.

name: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
description: The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) was established in 1991 to help build a new, post-Cold War era in Central and Eastern Europe. It has since played a historic role and gained unique expertise in fostering change in the region - and beyond - investing more than €200 billion in over 7,200 projects. The EBRD works in 38 countries in Southern and Eastern Mediterranean, Central and Eastern Europe, and Central Asia. The EBRD provides project financing for banks, industries, and businesses in the private sector. It also works to improve municipal services, promote entrepreneurship, develop stronger financial institutions and legal systems, and restructure and privatize state-owned businesses.

name: ExcelWay
description:
ExcelWay transforms how MENA businesses and government teams collaborate, execute, and innovate—bridging the gap between strategy and daily work. Our Arabic-first platform combines interactive meeting facilitation and customizable project management in one secure, sovereign-cloud-hosted workspace.

Unlike fragmented tools, ExcelWay uniquely:
- Structures meetings for impact: Interactive templates (SWOT, BMC), micro-learning, and automated reporting turn workshops into actionable results.
- Unifies execution: Customizable workflows for HR, sales, IT, and more—with no-code automation and real-time collaboration.
- Empowers every team member: Designed for non-tech users, with built-in Arabic/French/English support and hands-on onboarding.

Trusted by 6,000+ users, from Moroccan government agencies to global consultancies, we’re redefining productivity—so teams spend less time chasing updates and more time driving progress.

name: Exclaimer Limited
description:
Exclaimer is the market leader in email signature management solutions, empowering businesses to unlock the potential of 1:1 email as a powerful marketing channel. With its award-winning platform, organizations can simplify email signature management to deliver consistent branding, promote marketing campaigns and company news, gather customer feedback, and more. 
Since it was founded in 2001, Exclaimer has grown from three entrepreneurs to a global SaaS business with 300+ employees. Over 65,000 organizations use Exclaimer for their email signature solutions. Its diverse customer base includes Sony, Mattel, Bank of America, NBC, the Government of Canada, the BBC, and the Academy Awards.

name: Exco
description: Exco is a recognized network of accounting and auditing expertise in France and internationally. Ranked in the top 10 multidisciplinary networks in France, Exco is organized into a network of independent firms offering a multidisciplinary, tailor-made, and local approach. Present in 16 countries, Exco has 140 offices and 3000 employees. The network supports companies throughout their lifecycle, with services in legal, tax, consulting, audit, social, and accounting expertise. Exco places people at the center of its solutions and innovations, fostering trust and team spirit. The network shares the know-how of the firms and pools technical knowledge and resources to pursue excellence. Exco believes in the value created by the collective and team spirit, with relationships that promote listening, exchange, and co-construction.

name: Exclusive Networks NWA
description: Exclusive Networks est le spécialiste mondial de l’infrastructure numérique de confiance qui conduit à la transition vers un avenir numérique totalement fiable pour toutes les personnes et organisations. Notre approche distinctive de la distribution donne aux partenaires plus de possibilités et plus de pertinence pour les clients. L’histoire de Exclusive Networks est mondiale avec une idéologie de services d’abord à la base, exploitant l’innovation et la perturbation pour dépasser la croissance du marché. Exclusive Networks a un modèle unique de « vente locale, à l’échelle mondiale », combinant l’extrême orientation et la valeur des indépendants locaux avec l’échelle et la prestation de services d’une seule puissance de distribution mondiale.

name: EXPERIO
description: EXPERIO is a Fintech software company that develops innovative, AI-empowered digital solutions to drive business digital transformation. It specializes in serving accounting and finance professionals, providing high-performance systems to enhance financial management, analysis, and accounting process automation.

name: Experts Vision Consulting Company
description: Starting from an ambitious vision with national hands and global experiences, we aim to contribute to building a digital nation by providing consultations and smart solutions using emerging technologies. We have gained the trust of national authorities, as we have worked with more than 60 government agencies in different regions of the Kingdom, through several main fields: digital transformation, project management, crowd management, integrated corporate solutions, event and initiative management.

name: ExypnoTech Engineering Services
description:
ExypnoTech offers an innovative and eco-friendly solution for the integrated management of aquaculture farms through its product "EyeFish", which combines advanced technologies such as AI and IoT, along with a cloud platform for optimal, remote, and real-time management.
The system relies on a connected buoy placed in the fish cages. This buoy is equipped with a cutting-edge vision system to estimate biomass and monitor the health of the fish, along with sensors that continuously track water quality parameters, ensuring continuous monitoring of the farm.
The collected data is centralized and processed by a dedicated acquisition and processing system, with AI algorithms analyzing this data in real-time. The results are then transmitted to a secure cloud platform. 
The entire system is powered by a renewable energy source, ensuring sustainable autonomy.  EyeFish provides a more efficient, secure, and environmentally friendly management solution for aquaculture farms.

name: Expertflow
description: Contact center (voice, video, SMS, Whatsapp, Facebook, Twitter, Viber, Telegram) and CRM software

name: EYONE
description:
Eyone Medical is a suite of solutions that constitute an interconnected healthcare system between the patient and healthcare stakeholders, including hospitals, clinics, insurers, international organizations, and governments.

The goal is to place the patient and their needs at the heart of a connected healthcare system. This means digitizing the healthcare journey by connecting the stakeholders involved (mentioned above). 

Eyone, which means "Let's go together," is now a network of over 850 healthcare professionals, covering around thirty specializations in the service of populations. 

Our vision, which is to make medical data accessible to all healthcare professionals, regardless of where they practice, is clear and we are fully committed to it; so let's work together to improve the living conditions of our communities.

name: Eyacom
description:
Founded in 2017, EYACOM is a specialized cybersecurity services company providing tailored IT security solutions to large enterprises, including banks, insurance firms, and luxury industries. With 45 cybersecurity experts, we help businesses protect their digital assets through risk assessments, SOC implementation, incident response, and compliance consulting.

In partnership with SECULOGIK, we are launching SOC4ALL, an affordable Managed Security Operations Center (SOC) designed for small and medium businesses (SMBs). This innovative service ensures continuous threat monitoring and rapid response, making enterprise-level security accessible at the price of a coffee per day.

Our expertise spans cloud security, endpoint protection, penetration testing, and cybersecurity training. With a commitment to trust, innovation, and resilience, EYACOM empowers businesses to stay ahead of cyber threats.

Secure your business with EYACOM!

name: EZducate
description: EZducate is an AI-powered learning platform designed for children with special needs, including autism, dyslexia, and ADHD. Built in collaboration with therapists and special ed professionals, it delivers adaptive, personalized learning experiences. At its core is a patent-pending AI engine that orchestrates ChatGPT, Claude, and fine-tuned LLaMA3 models, enabling intelligent model switching based on context. The platform optimizes content in real-time using child-specific analytics, ensuring engagement and progress. Visual flashcards generate therapy and education content instantly, while an AI agent network dynamically adjusts content speed and support. Informed by expert datasets from therapy and special education, EZducate ensures evidence-based, effective learning. Co-founded by Karima and Meriyem, EZducate is redefining accessibility in special education through cutting-edge AI.

name: Flowdiary
description:
Flowdiary is an e-learning platform that teaches digital skills in Hausa language to support self-reliance. Here are the problems and solutions we are providing:

1. Language barrier: Northern Nigerian youths find it difficult to learn skills online as our local language is Hausa. Our solution here is: Hausa-based regions get access to over 20 digital skills in their local language

2. High rate of unemployment: Flowdiary promotes self-reliance by offering core marketable courses to bridge the unemployment gap

3. Lack of mentorship: The platform was built on the pillar of providing mentorship to help young people build careers in the tech industry.

name: Flexoptix GmbH
description:
At Flexoptix, we live our passion for optimization and engineering since 2008.

WHO WE ARE

Technology providers
As leading technology provider for optical components we simplify the processes for network builders deployment operations.
We build solutions that just work.

Optimizers
We optimize not only support and supply processes but also have vast experience in hardware and software design for optical systems.
We scale by engineering.

Experts
With our inherent expertise, we help create smart networks that make optics operations easier, faster and more reliable.
We know what we do.

name: FlexITsecurity
description:
FlexIT Security makes cybersecurity accessible to all, offering SOC-as-a-Service, training, and all basic cybersecurity services.

We provide proactive threat detection, AI-driven analysis, and real-time monitoring, ensuring 24/7 protection against cyber threats. Our tailored security architecture integrates seamlessly, optimizing performance and compliance with standards like ISO 27001, GDPR, and NIS2.

Unlike traditional providers, we develop our own proprietary technology, delivering high-end cybersecurity at optimized costs.

With FXStaffing, access top cybersecurity specialists, from fresh graduates to seasoned experts, ensuring the right talent for your needs.

Whether you're a startup or an enterprise, FlexITSecurity keeps you ahead of threats with scalable, cost-effective solutions.
Join us in democratizing cybersecurity—because everyone deserves elite protection.

name: FM6SS
description:
La Fondation Mohammed VI des Sciences et de la Santé a été créée pour concrétiser la volonté de Sa Majesté le Roi Mohammed VI de réformer radicalement le système de santé national en mobilisant toutes les institutions offrant des services de santé et de traitement à la population.

Dotée de la personnalité morale et de l'indépendance financière, la FM6SS se consacre entièrement à servir l'intérêt public. Son objectif premier est de promouvoir les traitements médicaux tout en favorisant le développement de l'enseignement, de la formation, de la recherche et de l'innovation en collaboration avec les administrations et les organismes concernés.

La Fondation Mohammed VI des Sciences et de la Santé aspire à devenir un acteur majeur dans toutes les politiques et réformes visant à améliorer et moderniser l'offre de soins, ainsi que l'enseignement en sciences et santé.

name: FOLAN
description:
FOLAN is the French specialist in Telecom solutions for fibre optic networks, core networks, data centres and industries. 

Over the 35 years of our existence, the skills of our teams have evolved to include related markets such as new energies, broadcasting, video surveillance, defence and more, to offer our customers and partners tailor-made solutions for each project. 

Innovation as our core concern:
Thanks to our integrated design office, all FOLAN products are developed and designed in our facilities in the Lyon region. Our team of skilled engineers designs and tests all of the products in the FOLAN range, while also striving to offer you custom solutions to meet your specific needs.

Partners who trust us:
With 35 years of projects and partnerships, FOLAN has a wide range of clients. Operators, Equipment Manufacturers, Installers, Private Initiative Networks (RIP) or Public Institutions: FOLAN develops solutions adapted to all needs!

name: FOREN6
description: Empower your digital investigations with our cutting-edge expertise, tailored training, and innovative solutions. We support cybersecurity professionals, law enforcement, and corporate investigators with the tools and knowledge needed to uncover digital evidence, trace incidents, and respond effectively to cyber threats. Our mission is to make digital forensics and incident response accessible, practical, and impactful—through hands-on training, advanced toolkits, and continuous support. Whether you're starting out or facing complex challenges, we provide the means to act fast, think smart, and stay ahead.

name: Foodeals
description: Foodeals tackles food waste by connecting businesses, such as restaurants and supermarkets, with consumers and charities. By creating an integrated platform, we enable the sale of surplus food and short-shelf-life products at reduced prices, helping consumers save money while allowing professionals to turn losses into profits. This initiative not only reduces waste sent to landfills but also promotes sustainability and supports local communities, addressing the growing issue of food insecurity in the region. Through innovative technology and strategic partnerships, Foodeals is committed to making a positive environmental, social, and economic impact.

description: Fortinet (NASDAQ: FTNT) is a pivotal player in cybersecurity, steering the evolution of this field and the convergence of networking and security. Our core mission revolves around securing people, devices, and data universally. Presently, we offer cybersecurity solutions wherever needed, boasting the industry's most extensive integrated portfolio, encompassing over 50 enterprise-grade products. Trusted by well over half a million customers, Fortinet stands out for its highly deployed, patented, and validated solutions. Fortinet Training Institute democratizes cybersecurity education and career opportunities. FortiGuard Labs deploys cutting-edge AI for top-rated protection and actionable threat intelligence.

name: Foundever
description:
Your reference in customer relationship outsourcing.
Foundever® is a global leader in the customer experience (CX) industry. With 150,000 associates across the globe, we’re the team behind the best experiences for +750 of the world’s leading and digital-first brands. 

Our innovative CX solutions, technology and expertise are designed to support operational needs for our clients and deliver a seamless experience to customers in the moments that matter.  

Key figures: 750 customers worldwide / present in 45 countries, including 6 sites in Africa:
- Morocco > 4 sites (Rabat, Tanger, Casablanca & Fès)
- Ivory Cost > 1 site (Abidjan)
- Senegal > 1 site (Dakar)

 Our CX solutions and services:
- A range of high-quality services covering every stage of your customer journey (customer service, business optimization, sales & loyalty,...)
- Customer relationship solutions designed for operational teams

name: FACEPHI BIOMETRÍA S.A.
description:
Facephi is a technology company specialising in digital identity protection and verification, noted for its focus on data security and integrity. Its solutions are designed to create more secure, accessible and fraud-free processes, prevent identity theft and guarantee ethical processing of personal data.

 

Headquartered in Spain and with subsidiaries in APAC, EMEA and LATAM, Facephi has more than a decade of experience in the field of digital identity technology. It serves the needs of more than 300 customers in more than 25 countries around the world, providing innovative solutions that address security challenges in a constantly evolving digital environment.

name: Famasi Africa
description:
Famasi Africa is a technology company that's building Pharmacy infrastructure to digitize pharmacies & simplify medication access. 

Pharmacies can streamline inventory, payments and sales on Android terminals, effectively reducing reconciliation time, minimising accounting errors and cutting error-related costs. Pharmacies will also grow revenue via API integrations - with adjacent businesses like Telehealth & super apps - which don’t exist today.

We’ve also built Remi, an AI-powered prescription co-pilot trained on 10k+ medications to help Physicians prescribe better & reduce dispensing errors in the Pharmacies.

Founded in 2021, Famasi is on a mission to power one million medication refills across five African countries by 2027. We're focused on making pharmacies more connected, medications more accessible, and care more personalised—at scale.

name: FBR CABLES
description:
Providing integrated fiber optic solutions rather than just products is our philosophy to maintain continuous customer loyalty retention
and satisfaction. Commitment to 'safe & high quality' solutions is our main goal; accordingly, we combine our technological know how,
integrated product lines, system offerings and expertise service and support to provide customers with operating systems and business
processes they can rely on.
sectors: Consumer Tech, Smart Home & Smart Workplace

name: Fantastic App
description:
Fantastic is a Moroccan super app that connects users to their favorite local shops, grocery stores, and restaurants in just a few minutes. Our platform offers fast, economic, and reliable delivery, making daily shopping easier than ever. With a user-friendly interface, a growing network of partners, and a smart loyalty system, Fantastic brings together convenience and innovation. 
Since our launch, we've grown our customer base and order volume significantly, proving strong market demand. Our aim is to expand across Morocco, building the next big on-demand platform tailored for local needs.

name: Farmio
description:
Farmio is an AI-powered agritech platform based in Ghana that connects smallholder farmers to markets, financial services, and real-time agronomic support. Through its inclusive USSD and mobile app interface, Farmio empowers farmers—especially women and youth—with tools to sell produce, access input financing, receive weather alerts, and get expert advice in local languages. The platform features a digital marketplace, voice/SMS-based advisory services to ensure accessibility for farmers without smartphones or internet.

Farmio also offers modular greenhouse kits, a pay-as-you-grow financing model, and digital literacy training programs. With over 5000 active users and partnerships with agro-dealers, and cooperatives, Farmio is bridging the digital divide in agriculture and enabling farmers to increase productivity, build resilience to climate change and improve incomes.

name: FELIS® Merchandising
description:
FELIS® est une solution SaaS innovante dédiée à l’optimisation du merchandising et de l’exécution Retail. 
Nous adressons un enjeu clé des marques et distributeurs : le manque de visibilité et de contrôle sur l’exécution en point de vente. Grâce à des fonctionnalités métier et aux données en temps réel, FELIS® permet de digitaliser et d’automatiser la collecte terrain, d’analyser la conformité des opérations et d’optimiser la prise de décision. 
Notre plateforme améliore l’efficacité des équipes terrain, réduit les écarts d’exécution, booster les performances en magasin et maximise l’impact en magasin. 
En transformant la gestion du merchandising, FELIS® aide les entreprises à gagner en agilité et en performance sur un marché compétitif.

name: FeverTokens
description: FeverTokens is a leading French blockchain deeptech platform providing highly sophisticated smart contract infrastructure to financial services institutions. FeverTokens' technology is already adopted by major institutions like CACIB, CDC and SWIFT. The platform provides significant scalability of advanced smart contracts while actively shaping regulatory standards through working directly with regulators and international standardization bodies such as ICMA and ISDA. Its open-source framework, designed for large-scale institutions, is the foundation of its "Hub". Dubbed the "App Store" for smart contract modules, FeverTokens' Hub technology will enable institutions to build, deploy, and monetize scalable, compliant contract components, offering a game-changing solution for financial tokenization.

name: FINAPP srl
description:
Finapp, an innovative startup founded in 2018, has pioneered a method to measure water using cosmic rays. Our patented CRNS probes provide unparalleled insights into soil moisture.
On a large scale: >5 hectares.
In-Depth: up to 50 cm underground.
Real-time monitoring
Non-invasive installation
This is achieved through a lightweight, compact instrument that can be installed anywhere with minimal maintenance.
Some key features of our technology include:
Smart Agriculture: (Fin4Crop)  Enhancing irrigation management and water efficiency ? increasing the food production by 20%.
Water-leak pre-location: (Fin4Leaks) Our system can monitor up to 100 km per day, quickly detecting leaks in water networks.
Environmental monitoring: (fin4Earth) Helping with sustainability efforts and mitigating climate change.
Snow water Equivalent: (Fin4Snow) Measurement of the amount of water contained in snow pack.

Finapp’s solutions have been recognized by the Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO).

name: FININFO SOLUTIONS
description:
Fondée en 2019, FININFO SOLUTIONS s'appuie sur l'expertise de ses collaborateurs pour accompagner les acteurs des marchés financiers dans leur transformation digitale et l’optimisation de leurs processus Middle-to-Back en gestion des instruments financiers.
FININFO SOLUTIONS propose à ses partenaires des solutions complètes ainsi que des services modulaires sur mesure, adaptés à chaque ligne métier. Ces solutions offrent une forte valeur ajoutée, intègrent des technologies de pointe, notamment l'intelligence artificielle (IA), tout en garantissant un échange sécurisé des données.

name: Frimake International
description:
Our punchline :
"For sharing moments of your life, there’s Facebook, Insta or Snap.
For living those moments, there’s Frimake."

The best way to fight social isolation? 
=> Having a more active social life... That’s exactly why we created Frimake.

With Frimake, people meet new faces every day through real-life activities.

One click is all it takes to join a plan created by another member like you, and just like that, you’re reconnecting with life and rebuilding social bonds that time or circumstances may have broken.

But what if social impact also meant economic and environmental impact?

Frimake took on that challenge... and won.

When Frimakers meet up for drinks or a dinner night, they step out of their homes and spend money in local venues.

That means more traffic and revenue for local businesses, a much-needed boost in a post-pandemic world.

Frimake, recently awarded Social Enterprise of the Year, became the 4th most downloaded app in France, right behind Meta group.

name: FTBLR
description: FTBLR is a social app designed for amateur footballers, making it easier to organize matches, book fields, and share game highlights. By integrating sports technology with social networking, FTBLR connects players, enhances accessibility, and fosters a passionate football community.

name: FSP GROUP TURKEY
description: FSP Group is a leading global power supply manufacturer, specializing in high-quality power solutions for PCs, data centers, industrial applications, and consumer electronics. Founded in 1993, the company is known for its innovation, reliability, and commitment to energy efficiency, serving customers worldwide with cutting-edge power products.

name: Fuspay Technology
description:
Fuspay Technology is a fast-growing fintech startup revolutionizing digital cross-border banking. Our "whitelabel online banking solution" enables entrepreneurs and businesses to "launch their own digital banks in under 30 minutes"—offering seamless "cross-border transfers, utility payments (airtime, data, TV subscriptions, etc.), virtual cards, built-in KYC, stock purchases, payment links, and more."  

We help founders "save over $50,000 and 18 months" in development costs and time.  

As a "fintech infrastructure provider", Fuspay serves as the "backbone" for rapidly prototyping and scaling fintech ideas**. Whether you're a "tech-savvy founder" ready to deploy a "whitelabel banking solution" or a "developer-led startup" looking to integrate with our "APIs", Fuspay provides the essential tools to build, launch, and scale financial products effortlessly.

name: Future Lab
description:
Future Lab is a leading innovation engine partnering with industry leaders and startups across Africa to unlock opportunities and drive systemic change. 

By combining innovation advisory, venture and product development, and implementation support, we empower organizations to develop solutions and scale impact in sectors like agriculture, financial services, and climate action.

Operating at the intersection of research, technology, industry, and social impact, our ecosystem includes facilities like the Uganda Deep Tech Centre of Excellence, Research to Industry Centre of Excellence, various Venture Studios and Accelerator Programs, a robust talent network, and more towards fostering collaboration and providing end-to-end support, unlocking pathways for sustainable innovation and Africa’s socio-economic growth.

name: Futa Mobile
description:
Futa is a fintech on a mission to create a more inclusive and data-driven credit system in Africa by leveraging payroll data.
Built as a three-sided platform, Futa connects employers, employees, and financial institutions to unlock secure, real-time lending opportunities. Our core innovation lies in embedding a salary advance feature directly into a payroll system, enabling employees to request and receive instant cash advances based on verified employment and income history. This reduces default risk for lenders and eliminates the need for traditional collateral or lengthy approval processes.
By integrating business payment tools, Futa offers seamless onboarding for employers, ensures repayment through automatic deductions, and improves workforce retention through financial wellness benefits.

Futa’s suite of services includes payments collection, mobile money and bank disbursements to employees and suppliers as well as on-demand salary advances.

name: FutureRoc
description:
We are a company who felt that there was a need to accelerate the development of Cloud Services within Morocco. 
We saw the value it could bring to existing business and future start-ups.
With over 25 years delivering projects in Europe and creating core Web Services in Morocco.
We believe that we can add value to any companies Digital Transformation plans, we’ve built an unmatched depth and breadth of expertise in cloud technologies and their application to business.

name: FUTURETECH
description: FUTURETECH, founded in 2004, has evolved from an IT hardware provider into a leading full-service IT solutions company, driving digital transformation across industries. Based in Saudi Arabia, FUTURETECH specializes in SaaS solutions tailored to modern business needs. Its flagship products include PROVIZIT, a cloud-based visitor and event management system; eFautura, an electronic invoicing solution compliant with Saudi ZATCA regulations; and iLanati, an AI-powered AdTech platform revolutionizing out-of-home (OOH) advertising. The company is committed to innovation, cybersecurity compliance, and supporting Saudi Vision 2030. FUTURETECH also delivers infrastructure solutions for major entities, ensuring seamless digital integration. With a focus on accessibility, cost-effectiveness, and cutting-edge technology, FUTURETECH empowers businesses and government institutions to enhance operational efficiency and customer engagement.

name: G&G
description:
Founded in 2000, Ninestar Corporation has been focusing on the printing and imaging industry for over 20 years. As one of the top 500 listed companies in China, it has now become the world's fourth largest laser printer manufacturer, with a market cap of more than 50 billion RMB?As of June 2023?and annual revenue of more than 20 billion RMB. Ninestar has been listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange (stock code: 002180) since 2014.

G&G, a brand under Ninestar Corporation, was established to provide reliable and eco-friendly printing consumables. The slogan "Your Image Matters" to emphasize customer focus. 

The brand is committed to environmental responsibility, promoting sustainable practices such as remanufacturing and recycling initiatives to reduce environmental impact. G&G’s dedication to quality control ensures that their products meet or exceed industry standards, offering customers an excellent printing experience.

We specialize in delivering cutting-edge IT solutions that help businesses stay ahead in today’s rapidly evolving digital landscape.

With over 24 years of experience since our inception at the turn of the millennium, FVC has earned a reputation for providing exceptional value. We’re committed to creating lasting partnerships and helping businesses unlock their full potential.

At FVC, we deliver next-generation technology solutions that generate immediate, tangible results for our clients. From consulting, sales, and marketing to channel development, implementation, support, and training, we add value at every stage of the technology lifecycle.

name: gCube
description:
gCube offers a unique blend of digital strategy assets and innovative finance in a single, integrated service. Unlike traditional digital agencies or consultants, we speak both the digital and financial languages, enabling startups, SMEs and Public Administrations to access subsidized funding at zero submission/reporting cost while executing high-impact, tech-driven transformation projects. Our model aligns innovation with sustainability, delivering measurable results and long-term value.
gCube is currently bootstrapped and revenue-generating: key performance indicators from recent campaigns validate our model’s impact. We are now seeking strategic partners and investors to support our scale-up phase, particularly for EU expansion and African market entry.

name: GDExpert
description:
Spécialiste de la capture, du transfert, de la sécurité, et de l’archivage des données, GDExpert a pour vocation de proposer à ses partenaires une offre complète couvrant l’ensemble de la chaîne d’acquisition documentaire, de la numérisation au stockage des informations en passant par la Gestion Electronique des Documents (GED).

GDExpert avec son réseau de partenaires représente le leader sur ces marchés, et met à la disposition de ses partenaires un catalogue complet de matériels, logiciels et services ainsi que des ressources marketing, techniques et logistiques.

description: Gear9 is Salesforce's ‘Overall Partner of the Year’ in Morocco. It supports brands in their user acquisition and retention challenges at every stage of their digital transformation, from conception to implementation of their digital product.

products.name: Data Cloud, Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud

name: GEC MEDIA GROUP
description: Founded in 2012, GEC Media Group is a leading media, events & research company. Over the years, we have expanded well beyond our flagship technology publication to provide senior leaders across the enterprise with indispensable business insights whilst forging cross border knowledge sharing , facilitating the advice and tools they need to achieve their mission-critical priorities and build their company for next Gen. Together, with our clients & partner,  we plan, build and execute strategies that help shape the future of business and a knowledge-based economy.

name: GENERAL DIRECTORATE OF INFORMATION SYSTEMS SECURITY | DGSSI
description: The General Directorate of Information Systems Security (DGSSI) operates through four specialized directorates. The Directorate of Management of the Center for Monitoring, Detection, and Response to Cyber Attacks (maCERT) implements monitoring systems and coordinates responses to cyber threats against State information systems. The Directorate of Strategy and Regulation develops cybersecurity legislation, processes regulated product authorizations, and certifies electronic signature devices. The Directorate of Assistance, Training, Control, and Expertise proposes security recommendations, standards and methods while conducting information systems audits for public entities. The Directorate of Secure Information Systems develops tools to implement secure systems for administrations and public bodies. Together, these directorates form a comprehensive framework that safeguards national information infrastructure through monitoring, regulation, expertise, and secure system development.

name: GEEK Maroc
description:
GEEK Maroc is Morocco's largest data-driven marketing and communications agency specializing in gaming, esport and entertainment, offering services such as brand and marketing consulting, event organization and management, esport audio-visual production, content creation targeted at the gaming/entertainment sector, as well as web and mobile game development. 

With a broad portfolio of services and a diverse team of over 100 professionals, we deliver high-quality, integrated campaigns and strategies targeting gaming and esport audiences across the North African region.

name: GEO4NET
description: Geo4net is a leading provider of fleet management systems and GPS tracking solutions and AI Dashcams based in Casablanca, Morocco. Specializing in advanced telematics and real-time vehicle tracking, Geo4net empowers businesses to optimize their fleet operations, reduce operational costs, and enhance productivity. Geo4net delivers reliable and innovative solutions tailored to the unique needs of clients across diverse industries. The company's comprehensive platform includes features such as route optimization, predictive maintenance, driver behavior monitoring, and interactive dashboards, ensuring efficient and effective fleet management.

name: GENOW
description: Genow is a deep-tech startup focused on road safety for heavy vehicles. Our flagship product, HawkVision, is an AI-powered radar-based system designed to prevent collisions with low-clearance obstacles like bridges, tunnels, and parking structures—accidents that are often uninsured and result in massive costs and operational disruptions. Unlike traditional GPS-based solutions, HawkVision uses real-time sensing and machine learning to detect obstacles in the vehicle’s path and alert drivers in time to avoid impact. Our solution is first offered as an aftermarket unit for fleet operators and will evolve into an OEM-integrated system capable of interacting with onboard vehicle systems, including autonomous emergency braking. Backed by a partnership with Volvo Group and supported by LOIs from commercial vehicle rental companies, Genow is shaping the future of intelligent safety systems for trucks.

name: GSM AL-MAGHRIB
description:
Created in 1997, GSM Al Maghrib is a private Moroccan group operating Telco product’s distribution, Money Transfer, Printing management services and Data Center.

In both B2B and B2C fields, GSM Al Maghrib has a strong identity in the Moroccan market.
Distributor of telecom products and main smartphone’s brands and Tech equipment : Top-up, SIM, Smartphones, Routers, IoT products

name: GTI Software & Networking
description: GTI Software & Networking is a value-added distributor specializing in IT solutions, supporting partners and clients across Africa. With strong expertise and a strategic network of partners, GTI offers a wide range of solutions covering cybersecurity, storage, virtualization, cloud, and network infrastructure. Through technical support, certified training, and personalized assistance, GTI helps businesses optimize their IT infrastructure and tackle technological challenges. Committed to innovation and digital transformation, GTI collaborates with leading manufacturers to provide high-performance solutions tailored to the African market. With a strong presence and a value-driven approach, GTI positions itself as a key player in the IT sector, fostering the growth of a competitive and sustainable technological ecosystem on the continent.

name: GSIE TECHNOLOGY
description:
GSIE Technology is a PLC created in 1996. We are operating throughout Africa French-speaking Countries (West, Central and Maghreb), through 5 offices based in Senegal, Burkina Faso, Ivory Coast, Niger and Guinea Conakry; but also through local partners and representatives. 
Our activities revolve around 5 areas of expertise: 
• Software editor, particularly FinTech, for Banks and Microfinance Institutions in Africa French speaking countries
• Integration of solutions mainly SAP analytics
• The aggregation of mainly mobile Value-Added Services
• Information System Consulting and Training
We are also ISO 9001 and 27001 certified, in order to provide our customers and partners with services that meet international standards in terms of quality and security.

name: GUINUTY SAS
description: GUINUTY is Guinea’s first crowdfunding platform, founded in 2023, aimed at fostering inclusive and sustainable development. By connecting entrepreneurs, investors, and the diaspora, GUINUTY creates funding opportunities for projects in key sectors like infrastructure and entrepreneurship. The platform offers training, strategic advice, and transparent project monitoring, ensuring success for both entrepreneurs and investors. GUINUTY supports economic growth by promoting financial inclusion and empowering local businesses. Through its community-driven approach, GUINUTY is transforming access to capital in Guinea, driving innovation, and contributing to long-term development.

name: Guepard
description: Data environments are the backbone of modern applications, yet provisioning, managing, and maintaining them remains a slow and resource-intensive process. Guepard has developed a unique data branching technology that enables instant, on-demand database environments with zero duplication. By leveraging our in-house engine, Guepard reduces provision time by 100x and costs by up to 50%, thus empowering software engineers and  AI agents seeking much higher shipping velocity. Companies like Neon have proven this is a very interesting market, but their architecture is limited to a subset of Postgres applications; Guepard offers a much more powerful, flexible platform that can be extended to all common database systems, fundamentally changing the way data is handled for all software teams.

name: H2O Hospitality
description: H2O Hospitality, Asia’s leading hospitality tech company, specializes in digital transformation, managing over 220,000 units in 7 countries. We revolutionize the industry with one-click solutions linking all operations from reservation to check-in, enhancing operational flow and value chain efficiency. Our H2O FLOW system integrates all hospitality processes into one seamless operation, boosting sustainability and efficiency with features like Smart Check-In, Smart Concierge, Smart CRM, Smart Registration, and Smart Door Lock System. These innovations not only streamline operations but also significantly improve the guest experience, reinforcing our position as pioneers in the global hospitality technology landscape.

name: Gyronics
description:
Gyronics develops innovative wearable devices that enable users to control digital devices and systems through movements and gestures. By integrating Artificial Intelligence, Software Engineering, and Embedded Systems, we create intuitive and accessible solutions for interacting with both software and hardware. 
Our mission is to revolutionize human-computer interaction, providing alternative interfaces that empower individuals, particularly those with disabilities, to engage with technology effortlessly.
With a strong focus on inclusivity, Gyronics designs products that enhance autonomy and agency, ensuring seamless control across various applications, from robotics to assistive technologies. Through strategic partnerships, we aim to expand accessibility and redefine the way users interact with the world around them. Gyronics envisions a future where technology adapts to human needs, making digital interaction more natural, efficient, and universally accessible.

name: Hahn Software
description: We are a software service company from Germany, which was founded in 2017.With over 140 employees worldwide, we develop individual software solutions for the future and current challenges of our customers. Industry x.0, IoT, cloud services and client solutions of all kinds determine our day-to-day project work in all major branches of industry. CI/CD and clean code, on the other hand, are not buzzwords, but a lived culture. Our agile and international development teams are involved in all phases of software development. Our software experts have a great deal of creative freedom in the individual implementation of projects and are passionate about their work.

name: Hakeem
description: Walee Financial Services is a licensed Non-Banking Financial Company offering Pakistan’s first Shariah-compliant digital nano-financing through its flagship product, Hakeem. Designed for underserved and financially excluded communities, Hakeem delivers fully digital, interest-free financing using an innovative model that trades airtime as a commodity. Hakeem has received global recognition, including an award from the Monetary Authority of Singapore and Singapore Fintech Association, for its innovation in Islamic fintech. The company is also launching Hakeem International Centre for Islamic Fintech which is Pakistan’s first Islamic Finance Innovation Hub to foster collaboration between finance, tech, and Shariah experts. By combining ethical finance with cutting-edge technology, Hakeem is reshaping financial inclusion in Pakistan and beyond.

name: German Pavilion
description: German participates with a "German Pavilion" offering a professional brockerage service to help establish contacts with German companies and comprehensive information on Germany as an important business location

name: Hamynä
description:
Hamynä is an innovative company specializing in responsible digital transformation, offering solutions for regulatory compliance and technological ethics.
Our expertise spans four strategic domains:

Data Protection
We support organizations in GDPR compliance, developing data protection frameworks that combine legal expertise with technological solutions.
Information Security
Hamynä provides Governance, Risk, and Compliance Solutions
Regulatory Compliance
We guide organizations through critical regulations like NIS2 and DORA, ensuring comprehensive cybersecurity and operational resilience.
Artificial Intelligence Ethics
We develop frameworks to assess ethical AI deployment, promoting practices that respect human values and deontological principles.

Our vision: Transform digital compliance and ethics into performance and innovation levers, ensuring organizations navigate technological challenges with integrity.

name: GEOAP
description:
GEOAP, a GreenTech startup specializing in geospatial solutions, using satellite remote sensing and AI to address environmental challenges, particularly in water and climate change. Our expertise spans four key areas:

- Remote Sensing: We acquire, process, and enhance satellite data to detect, monitor, and analyze changes, ensuring precise insights for decision-making.

- GIS Solutions: We integrate Spatial Data Infrastructures (SDI) and maintain geospatial systems to streamline data access and management.

- AI & Predictive Analytics: We develop advanced models for object detection, generative AI, and spatiotemporal forecasting, unlocking deeper environmental insights.

- Geospatial Development: We design custom web applications and plugins to enhance geospatial analysis, accessibility, and user experience.

Through our innovative solutions, we help clients optimize the management of natural and material resources, enabling smarter, data-driven decisions for a sustainable future.

name: Getz Technology
description:
With over 160 years of excellence in international marketing and distribution, the Getz Group leads in sales, marketing, sourcing, manufacturing, and licensing across the Asia Pacific. Operating in 50+ countries across six continents, we employ over 12,000 people globally, handling 1M+ monthly transactions from 150 facilities.
Headquartered in Dubai, UAE, Muller & Phipps Middle East is part of the Getz Group, specializing in structured in-country distribution for the technology sector. Getz Technology FZCO, based in Dubai Airport Free Zone, delivers supply solutions across the Middle East and Africa.
Vision: To be the partner of choice by providing innovative, value-added products and solutions for mutual growth.
Success Factors:
Expertise & Relationships
Global Reach
Efficient Value Chain
Innovation
Brand Partners: Honor, Motorola, Anker, Samsung, Xiaomi

name: Getac
description:
LEADING THE WAY IN RUGGED TECHNOLOGY

WHO WE ARE
Getac Technology Corporation is a global leader in rugged mobile technology and intelligent video solutions, including laptops, tablets, software, body-worn cameras, in-car video, interview rooms, and evidence management software. Getac’s solutions and services enable the vital work done by frontline workers operating in the world’s most challenging environments.

TRUSTED BY GLOBAL USERS IN CHALLENGING ENVIRONMENTS
Our users choose the road less traveled, and so do we. From the very beginning, Getac has remained dedicated to the rugged technology industry and the users who depend on our solutions. Never deviating, never wavering.
Today, Getac serves customers in over 100 countries spanning the defense, public safety, ambulance, fire & rescue, utilities, automotive, natural resources, manufacturing, transport, and logistics industries.

name: GIZ GmbH Scaling digital Agriculture Innovations through Start-ups (SAIS)
description: The global project Scaling digital Agriculture Innovations through Start-ups (SAIS) has the objective of scaling innovations that contribute to selected Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). SAIS supports start-ups in Africa and Sri Lanka to become investment-ready, so that they can raise more capital for growth. The assumption is, that with more capital, the start-ups can scale their operations and reach more customers and users with their innovations. The innovations provided by the start-ups must have a positive impact for their customers and users either on income, nutrition, adaptation to climate change or circular economy. SAIS is funded by the German Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ) and is implemented by the Deutsche Gesellschaft für Internationale Zusammenarbeit (GIZ). It has received co-funding by the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation (BMGF), as well as the Bayer Cares Foundation (BCF) and the European Union (EU).

name: geteam
description: geteam is an AI-powered talent intelligence platform that solves the tech talent shortage with an innovative dual marketplace approach. This data-driven method quickly matches companies with pre-vetted tech professionals, backed by a risk-free trial period allowing candidate swaps at no extra cost. What sets geteam apart is our internal talent intelligence system, which uncovers hidden talent overlooked by traditional HR. Our skill mapping tools evaluate current skills and future potential, enabling companies to hire and promote based on growth trajectory. By combining external recruitment efficiency with internal talent optimization, geteam delivers a comprehensive solution for companies and clear career pathways for advancement.

description:
Company Name: GMC TASSTA GmbH
Industry: Mission-Critical Communication & Push-to-Talk (PTT) Solutions
Website: www.tassta.com

About TASSTA
TASSTA is a global leader in Mission-Critical Communications (MCX) over LTE/5G, providing state-of-the-art Push-to-Talk (PTT) over Cellular (PoC) and critical voice and data communication solutions. Designed to meet the highest industry standards, TASSTA ensures instant, reliable, and secure communication for enterprises, public safety organizations, and industrial sectors.

With a strong focus on interoperability, TASSTA seamlessly integrates with PMR, DMR, TETRA, and broadband networks, offering a flexible and future-proof solution for mission-critical users. Our MCX solutions support Mission-Critical Push-to-Talk (MCPTT), Mission-Critical Data (MCData), and Mission-Critical Video (MCVideo), delivering real-time situational awareness, emergency response, and workforce coordination.

Our mission is to enhance customer experiences by designing end-to-end digital strategies, from process definition to application development and execution. At Global, we are committed to innovation and to shaping the future through impactful, scalable technologies tailored to our clients' needs.

With a strong track record partnering with major agricultural enterprises like Les Domaines Agricoles, Graviton Solutions remains committed to innovation, excellence, and client satisfaction, continuously enhancing our products to meet evolving market demands.

Nous proposons plusieurs produits et services pour un large choix et une meilleure qualité à des prix concurrentiels : Equipements, logiciels, consommables et services. 

Tous nos produits sont certifiés conformes aux standards internationaux.

Le Groupe ARKEOS couvre l’ensemble des régions du Maroc et s’exporte à travers ses filiales ARKSEN au Sénégal

name: GrowForMe
description:
Grow For Me is an AgriTech company providing a marketplace for investors, commodity financing, and aggregation while ensuring a ready market and financial services for smallholder farmers. Through our platform, we supply essential inputs such as seeds, fertilizers, and mechanization services. At harvest, we offer farmers immediate access to buyers, ensuring prompt payment and increased income.

Our Micro-Aggregator platform seamlessly moves commodities from farm gate to warehouse to off-takers, creating a reliable supply chain. By partnering with telecom companies, we enable individuals and corporate entities to participate in farming, commodities trading, and carbon offsetting via crowdfunding.

We promote regenerative agriculture by training farmers in climate-resilient practices to restore soil health. Additionally, Grow For Me trades on the Ghana Commodity Exchange, facilitating trade financing and ensuring liquidity in agricultural markets.

name: Helios Towers PLC
description:
Helios Towers is a leading independent telecommunications infrastructure company, focused on driving the growth of mobile communications across Africa and the Middle East. 
We serve the regions' major mobile network operators ('MNOs') across nine high-growth markets. Our principal business is building, acquiring and operating telecommunications towers that can accommodate and power the needs of multiple tenants.
These tenants are predominantly blue-chip mobile network operators and we offer them a comprehensive passive infrastructure solution that includes site selection and preparation, maintenance, security, power management, and hosting of active equipment such as antennae. 
Our infrastructure-sharing model enables MNOs to roll out and densify mobile coverage more quickly, cost-effectively and with a lower environmental impact. In turn, this means that individuals and communities across our markets can experience the life-changing benefits of mobile connectivity more rapidly.

description:
Innovative Solutions for Integrated Digital Transformation 
is a cloud-based platform owned by the Integrated Environment for Project Management Company. It combines a set of integrated tools and systems, including strategic management, performance management, programs, projects, and task management. These tools enable organizations and teams to collaborate effectively toward achieving strategic goals. name: Identity Blitz
description: Identity Blitz is a software development company specializing in cybersecurity. The company focuses on providing advanced solutions for secure user identification, authentication, authorization, and access auditing for internal corporate applications. Since its establishment in 2014, the company has been a dynamic player in the Russian cybersecurity market. Identity Blitz designs software solutions that empower businesses to manage user access to corporate resources. The company's products also enable organizations to enhance their corporate websites and mobile applications with advanced protection features developed in line with modern security best practices. The company's flagship product, the Blitz Identity Provider authentication server, is an on-premises IAM and MFA solution . Its extensive feature set addresses the needs of modern enterprises by combining both security and user convenience and provides a scalable and flexible platform suitable for companies of all sizes.

name: iFUTUR
description: iFUTUR est une fintech dédiée à l’inclusion financière et à l’innovation en Afrique de l’Ouest. Nous concevons des solutions numériques adaptées aux réalités locales pour faciliter l’accès aux services financiers, en ciblant les populations non bancarisées, notamment en milieu rural et semi-urbain. Notre mission est de transformer les défis économiques en opportunités durables via des plateformes de paiement mobile, des comptes d’épargne adaptés et des services financiers numériques. Grâce à une expertise technique éprouvée, nous intégrons des solutions agiles et sécurisées. En collaborant avec les gouvernements, les organisations internationales et les acteurs locaux, iFUTUR s’impose comme un partenaire stratégique de la transformation numérique du secteur financier, garantissant des services financiers essentiels innovants et à fort impact.

name: Ignite – National Technology Fund
description:
Innovation shapes societies, and the Fourth Industrial Wave prioritizes creativity. Startups drive the knowledge economy, while governments enable agile regulations to balance risk with innovation.

Ignite funds startups and projects using Fourth Industrial Wave tech to solve local challenges and access global opportunities in health, education, energy, agriculture, telecom, and finance. Our national incubator network nurtures startups and connects them with investors and corporations.

We’ve launched a program to prepare one million people for the future of work and run Pakistan’s biggest cybersecurity hackathon to promote digital security innovation. Through research and stakeholder engagement, we support public and private sector planning. Ignite’s outreach informs professionals, students, corporations, media, and policymakers about the challenges of the new economy, the importance of innovation, and how to engage with our programs.

name: ImproTech
description:
ImproTechnology Ltd. is a leading Networking and Security solutions provider operating in Ghana, Côte d’Ivoire, Togo, and France. We specialize in IT consultancy, engineering, integration, and training, delivering cybersecurity, networking, cloud security, automation, and collaboration solutions across various industries.

Our services include firewall deployment, endpoint protection, vulnerability assessments, network design, cloud security, VoIP solutions, CCTV surveillance, and corporate IT training in cybersecurity, ethical hacking, and network forensics.

We partner with top technology vendors, including Cisco (Premier Partner), Fortinet, Palo Alto Networks, Microsoft, 3CX, Huawei, Aruba, Dell, HP, Sophos, and VMware, ensuring secure, scalable, and efficient IT solutions.

name: INES
description:
INES S.A. was founded in 1980. Specializing in the production of products and solutions for Urban Planning and Telecommunications / FTTH, the company is present abroad, particularly in Africa.
With its well-known and recognized experience in Morocco and abroad, INES continues to develop her know-how and the skills of her teams to meet the expectations of the partners and contribute to the development of infrastructure in Morocco and elsewhere.
Optical fiber, recently deployed throughout Morocco, represents a significant improvement over the old network, offering high, reliable connection speeds.
The Optical fiber is an extremely thin wire, made of glass or plastic, which has the physical characteristic of conducting light. In telecommunications, this characteristic enables huge quantities of data to be transmitted over very long distances, with extremely low signal loss.

Through loan-based vouchers redeemable at partner agrostores, we enable access to climate-resilient crops and essential farm inputs. In June 2021, IR4LAB secured a $1.5 million investment from Wa’ed, Saudi Aramco's entrepreneurship arm. The funding supports the expansion of its customer base, partnerships, & collaboration with Aramco's Digital Transformation Office.

In June 2023, IR4LAB expanded into Africa, with its office in Morocco as a base, aiming to stimulate innovation in deep technologies & implement Blockchain solutions in the continent.

In 2024, Iridium acquired Satelles, Inc. and announced the Iridium Satellite Time and Location service. For more information visit www.iridium.com.

name: IPHA
description: At IPHA, we understand the frustration you experience when navigating the healthcare process. After seeing a doctor, you're handed a prescription, then, you may or may not find the medication at a nearby pharmacy. You may or may not find the pharmacist available to help, you might not even fully understand your prescription or have enough funds to cover it. You are feeling lost ! On the flip side, pharmacists must stay on top of the latest drug information, build patient loyalty, and manage their inventory wisely. Like any retailer, they aim to minimize unnecessary visits while making smart decisions about what and how much medications to purchase. That’s where IPHA comes in. An AI solution that understands prescriptions and helps pharmacists streamline their daily operations, ensuring they can serve patients more efficiently before they even step foot in the pharmacy.

description:
KarimCo is the Russian IT-company with advanced experience in data management and deep analysis. Our clients say that the ability to replace entire teams of analysts with AI-driven insights is a game-changer. 
AI-Analyst Kacey can solve the analytical tasks of any complexity, like a smart brain of the project, providing the following advantages:
1. Excel is dead. Canceling to use excel by everyone allows the growth of creative thinking workers and it becomes the key trend for our partners and clients.

With a mission to build a safer digital world, Kaspersky has protected over a billion devices from emerging cyberthreats to date. Backed by more than 5,000 professionals, we deliver innovative solutions that safeguard businesses, critical infrastructure, governments, and consumers worldwide. The company’s comprehensive portfolio includes next-generation product line Kaspersky Next built to predict, prevent, and respond to cyberattacks, advanced cybersecurity services based on world-leading security intelligence and expertise, as well as Cyber Immune solutions to fight sophisticated and evolving digital threats. Trusted by 200,000 corporate clients, we contribute to the fight against cybercrime in collaboration with international organizations, law enforcement agencies, including INTERPOL, and CERTs, ensuring robust protection for what matters most.

name: Kasi Money
description:
Today, 80% of South Africans have bank accounts, but 87% of transactions are still in cash. This is because big banks don’t offer utility to 2 out of every 3 workers. Traditional banks are designed for workers who earn the same amount, on the same day, each month - leaving the majority of workers underbanked, without access to lending, investments or tailored budgeting tools.

At Kasi Money, we’re building banking from the ground up to cater for unpredictable income, and not punish it. We’re helping gig & unsalaried workers to better manage, leverage and grow their income.

Anyone can sign up for an account within 5 minutes with just their ID, passport or asylum documents. Customers get a virtual or physical debit card to tap, swipe and transact both online and in-person, as well as withraw from any ATM. 

We also offer tailored financial tools such as interest-free cash advances, investments that automatically put away a % of each paycheck and insights to better manage your money.

Visibility of data across hybrid environments provides monitoring and security tools with analysis-ready data to detect and resolve digital threats and performance issues. Keysight also offers continuous security validation to avoid downtime and data breaches and maximize ROI.
 
Network visibility delivers complete access to data across network, multi-cloud, operational technology (OT), and Internet of Things (IoT) environments. Keysight’s physical and virtual taps capture and send traffic from any network or cloud to Vision network packet brokers to aggregate, filter, deduplicate, and prepare data for analysis by monitoring tools.

description:
We're building Africa's largest food distributor leveraging technology and logistics to efficiently aggregate produce from smallholder farmers and distribute to B2B and thousands of informal retailers in Tanzania in an effort to reduce food waste and streamline farm to market process. We use data-driven operations to match demand and supply between farmers and retailers in three (3) ways:

1. We aggregate fresh produce directly from over 2,000 smallholder farmers through our rural collection centers located between 300 to 1,000km from major city markets.
2. We utilize refrigerated trucks, cold storage facilities, and efficient processing techniques to increase the shelf life of our produce.
3. We directly distribute fresh produce to B2B customers and informal retailers in the market.

We offer flexible pricing plans: a free plan to get started, a normal plan for one store at 200 DH/month, and a multistore plan at 150 DH per store per month. Our goal is simple—to help restaurants save money, grow their business, and connect directly with their customers in a friendly and effective way.
