name: KOSPET
description:
Founded in 2018, KOSPET is a technology brand specializing in rugged outdoor smartwatches.  At KOSPET, we envision the promising future of smart wearables.

We always prioritize user demand and emphasize long-term value.  

Our mission is to provide our customers with durable, affordable, and easy-to-use products which help them to stride towards a more healthy, active, and balanced lifestyle.

name: Koding Schools
description:
KWF is an EdTech company transforming how schools teach digital literacy and computer science. Through its flagship platform, Koding Schools, KWF delivers a structured and engaging curriculum for students from Grade 1 to 9, including interactive content and full lesson support for teachers in more than 18 schools and for more than 6 000 students, with 90% retention rate. Designed for easy adoption, the platform follows a familiar model: licenses are sold through bookstores or online, making the purchase process simple for parents and cost-free for schools.
Looking ahead, KWF is preparing to launch the Pro version, a product tailored for independent teachers and clubs to run extracurricular coding programs and generate revenue. KWF is looking to expand in Africa and South Europe regions.
Selected by StartUp Maroc 2030, Seedstars x EBRD Star Venture, and the Moroccan Ministry of Education's Digital Lab Sandbox, KWF aims to make 21st-century skills accessible to all learners.

name: Kooul and ORA Cash
description:
Ora Technologies was founded by Omar Alami, a visionary entrepreneur dedicated to driving digital and financial inclusion in Morocco. Under the banner of "E-Morocco for Everyone," he leads the company in developing innovative solutions that make digital services more accessible to all.

Kooul, our food delivery app, empowers small and medium-sized restaurants by giving them a digital storefront, expanding their reach, and enabling online transactions. It fosters a more connected ecosystem where businesses and consumers benefit from seamless digital interactions.

Ora Cash, our e-wallet, is revolutionizing financial inclusion by providing a secure, fast, and accessible payment solution. It enables cashless transactions, making it easier for individuals and businesses to manage their finances without relying on traditional banking.

Together, Kooul and Ora Cash are transforming Morocco’s digital landscape, ensuring more people can participate in the digital economy.

KUANGXIANG is the brand operation center of SEMETOR which was established in 2013. We have been an innovative enterprise in the design and production of stylish and light luxury multi-functional small appliances including Bluetooth speakers, wireless chargers, night lights, and so on.

[Our Vision]:
We aim to light up the fashionable lives of young people by offering functional and stylish products that combine cutting-edge technology with aesthetic appeal.  

[Commitment to Quality]:
We prioritize quality and innovation in each product we create. Each item is crafted with meticulous attention to detail and undergoes rigorous testing to ensure it meets our high standards. Our commitment to excellence has earned us a loyal customer base and a reputation for reliability.

[Global Reach]:
Our products are beloved in markets around the world including Asia, North America, Europe, Middle East and so on. We are looking for more global agents and distributors for KUANGXIANG.

name: KubicBits
description:
KubicBits is a fast-moving AI startup transforming logistics in Africa and MENA with KubicPilot—an AI-native Transportation Management System that puts operations on autopilot. From order assignment to route optimization and delivery tracking, KubicPilot automates logistics A to Z using intelligent agents and real-time decision-making.
Built for fast-growing fleets and chaotic transport environments, the system boosts operational efficiency, reduces planning time, and eliminates manual overhead. At its core, KubicPilot features AI copilots that assist dispatchers and drivers with proactive insights, smart clustering, and continuous optimization.
Currently in beta, KubicPilot is evolving rapidly with weekly releases of new AI features shaped by real user feedback. At KubicBits, we’re not just building software—we’re engineering the future of transport: automated, intelligent, and built for emerging markets.

name: Itelligence Business Solutions - Oracle NetSuite
description: At Gitex Africa 2025, Itelligence Business Solutions showcases 15+ years of proven expertise delivering innovative Oracle ERP and NetSuite implementations across the region. Known for excellence and reliability, we enable operational efficiency and digital transformation across Financial Services, Transportation, Healthcare, Retail, Manufacturing, and Telecom. With over 100 successful ERP projects, our skilled team applies proven methodologies to ensure seamless integration and project success. Additionally, our advanced AI services—including intelligent automation, predictive analytics, and AI-driven decision support—empower clients with strategic, data-driven insights. Backed by competitive pricing, strong global partnerships, cross-platform expertise (Oracle, SAP, Microsoft), and customer-centric innovation, Itelligence is uniquely positioned to help businesses achieve agility, productivity, sustained growth, and long-term competitive advantage.

name: iTriangle Infotech
description: Headquartered in Bengaluru, iTriangle is India’s largest transportation telematics company, specializing in IoT and mobility solutions since 2009. With over a million devices deployed, we cater to diverse sectors, including Automobile OEMs, EVs, Mining, Public Transport, Logistics, and Petroleum. Our product range covers Basic, Compliance, Advanced, Electric Vehicles, Insurance, and Banking Telematics. At iTriangle, Data Consistency, Reliability, and Customer Support form the foundation of our business philosophy. We pioneer a proprietary Remote Data Acquisition Platform that integrates GSM, GPS, RFID, and Sensors to offer robust solutions for Vehicle Tracking, Fleet Management, and Diagnostics. Backed by skilled promoters, we provide customizable OEM/ODM and aftermarket products for quick deployment. Trusted by BOSCH, TATA Motors, Ashok Leyland, and VOLVO Eicher, iTriangle is now expanding into MENA and SEA regions to extend our reliable telematics solutions worldwide.

description: Ivanti elevates and secures Everywhere Work so that people and organizations can thrive. We make technology work for people, not the other way around. Today’s employees use a wide range of corporate and personal devices to access IT applications and data over multiple networks to stay productive, wherever and however they work. Ivanti is one of the only technology companies that finds, manages and protects each IT asset and endpoint in an organization. Over 40,000 customers, including 88 of the Fortune 100, have chosen Ivanti to help them deliver an excellent digital employee experience and improve IT and security team productivity and efficiency. At Ivanti, we strive to create an environment where all perspectives are heard, respected and valued and are committed to a more sustainable future for our customers, partners, employees and the planet.

name: IZEMX
description: Izemx is an innovative tech company specializing in developing cutting-edge software solutions designed to enhance business efficiency and drive digital transformation for Web 2, Web 3 and AI. Founded by a team of passionate technologists and entrepreneurs, Izemx aims to bridge the gap between traditional business practices and modern technology demands. The company offers a wide range of products and services, including custom software development, cloud solutions, and data analytics, all tailored to meet the unique needs of each client.

name: JABRA
description: Jabra is a leading brand in audio, video, and collaboration solutions that empower consumers and businesses. As part of GN Group, we connect people to what matters most. With over 150 years of engineering excellence, Jabra develops integrated tools for contact centers and offices, enabling productive work from anywhere, as well as true wireless headphones and earbuds for calls, music, and media. Founded in 1869, GN Group employs over 7,000 people and is listed on Nasdaq Copenhagen (GN.CO), with solutions in 100 countries. Visit us at www.jabra.com or connect on LinkedIn, Facebook, and X.

name: Jiangsu Etern Company Limited
description:
Founded in 1978 and building on over four decades of steady growth, ETERN has combined solid industry expertise with innovation as the company continues to transform itself towards sustainable development. Now ETERN controls and owns shares in dozens of companies. JIANGSU ETERN CO., LTD., a subsidiary of ETERN, was listed in the Shanghai Stock Exchange in September 1997. It is the first listed optical fiber company in China. 
Growing together with China’s reform and opening up process, ETERN focuses on the physical industries and works hard on innovative R&D. It is a national-level innovative hi-tech industrial group, with a strategic layout that “Combines Optical and electrical technologies for synergetic development”. As an integrated service provider that covers the whole photoelectric industry supply chain, ETERN’s core business lines including Communication & intelligent interconnection, Electric power and energy, Automobile industry, and Superconductor industry.

name: IZEM CONSULTING
description:
IZEM Consulting is a forward-thinking company specialized in real-time energy monitoring and optimization. Through its flagship solution, VisualMetric, IZEM helps industries, public institutions, and large infrastructures detect invisible energy losses, improve operational efficiency, and reduce energy costs. 

Our clients have achieved up to 50% energy savings on targeted operations. The platform delivers actionable insights, enabling smarter choices and sustainable performance. With a strong focus on innovation and impact, IZEM Consulting supports its clients on their path toward greener, more efficient operations.

name: Jalios
description:
Jalios publishes sovereign, interoperable AI-enhanced communication and collaboration solutions (Intranet, Digital Workplace, Social Network, etc.), to federate and sustainably make organizations more efficient and everyone's work experience more fulfilling.

Awarded with the “Digital Sustainability” label, Jalios is used by over 2.3 million users and nearly 500 customers in the public, private and non-profit sectors, including Caisse des Dépôts, SFR Business, La Redoute, Système U, DGFIP, DAE, MAIF, Excelia, Handicap International, numerous SMEs, ETIs, cities, departments and regions.

Jalios’ products enhance the sobriety and resilience of information systems by integrating with existing systems and combining to create a complete digital working environment for efficient teamwork, both internally and externally: chat, videoconferencing, office automation, project management, document management, communities, knowledge management, e-learning, etc.

name: JO Software Engineering GmbH
description:
JO Software Engineering GmbH is an innovative software developer with over 30 years' experience in communications networks. Since 1998 the owner-managed company has focussed on the development, sales and support of the well-known fibre management software cableScout®. 
 The JO Software team is working permanently on the further development and improvement of cableScout® to further expand its strong market position. And this has been a success – as demonstrated by the more than 400 fibre optic operators who use cableScout® as a strategic tool for efficient operations. Customers include prestigious companies from a wide range of sectors including public utilities, telecommunications companies, energy suppliers, oil and gas providers, port and transportation operators.   
JO Software Engineering is committed to practice-oriented and high-quality solutions, which ensure maximum customer satisfaction and sustainable, profitable growth.

description: KWIKS is an innovative recruitment platform designed to instantly match companies with specialized freelance recruiters worldwide, tailored by sector and country expertise. Leveraging advanced artificial intelligence, KWIKS streamlines the recruitment process by rapidly structuring candidate data and generating detailed reports within just two minutes. Each recruiter is carefully selected based on their industry knowledge and local market understanding, ensuring precise, targeted recruitment for companies. The platform operates with a flexible economic model, rewarding freelance recruiters through commissions calculated directly on client billings, aligning interests and promoting efficiency. KWIKS provides a fast, reliable, and cost-effective solution, significantly reducing hiring times and enhancing recruitment quality for companies seeking top talent globally.

Kyriba’s real-time data and AI-empowered tools empower its close to 3,000 customers worldwide to quantify exposures, project cash and liquidity, and take action to protect balance sheets, income statements and cash flows. Kyriba manages more than 3.5 billion bank transactions and $15 trillion in payments annually and gives customers complete visibility and actionability, so they can optimize and fully harness liquidity across the enterprise and outperform their business strategy.

name: Launchese
description:
Launchese is a global service provider dedicated to helping entrepreneurs overcome barriers to financial tools and business growth. We specialize in solutions for businesses that struggle to access the best payment gateways, banking services, and funding opportunities due to their location.

We help move your startup to the UK or the US, establishing a business entity that gives you access to top-tier financial services. Whether you need a UK or US company setup, we assist in connecting you with the right payment processors, business banks, and funding options to scale your business with ease.

We’re online entrepreneurs ourselves, so we understand the challenges you face firsthand. That’s why we provide expert guidance tailored to your needs, ensuring a seamless transition into the UK or US business landscape.

name: LEGAL IQ
description: Legal IQ transforms access to Moroccan legal and fiscal information through artificial intelligence. Our platform offers instant, reliable, and accurate answers drawn from a complete official database, continually updated with the latest modifications. Developed by engineers in collaboration with several lawyers, Legal IQ covers all areas of law and includes an extensive fiscal database as well. The platform generates precise answers from legislative and regulatory texts and case law decisions from the court, simplifying legal research for professionals. Our mission is to simplify access to legal information for legal professionals, enterprises of all sizes, multinational companies, public authorities, and investors. Data confidentiality is key at Legal IQ, and we have taken every action possible to protect our clients' data privacy and security.

Clients can submit their requests online by entering basic information, and our platform ensures a fully digital and detailed follow-up until finalization. We provide end-to-end support for entrepreneurs, SMEs, and large enterprises, covering company registration, business modifications, legal documentation, contract management, tax compliance, and financial consulting. By simplifying administrative processes and ensuring regulatory compliance, we enable businesses to focus on growth. Our user-friendly platform, combined with expert assistance, ensures an efficient and transparent experience at every step. LegalServices.ma offers the tools and expertise needed to drive business success.

name: LegistAI
description:
Legistai is an AI-powered legal tech company transforming immigration law practices in the United States and the UK. Our advanced automation streamlines client management, document processing, and immigration form filling, reducing manual work and ensuring compliance. With intelligent legal search powered by natural language processing, lawyers can quickly find relevant case laws and regulations, improving efficiency and accuracy.  

By eliminating repetitive administrative tasks, Legistai enables immigration law firms to focus on client representation and case strategy. Our platform enhances workflow efficiency, minimizes errors, and accelerates case preparation, allowing firms to scale their operations effortlessly. Designed specifically for immigration lawyers, Legistai integrates seamlessly into legal practices, providing a smarter, faster, and more reliable way to handle cases.

name: Lengo Pay
description:
Lengo Pay, a digital payment solution from Guinea, West Africa, drives payment digitization across the continent. It empowers businesses, merchants, freelancers, associations, and public administrations to send and receive payments simply, securely, and fast. Designed for financial inclusion, it adapts to urban, rural, formal, or informal settings with a modern infrastructure. 

Key features: Mobile Money, card (Visa, MasterCard), and wallet payments; an NFC-enabled all-in-one terminal for in-store or mobile use; QR Code payments for contactless transactions; Bulk Payments for salaries or suppliers; donation collection for NGOs; Lengo Store for quick e-commerce setup; custom payment links and pages for service providers; automated invoicing; and institutional payment tools for public revenue.

With robust APIs, CMS plugins, and Guinea-based support, Lengo Pay delivers reliable, accessible payments tailored to Africa’s economic needs.

name: LifeLine
description:
LifeLine: Africa’s First Blockchain-Powered Pharmaclinical Software

We aim to make accessing, affording, and managing life-saving medications and clinical tests nearly free for millions of Africans. We're transforming Africa's healthcare ecosystem by integrating third-party insurance, outpatient care tracking, AI, and logistics innovations.

Our Solution:

GPS Integration: Patients find the nearest affordable drugs or tests.
Blockchain Tracking: Securely store and share medical history with providers.

Innovative Contract Payments: Instant claims via insurance, subscriptions, or virtual wallets.

Insurance Search Engine: Connect uninsured patients to 8+ providers.

Logistics Options: Self-pickup, delivery, or drones for rural areas.

name: Linarqa
description:
Dweera is a peer-to-peer mobility platform that connects individuals and businesses to a seamless rental marketplace for bikes, scooters, cars, and utility vehicles. Our platform enables users to rent vehicles easily for leisure, commuting, or professional use, while allowing owners to monetize their assets.

We offer:
? Flexible Rentals – Hourly, daily, or monthly options
? Diverse Fleet – Bikes, scooters, cars, and utility vehicles
? Seamless Booking – Secure online reservations & instant access
? Trusted Network – Verified users & partners across Morocco

Dweera empowers urban mobility by providing cost-effective and eco-friendly transportation solutions. Join us in revolutionizing mobility in Morocco!

name: Liferay
description: Liferay makes software that helps companies create digital experiences on web, mobile and connected devices. Our platform is open source, which makes it more reliable, innovative and secure. We try to leave a positive mark on the world through business and technology. Hundreds of organizations in financial services, healthcare, government, insurance, retail, manufacturing and multiple other industries use Liferay. Visit us at liferay.com.

name: LimaBot AI
description:
LimaBot AI is an innovative agricultural technology startup leveraging artificial intelligence to empower smallholder farmers with real-time insights and data-driven solutions. Our platform provides personalized guidance on sustainable farming practices, crop disease detection, pest management, and weather predictions, helping farmers improve productivity and resilience.

By integrating AI-powered analysis with accessible communication channels like mobile apps, SMS, USSD, and WhatsApp, LimaBot AI ensures that farmers, even in remote areas, receive timely and actionable advice. We aim to bridge the agricultural knowledge gap, enhance food security, and drive economic growth across Africa.

At LimaBot AI, we are committed to transforming agriculture through technology, making farming smarter, more efficient, and sustainable for future generations.

name: LinSoft
description:
Our vendor-agnostic approach, unwavering trustworthiness, and dedicated focus on open-source technologies set us apart. With a diverse portfolio, LinSoft offers cutting-edge solutions in Open Source Software, DevOps, and Cloud technologies, guiding customers through their transformation journey to the rapidly evolving digital economy. 
Beyond IT integration and the development of a comprehensive system with advanced functionalities, LinSoft prioritizes complete monitoring, considering customer satisfaction as our paramount focus.  
Our proficient LinSoft team, armed with managerial expertise, begins by offering advice and then proceeds to propose a design. Following this, we ensure the integration, and marketing, and ultimately provide support for all the offerings from our publishing partners. Furthermore, LinSoft extends technical training and certifications for Red Hat, AWS, CompTIA +and Linux Foundation through its Learning Center.

name: LinkShadow
description: At LinkShadow, we are revolutionizing cybersecurity with our Unified Identity, Data, and Network Analytics Platform, designed to protect your most valuable assets—identities, data, and networks—in a single, integrated solution ...
sectors: Digitization / services / tool and die making - Data and IT security, protection of intellectual property

name: LOADe Technology Pvt Limited
description: LOADe operates on a tech-enabled, integrable logistics ecosystem, bridging businesses with a broad spectrum of delivery solutions through a  mile-agnostic and vehicle-agnostic model. By leveraging AI-driven optimization, cloud-based operations, and real-time tracking, LOADe enhances supply chain efficiency, cost-effectiveness, and scalability for businesses of all sizes. The platform offers on-demand, scheduled, and specialized logistics services, ensuring seamless integration with corporate clients, SMEs, and logistics partners. Instead of competing with traditional logistics providers, LOADe fosters collaborative partnerships, enabling businesses to optimize their delivery networks while reducing operational bottlenecks.

name: Lisan AI
description:
Lisan is a deep tech company developing vertical AI systems tailored for enterprises in the MENA region. It has built state-of-the-art language-checking models for Arabic and English, leveraging a new compression technique and a novel architecture that reduces AI model query and training costs by 99.97%.

Over the past two years, Lisan AI has achieved 21% month-over-month growth, leading to an annual growth rate of 9x, and it is recognized as the fastest growing AI company in the MENA region by Deloitte.

The company is backed by 500 Global, Wa’ed, ABV, KAUST Innovation Ventures, and Oraseya Capital.

name: LMPS Group
description:
About LMPS Group

LMPS Group has been a leading specialist in the cybersecurity field for over 15 years. Accredited as a PASSI by the General Directorate of Information Systems Security and certified as a PCI QSA (Qualified Security Assessor) by the PCI Security Standards Council for the PCI DSS standard, LMPS Group is a certified ISO27001 and ISO 9001 "One-Stop-Cybersecurity Shop." The group operates a Cybersecurity Incident Detection and Response MDR (Managed Detection and Response) Cyber Center, equipped with a CERT and is a member of the global FIRST network. In terms of figures, LMPS Group, present in Morocco and France, has over 60 consultants and serves more than 250 clients across 20 countries.

name: Logidoo
description: Logidoo is a digital logistics platform founded in 2019 to connect African countries through smart, affordable, and reliable logistics solutions. It offers end-to-end services, including pickup, transport, customs clearance, warehousing, last-mile delivery, and cash-on-delivery. Operating in over 12 countries, Logidoo uses advanced technology (ERP, WMS, TMS) to streamline cross-border trade. In 2024, it launched TexMiles, a last-mile delivery service, and secured $1.55M in funding to support expansion. By integrating informal logistics players and offering real-time tracking, Logidoo empowers African SMEs to grow and trade across borders efficiently. Its mission is to become Africa’s leading logistics platform and a key enabler of the continent’s digital trade ecosystem.

name: LOGIGROUP
description:
LOGIGROUP operates in the field of Digitalisation, Data Management, AI, Cloud and Cybersecurity.
We offer our partners, local and international, complete solutions, specific and adapted to their business requirements in order to support them during their digital transformation.

name: LocaleNLP
description:
LocaleNLP is an AI-driven Natural Language Processing (NLP) startup dedicated to bridging the digital language divide by developing state-of-the-art NLP models for low-resource African languages. With over 2,000+ African languages lacking representation in AI, LocaleNLP is pioneering speech-to-text (STT), text-to-speech (TTS), machine translation, and voice assistants optimized for low-bandwidth environments.
Our lightweight, energy-efficient AI models run on mobile devices and edge computing, making AI-powered education, agriculture, healthcare, and financial services accessible to millions. LocaleNLP is building the next-generation multimodal AI for Africa and the Global South by leveraging deep learning, federated learning, and crowdsourced data.
We are raising funds to scale our AI research, expand partnerships, and deploy NLP models across industries.

name: LOBUS
description:
LOBUS is a smart platform connecting tourists with transport providers. Tourists request a ride, receive multiple offers, and choose the best option, while transport companies get more bookings effortlessly.
But what makes our company truly powerful is its scalability, our platform is built to expand into new markets in less than 7 days, making it a game-changer not just in Morocco, but globally.

name: Logicom Morocco
description: Logicom, a leading IT distributor, established its Casablanca hub in 2021 to expand into North and West-Central Africa. With over 30 years of experience, Logicom supports Morocco's growing tech market and empowers local resellers with fast service, flexible offers, advanced certifications, and supplier accreditations. The company partners with top global brands like Adobe, HP, Intel, Kingston, and Microsoft to provide cutting-edge solutions. Logicom also extends its Cloud services and e-commerce platform to the local market, alongside marketing support, logistics, and credit solutions. Committed to innovation, Logicom is building a strong presence in Morocco and Francophone Africa.

name: Logitech
description:
At Logitech, our purpose is to extend human potential in work and play.

We do this by designing software-enabled hardware solutions that drive superior performance when gaming and superior productivity while at work, all with maximum comfort, speed and accuracy. We enable creativity when pursuing passions and connectivity so everyone is seen, heard and can contribute in their own unique way.

As a Swiss company focused on innovation and quality, our products are the point of connection between people and the digital world. We harness the transformative power of design to drive innovation and progress throughout our portfolio in order to deliver truly unique and meaningful experiences. With products available in nearly every country and more than 3.5 million items shipped each week, Logitech is dedicated to driving outcomes that are better for people and planet, reducing our environmental impact by leading the industry in designing for sustainability.
sectors: Consumer Tech, Smart Home & Smart Workplace

name: Lotel Partners
description: Lotel is an Online Travel Agency located in Morocco.

name: Logistiqa.co
description:
Logistiqa is a simple yet powerful ERP platform designed to help small businesses efficiently manage their sales, purchases, and inventory using the best international practices. Joining Logistiqa means becoming part of a collaborative network where small businesses can connect, share resources, and benefit from pooled logistics solutions to boost their competitiveness and growth. Built on deep expertise in logistics engineering, data science, and integrated systems, Logistiqa bridges the gap between small businesses and advanced supply chain management.
With over 1,200 cooperatives and small businesses mainly in Morocco and Europe, we’ve partnered with major institutions to expand our reach and impact. Logistiqa helps small businesses save time, cut logistics costs by over 40% and reduce admin time by 60% through smart data analysis and streamlined processes.
We are now seeking partners and investors to join us in addressing 90% of businesses in Africa and beyond that are underserved.
sectors: Merchandise Planning & Inventory Management - Electronic Data Interchange or EDI

name: Loomee Group(Pty)Ltd
description: Loomee Group (Pty) Ltd, established in 2016 and headquartered in East London, Eastern Cape, South Africa, is a black-owned company dedicated to transforming perceptions of work and business through online training. Registered with CIPC (Reg: 2016/033843/07) and accredited by MICT SETA, Loomee Group specializes in remote work training, upskilling, and reskilling individuals to thrive in the digital economy. Their services include online training, software development training, and technical support training, aiming to contribute positively to the Fourth Industrial Revolution by equipping the next generation with essential digital skills. The company also offers remote contact center services, providing virtual assistant services, lead generation, customer support, and technical support. With a commitment to empowering individuals and fostering economic and social freedom through internet-based opportunities.

products.name: Remote work and new education curriculum

name: LongXing
description:
LongXing have been applying its professional knowledge in fiber optics, data centre, power and active products for over 40 years.

Our products and solutions extend from data centres to central offices, curbs and straight to homes. We produce passive and active products, as well as indoor and outdoor products, e.g. ODF, network cabinets, distribution boxes, cable tray systems, splice closures, outdoor cabinets, PDUs, etc.

In recent years, LongXing have been recognized and trusted by operators from more than 60 countries. Meanwhile, we have been investing in advanced manufacturing facilities which can significantly improve both the productivity and quality of a manufacturing process.

name: Lunflow
description: Lunflow is a leading provider of digital workflow automation and document management solutions. Our platform helps businesses streamline operations, ensure compliance, and enhance traceability. Lunflow simplifies approval circuits, incident management, and technical interventions across industries such as manufacturing, telecommunications, and engineering. With powerful automation, real-time tracking, and integrated collaboration tools, Lunflow enables organizations to improve efficiency, reduce errors, and gain full control over their processes. Trusted by major companies, our solution ensures seamless digital transformation and optimized operational performance

name: Loyalty Program Aggregator
description:
Tookeez is a fully digital, blockchain-based reward platform that provides universal and secure incentives to engage employees, clients, and partners.
It functions as an ecosystem connecting brands, merchants, and consumers, all built around a unique unit of value—the tookeez—which circulates seamlessly between stakeholders, generating added value for each of them.

products.name: Digital loyalty and payment solution for merchants

name: Made in Russia (Russian export center)
description: Russian Export Center JSC  (REC) offers a wide range of financial and non-financial support tools to benefit the Russian exporters explore the foreign markets and build capacity in the global trade. REC also acts as a focal point for interaction with the relevant domestic ministries and agencies and cooperates with key industries and business players in Russia to improve the export conditions in Russia and help bypass trade barriers. REC offers its services to all the exporters of non-commodities’ products, goods and services with no industry restrictions. REC aims at providing the exporting companies with continuous support from the proposal and planning phase all the way to the successful completion of the export contract and implementation and beyond – including the e-commerce channels.
sectors: Consumer Tech, Smart Home & Smart Workplace

name: Madiri Business Enterprise
description:
Madiri Business Enterprise (PTY) LTD is an Information Technology firm that is 100% female owned and strives to provide clients with professional quality services.   

The company aims to be the most reliable and sustainable Information Communication Technology (ICT) Company in South Africa, known for delivering quality service on time and cost-effectively.   

Madiri offers a range of products and services, including:
Ngithole App: An application designed to assist women and children in danger, featuring GPS tracking, pulse monitoring, and alerts.   
Emergency Grid: A Smart City App to help communities report incidents efficiently through mobile devices, linked to various entities like the police, Department of Home Affairs, and emergency services.
Our services:
Infrastructure Solutions.   
Data Analytics.   
Software Development.   
Digital Transformation.   
Change Management.   
Solutions Architect.   
Madiri Business Enterprise has served various clients across different sectors

name: Lyno Consulting
description:
Fondée en 2018, Lyno Consulting est un cabinet spécialisé dans le placement et le recrutement de profils freelances IT hautement qualifiés. Nous avons construit notre réputation autour de trois piliers essentiels : Expertise, Réactivité et Sécurité.
Notre mission est claire : connecter les meilleurs talents IT aux bonnes opportunités, tout en aidant les entreprises à atteindre leur excellence à travers des solutions de recrutement innovantes.
Chez Lyno Consulting, nous offrons :
• Le placement et le recrutement de profils IT hautement qualifiés, avec un processus rigoureux et sur mesure.
• La formation IT, pour garantir que vos équipes maîtrisent les technologies clés du moment.
nous couvrons un large éventail de technologies et méthodologies comme Oracle, SAP, Microsoft .NET, Salesforce et Power BI, mais aussi des langages et outils clés tels que Java, Python, PHP et Linux.
Nous intervenons également sur les domaines de gestion de projet : AMOA, MOA, PMO et Chef de projet.

name: Mains Lab
description:
Mains Lab W.L.L – We provide innovative IT solutions powered by artificial intelligence for health insurance companies and medical providers. Our mission is to optimize medical data processing, which not only enhances the quality of healthcare services provided to insured individuals but also makes insurance services more accessible and effective for the citizens of the country.

PRODUCTS
• Medical Overtreatment detection AI tool
• Medical Fraud detection AI tool
• Health Underwriting AI tool

ADVANTAGES
• Automation of operational processes for pre-authorization and medical expertise
• Adaptation to local clinical guidelines and regulations
• Rule library with over 5 million triggers
• Provision of references to local and international clinical guidelines

name: Malitech Cyber AI
description:
Malitech CyberAI est une SSCI, un design Malien avec une Technologie Africaine, offrant expertise et solutions sur mesure. Nous sommes là pour vous accompagner dans la digitalisation, la modernisation/innovation et la sécurisation de vos données, la Digitalisation du workflow des assurances E-ASSURANCE, de la fiscalité en exploitant les avantages de l'intelligence artificielle et du cloud. Faites nous confiance pour donner vie à vos projets.

?CAP vers le Digital, l’intelligence Artificielle avec des Données Sécurisées, MaliTech CyberAI un design Malien avec une Technologie Africaine.

description:
To provide top-tier digital printing and branding services with unparalleled convenience, creativity, and quality, enabling businesses and individuals to express their identity with customized products. name: Manhattan & Intellinet Network Solutions
description:
Manhattan and Intellinet Network Solutions are trusted connectivity and networking brands from ISO-certified manufacturer IC Intracom. With 35+ years of global market experience, we offer a wide, growing range of competitively priced products for installers, system integrators, and resellers – adding value through high-standard product management in Germany.

Through OEM relationships and strategic partnerships in the IT channels, our products are available from over 70,000 companies worldwide. We deliver enhanced features, simplicity, quality, and performance at reasonable prices – providing the right tools so your customers can focus on what matters most.

We stand by our products with industry-leading warranties that offer outstanding value. Our dedicated overseas quality assurance team conducts thorough inspections to ensure products meet customer expectations and quality standards. Our goal is to be your primary source for product sourcing needs.

name: ManageEngine
description:
As the enterprise IT management division of Zoho Corp., ManageEngine empowers you to take control of your IT, from your security, networks, and servers to your applications, service desk, Active Directory, desktops, and mobile devices.

ManageEngine offers you more than 60 enterprise IT management products and over 60 free tools for identity and access management, enterprise service management, unified endpoint management and security, IT operations management, security information and event management, advanced IT analytics, and low-code app development. Your deployment options include on-premises, cloud-native, cloud-ready, and MSP models.

All of our tools are built from the ground up with contextual integration to make sure you can control your IT as holistic environment, not an assortment of disconnected, siloed elements. We'll continue pushing for the tight business-IT alignment you'll need to seize future opportunities.

name: marKoub.ma
description:
MarKoub.ma is the pioneering online bus ticketing platform in Morocco. Partnering with more than 100 of the best local bus companies, we empower travelers with the flexibility to select their optimal journey options and swiftly book tickets at the most competitive prices.

Through the seamless integration of technology, MarKoub.ma offers a user-friendly interface where customers can effortlessly browse, compare, and book intercity bus tickets online. This convenience extends beyond the booking process, as the platform continues to support users throughout their travel experience, ensuring a smooth journey from start to finish.

name: MARKETING CONFORT
description: An audiovisual and social media marketing company specializes in creating engaging content tailored to various media platforms. It typically offers services like video production, where they produce commercials, tutorials, and other promotional content to visually capture and convey a brand's message.

name: Marketkit
description:
Marketkit is a startup specialized in supporting brands and e-merchants through a complete range of digital tools and services.
Our mission is to simplify the launch, management, and growth of online stores and marketplaces.
We offer a white-label platform, outsourced services (customer support, logistics, vendor management), as well as an intelligent back-office powered by AI.
Our vision: to empower every brand to manage its e-commerce ecosystem with performance, autonomy, and scalability.

name: MAROC DATACENTER MDC
description: Maroc Datacenter MDC is a Moroccan company that provides secure data centers and cloud services, including public and private cloud and managed services. Our mission at MDC is to deploy, manage, and oversee end-to-end IT platforms for our clients and partners. We have strategically designed MDC to adapt to the ever-evolving demands of the digital era. Our state-of-the-art facilities offer a secure and highly available environment that complies with international standards, creating an ecosystem where governmental and private organizations can confidently and securely host and outsource their IT platforms.

name: MBCOM Technologies, Broadcom Representative
description:
MBCOM Technologies is a subsidiary of Midis Group and is the sole representative of Broadcom Software in Middle East, Turkey, Africa, Eastern Europe and CIS.
MBCOM Technologies was established through a representation agreement with CA Europe Sarl (“CA”), a Broadcom Company, unifying existing local Midis teams for the representation of CA Enterprise and Symantec Cybersecurity solutions (“Broadcom Software”).

name: MedConnect
description: Driven by the wealth of experience and extensive knowledge amassed over more than two decades in the Information and Communication Technology (ICT) sector, MedConnect was founded with a visionary purpose to redefine healthcare. Our founders bring a profound understanding of ICT, allowing us to seamlessly integrate cutting-edge technologies into the healthcare landscape. With a foundation rooted in over 20 years of ICT expertise, we have consistently achieved significant milestones, earning trust as a pioneering force in the healthcare industry. From introducing groundbreaking Telemedicine, Artificial Intelligence, and IoT solutions to delivering state-of-the-art medical devices and instruments, MedConnect’s growth is a testament to our founders’ commitment to advancing patient care and transforming healthcare workflows.

name: MarocAnnonces.com
description:
Proudly Morocco’s #1 online recruitment platform, we connect millions of job seekers with thousands of businesses, including recruitment agencies, multinational corporations, HR professionals, and SMEs who trust our platform to power their hiring needs.

- Over 600,000 resumes delivered to clients every month
- More than 5,000 new job offers posted monthly
- A database of 1M+ qualified CVs.  

While many startups spend years chasing profitability, MarocAnnonces Jobs is already there, achieving an impressive 181% revenue growth in 2024, and we’re just getting started. 

With a scalable model, strong brand, and loyal client base, we are Morocco’s frontrunner in digital recruitment.

Backed by a stable political and economic climate and a surge in foreign investment, Morocco is entering a new era of digital hiring, and MarocAnnonces Jobs is leading the way.

We are now opening the door to visionary investors.
Trusted by thousands. Profitable and growing. Let’s grow together.

name: MediaCaris
description:
MediaCaris est une entreprise de services en nouvelles technologies de l'information, dotée de capacités de premier plan dans les domaines du numérique, du cloud, Big Data et de la sécurité. Chaque jour, nos collaborateurs tiennent la promesse de la technologie et de l'ingéniosité humaine, en servant des clients dans divers domaines d'activités (Industrie, Santé, Banque et Finance...).
Nous embrassons le pouvoir du changement pour créer de la valeur et un succès partagé pour nos clients, nos collaborateurs, nos partenaires et nos communautés.

name: MEDIASTORE le spécialiste du stockage de données au Maroc
description:
Depuis sa création à 1995, MEDIASTORE se positionne sur le marché en proposant une gamme de produits d’une qualité reconnue sur le plan mondial à des prix compétitifs en assurant un stock important avec une disponibilité immédiate.
La politique commerciale désignée par MEDIASTORE vise le droit exclusif de vendre uniquement aux revendeurs, le réseau compte plus de deux mille revendeurs à travers le territoire national.
Aujourd’hui, MEDIASTORE, distributeur informatique au Maroc, a développé son activité dans le domaine de sauvegarde et stockage en offrant un niveau de qualité qui fait de ses produits le choix idéal pour tous les profils de clients.

name: Medical Systems Co Ltd
description:
Medisys founded in 1989, is a leading medical IT specializing in advanced healthcare IT solutions. With a strong commitment to innovation, Medisys delivers fully multilingual systems supporting English, Turkish, Arabic, French, Malay, Bengali, and more, ensuring seamless integration across diverse healthcare markets.
Operating in Saudi Arabia, Malaysia, Turkey, Bangladesh, Egypt, and the UAE, Medisys serves over 35,000 users, including hospitals, clinics, and medical institutions. Backed by 100+ highly skilled professionals, the company leverages over 350 years of collective expertise in healthcare it driving efficiency and digital transformation While each regional branch operates independently, Saudi remains the foundation strategic vision and growth. To expand its global presence, company has established Malaysia as its international coordination hub, reinforcing its commitment to delivering cutting-edge IT solutions. With a strong emphasis on innovation and excellence

name: Medias24
description: Médias24 is an online Moroccan business newspaper that provides information on business, markets, data, and economic analysis. Find all the latest economic, political, social, and cultural news in Morocco live and in real time, in photos and videos with Médias24. Our newspaper is committed to providing you with accurate, original information without bias towards operators.

description: Mediot, a subsidiary of the ABA TECHNOLOGY group, is fully committed to national technological Sovereignty, Mediot operates as a responsible corporate citizen by offering accessible solutions specifically tailored to national needs, including solutions for medical deserts in rural areas.

name: Medlit Tech Sarl / Walit Srl
description: Subsidiary of the Italian renowned Walit Srl, Medlit has been set up to offer the best quality in IT services to the Arab world. Our multiculturalism is one of our most significant strengths, allowing us to better and promptly understand any clients’ needs and requests. The technical quality accrued in Italy over the years and a deep knowledge of the Arab market is the combination that distinguishes us from any other competitor. Medlit can offer the best ecommerce solution tailored to any marketing and selling needs. Magento, Shopify, Salesforce, WooCommerce, Shopware are all technologies that Medlit can skillfully adopt to meet clients' demands. In addition, we have a strong expertise in AI technologies, having developed our own chatbot software to assist clients in B2B or B2C relationships.

name: MentorClass Academy
description:
MentorClass Academy is a pioneering e-learning platform that offers high-quality video masterclasses led by renowned African mentors. Our mission is to democratize access to knowledge and inspiration by showcasing the journeys, insights, and expertise of successful professionals, entrepreneurs, artists, and changemakers from across the continent. Each masterclass is designed to be both educational and motivational, enabling learners to grow personally and professionally by learning directly from relatable role models.

The platform stands out through its cinematic video quality, local language content, and structured storytelling. MentorClass Academy serves a wide audience including individual learners, organizations, and academic institutions, making it a versatile tool for personal development, employee training, and student engagement.

MentorClass Academy is more than a learning platform—it's a movement to empower African talent through storytelling and accessible mentorship.

name: MedLung
description: In sub-Saharan Africa, the demand for affordable and reliable breathing assistance devices is critical. Due to the high costs of acquisition and transport from Europe and North America, many medical centers lack access to these essential devices. As a result, patients in respiratory distress are often treated with direct oxygen support or manually ventilated using an Ambu bag, both of which have limitations. Oxygen support is only effective for those with normal lung function, while manual ventilation is labor-intensive, requiring round-the-clock human effort - resources that are often unavailable. These challenges contribute to high mortality rates for respiratory distress patients in underserved communities. Hence, our mission is to design and manufacture portable, affordable respiratory devices tailored to the unique needs of sub-Saharan Africa. By providing alternative power supplies and ensuring cost-effectiveness, we aim to save lives and transform healthcare in the region.

name: METRIXWARE
description:
Since 1991, Metrixware Systemobjects has been designing and marketing products and technologies for the modernisation, maintenance and deployment of strategic applications at the heart of the businesses of major groups, public administrations and SMEs in France, West Africa and internationally.
Metrixware Systemobjects maintains a strong capacity for expertise and innovation by dedicating a significant proportion of its investments to R&D and supporting customers in strategic projects, the raison d'être of our products.

name: Mestanza Group
description:
At Mestanza Group, we believe healthcare is a universal right — yet access is still limited by staffing shortages and inefficient systems. That’s why we created FlowMemo: a digital health platform that connects professionals with patients anywhere in the world. It eliminates paperwork and even typing, allowing providers to focus on what matters: human connection. From real-time documentation to guided self-help modules and smart triage, FlowMemo makes care more accessible, efficient, and human.

Alongside this, our AI-powered e-learning platform helps businesses and institutions transfer high-level skills without the need for extra staff. Say goodbye to expensive, repetitive training setups — and hello to an interactive AI coach that adapts to the learner, holds conversations, and supports individual growth where it’s needed most. Scalable, intelligent, and cost-effective: we are reshaping how people learn.

name: MFI Maroc
description:
MFI is a technology company that’s continuously pursuing progress. We provide smart solutions and services that redefine how the world communicates and shares information. 

For four decades, MFI has and continues to support cutting edge document, IT, commercial and professional print solutions and equipment to clients all over the continent, with our team of over 700 glocal experts servicing 18 countries across Africa. 

We deliver solutions with purpose, because we believe in our clients’ vision, and we want to partner with them to achieve their goals. That, for us, is the true definition of pursuing progress. A journey of mutual success for all our clients, and for MFI.

name: Microfuse Computer Technologies Limited
description:
Introduction:
Microfuse bridges the digital divide by providing affordable, energy-efficient computing solutions for students. The company empowers learners in underserved communities, ensuring access to education, regardless of location or economic background.

Mission:
To break barriers to education with affordable, energy-efficient solutions that foster equitable access to quality learning.

Core Values:
Innovation, Accessibility, Sustainability, Empowerment, Integrity.

Key Products & Services:

Affordable computing devices (laptops, tablets, desktops)
Energy-efficient technology with solar charging
Educational software & digital libraries
Digital literacy & training programs
Technical support & after-sales services
Impact:
Microfuse has impacted 20+ schools, enabling students to access digital education.

Future Plans:
Expanding to more schools, R&D, and exploring local manufacturing.

name: Microleer Biopolymers LLP
description:
Microleer is a pioneering biomaterials startup that transforms agricultural waste into high-quality vegan leather using advanced fermentation technology. Our innovative process upcycles plant-based residues into durable, sustainable, and eco-friendly textile alternatives, offering a viable replacement for traditional animal and synthetic leather.

We provide extensive customization options, allowing brands to tailor textures, patterns, and colors to their unique design needs. Our vegan leather mimics the look and feel of traditional leather while offering superior sustainability and performance.

Committed to reducing environmental impact, Microleer minimizes resource consumption, carbon emissions, and chemical waste. Our materials cater to industries such as fashion, automotive, and upholstery, providing cruelty-free and biodegradable solutions. By innovating at the intersection of biotechnology and material science, Microleer is shaping the future of sustainable materials.

name: Million Coders
description: Million Coders is a global tech community dedicated to democratizing coding education and nurturing future innovators. We offer free access to high-quality coding courses, certifications from Acacia University and other global institutions, and exclusive opportunities to participate in our year-long international hackathon program with a prize pool of 20000$. Top performers win scholarships of up to 80% and cash prizes, with regional winners flown to Singapore for the grand finale. Members also benefit from mentorship by industry experts, internships with leading tech companies, and job placement support. Our community spans schools, colleges, and professional networks, with active collaborations with NGOs and corporate CSR programs across Africa, Asia, and the Middle East. Million Coders also supports open-source contributions, local chapters, and tech event partnerships, ensuring members are engaged, empowered, and globally connected.

name: MIFA MUSIQUE
description:
MIFA Musique is part of the renowned 75-year old Moroccan Holding MIFA Group, which operates in 3 main branches:
1- Mobility & Leisure/Entertainment,
2- Professional Equipment (lifting & handling equipments, equipments for professional fishing and aquaculture) and Aquaculture
3- Services (financial services and télécommunications)
Founded in 1995, MIFA Musique has become over the years the leading provider in North Africa for musical instruments and high-quality professional audio solutions. representing YAMAHA,POWERSOFT,AUDIO-TECHNICA,LDA ,FOCAL & more. As a recognized reference in Morocco, MIFA Musique mission is both simple and ambitious: to offer high quality instruments and innovative sound solutions accessible to all Moroccans, from enthusiasts to professionals.
MIFA Musique operates through various locations in Casablanca, Rabat, Marrakech, Agadir, Fès,Tangier, either through company-owned stores or in collaboration with authorized dealers and large retail chains.

name: Midwich
description:
À Lyon et à Paris, SIDEV s’affirme comme un leader incontournable des solutions audiovisuelles (spécialiste vidéo, audio et communication unifiée), à destination des professionnels depuis plus de 30 ans.

Filiale du Groupe Midwich, premier distributeur de solutions audiovisuelles, SIDEV s’appuie sur un partenariat fort et durable avec les plus grandes marques du marché et sur l’expertise de ses 90 collaborateurs engagés et passionnés.

In Lyon and Paris, SIDEV has been a leading provider of audiovisual solutions (specialising in video, audio and unified communications) for professionals for over 30 years.

As a subsidiary of the Midwich Group, the leading distributor of audiovisual solutions, SIDEV relies on strong, long-term partnerships with the biggest brands on the market and on the expertise of its 90 committed and passionate employees.
sectors: Consumer Tech, Smart Home & Smart Workplace

name: Mindware
description: Mindware, a leading IT distributor in the MEA region, offering top-quality global brands to over 6,000 partners with legal entities in 14 countries. With a rich history dating back to 1991, Mindware's  is committed to empower businesses with cutting-edge IT solutions, AI technologies, and fostering digital transformation. Mindware's offering encompasses a selection of leading brands in infrastructure, networking, security, storage, and AI solutions. As part of its Value-Added Distribution methodology, Mindware provides value-added services to its reselling partners including pre-sales consultancy, implementation services, local technical support, AI enablement, marketing enablement tools, and multiple channel-enabling programs. Supported by strategically positioned logistic centres in key locations, Mindware ensures seamless distribution across all channels, efficiently catering to the needs of its esteemed partners and customers in both traditional IT and emerging AI landscapes.

name: Ministry of Health and Social Protection
description: The Ministry of Health is the Moroccan Ministry in charge of implementing government policies related to citizens' health. It was established on 1955 during the establishment of the first Moroccan government after independence.

name: MipihSIB
description: With over 30 years of expertise and 1,400 employees, the Public Interest Group MipihSIB contributes to the evolution of healthcare systems by supporting its members in their digital transformation.

name: Ministry of ICT and National Guidance
description: The Ministry of ICT and National Guidance is committed to fostering digital transformation and national development through the strategic use of Information and Communication Technology (ICT). We focus on enhancing governance, promoting innovation, and guiding the country toward a knowledge-based economy.

name: MIRAHTEC
description:
Our vision is to transform ideas into technological innovations to solve complex challenges and improve people's quality of life. 

Mirahtec is an innovative software development company specializing in the creation of custom web and mobile solutions to meet the unique needs of its clients. Our technical expertise and commitment to excellence enable us to deliver high-quality products and exceptional services.

Mirahtec’s ambition is also to become the very first LoRaWAN Network Operation in francophone West Africa.

name: MLR s.r.l.
description: WuvDay by MLR is an innovative digital platform that empowers media companies and journalists to acquire verified images and videos quickly and efficiently. Designed to combat disinformation, WuvDay ensures the integrity of content through its lifecycle, from acquisition to distribution. Our platform offers flexible solutions for real-time content acquisition and certification, guaranteeing accuracy and authenticity. With a user-friendly interface and robust security measures, WuvDay supports media professionals in maintaining high standards of trustworthiness and credibility in visual reporting.

name: MOBIBLANC
description: Arrabet Holding, un innovateur technologique de premier plan, regroupe Mobiblanc, Foster Processing et The Frontline Unit. Mobiblanc se spécialise dans les services "Build & Run", allant du développement front-end au back-end, en passant par les solutions low-code, la maintenance des applications, les équipes augmentées, le service de capacité, la conception UX et l'assurance qualité. Foster Processing excelle dans l'"Intégration", proposant l'intégration bancaire, les plateformes de fidélité, la gestion des données, les soins numériques, l'automatisation terrain, les suites CRM et les workflows métier. The Frontline Unit se concentre sur la stratégie IT avec des expertises en DevOps, TOm-IT et Flash-IT. Ensemble, ils pilotent la transformation digitale, les solutions cloud, la cybersécurité et le développement logiciel personnalisé à l'échelle mondiale. Au GITEX 2025, Arrabet présentera des solutions de pointe pour un avenir connecté.

name: MITSUMI DISTRIBUTION
description:
We are a premier IT, Telco, AI, and Enterprise distributor, with a specialization in hardware, telecommunications, networking, and storage solutions, catering to the
 Middle East and Africa (MEA) region.

name: MMCY Tech
description:
MMCY Tech is a strategic BPO partner committed to empowering organizations with cost-effective, efficient, and specialized talent that drive significant growth. With a global network of over 500 highly skilled professionals, we deliver customized services that help businesses scale, adapt, and thrive in an ever-evolving landscape.
Our mission is to provide top-tier talent and expertise, fostering collaboration and operational excellence to ensure our clients' long-term success. We thrive to be the premier provider of BPO services, recognized for our innovative approach and unwavering commitment to client satisfaction.
At MMCY Tech, we provide scalable solutions that adapt to evolving business needs. Our expansive global talent network allows us to seamlessly deliver services across borders, ensuring access to top resources anywhere. Our rapid onboarding minimizes disruption, enabling clients to achieve results faster.

name: Mobdie
description: Mobdie is a Moroccan EdTech startup dedicated to inspiring creativity and developing STEM skills in children aged 4 to 16. We offer hands-on educational kits and engaging workshops that introduce young learners to science and technology in a fun, interactive way. Our approach blends digital learning tools with physical activities to create a unique, immersive experience. Each product is designed with cultural relevance, integrating Moroccan heritage into the learning journey. Mobdie partners with schools, institutions, and tourism establishments to expand access to quality STEM education across Morocco. Our mission is to empower the next generation with critical thinking, problem-solving, and innovation skills that will prepare them for the future.

name: MOBYS LLC
description:
International Exhibition Marketing
Exhibition Stand Construction.
Exhibition VR/XR
Your reliable partner in any exhibition activity in Russia and more than 50 other countries

name: Mogzit
description:
Mogzit.com is an Uber-like nanny service that connects professional nannies with parents, providing secure, trusted, and reliable in-home care. We emphasize a rigorous vetting process and background checks to ensure quality and safety. Our platform features live tracking, live chatting, and review & recommendation systems for an easy booking process. Customers can book time slots as needed, and our target market includes working parents, the international community, daycares, preschools, and government employees.
Our vision is to be the market leader in Africa and the most trusted partner for in-home care services.
Key Differentiators:
Tech: Internet-based browsing and booking
Trusted Vetting Process: Interview, background check, and guarantee.
Flexible Services: From a few hours to months
Various Services: Part-time nanny, on-demand nanny, elderly care, non-medical care
Training Programs: In-person training, comprehensive Nanny Manual in Amharic, online professional skills course.

name: Mohammed VI Polytechnic University (UM6P)
description: UM6P is a Moroccan university committed to research, innovation, and talent development to address Africa’s and global challenges. With 7,229 students, including 995 PhD candidates from 40 nationalities, it fosters education with strong industry ties. From its main campus in Benguerir and branches in Rabat, Laayoune, Paris, and Montreal, UM6P promotes innovation through Living Labs and peer-to-peer learning. Its academic and research programs span science, technology, business, humanities, and medicine, following a problem-solving research approach. By integrating education, research, and industry collaboration, UM6P empowers a new generation of leaders to drive sustainable progress. Designed to serve Africa while making a global impact, UM6P stands as a hub of knowledge, shaping the continent’s future through pioneering solutions and transformative learning experiences.

name: Moddakir Bussines service company
description: Moddakir is a leading technology company specializing in developing innovative digital solutions, with a strong foundation in Quranic learning applications. Over time, Moddakir has expanded its services to include white-label platforms, SaaS solutions, and custom interactive tools. Today, we serve over 1.5 million users in more than 150 countries, supported by 3,000+ service providers. Our solutions empower individuals and organizations globally through scalable, engaging, and effective digital experiences. Moddakir was proudly selected among the top 100 startups worldwide in the Entrepreneurship World Cup.

name: MODCOD & NEARSECURE
description:
Founded in 2018 in Morocco, Modcod is a leading company with proven expertise in the integration of Cybersecurity solutions and connectivity systems (WiFi, Networks, Broadband connectivity).

Thanks to the expertise of our teams and their mobility in Morocco and abroad, Modcod offers turnkey services across the entire value chain of integration: presales engineering, supply and configuration of solutions, integration and commissioning, training, support and maintenance.

name: Monsterlabs Technologies Limited (MAXIM)
description:
Maxim is redefining credit access in Africa with its next-generation financial solutions. At the core of this transformation is the multi-currency Maxim Credit Card— a flexible, zero-interest credit card designed for income earners, and upwardly mobile Africans, starting with Nigeria.

In the past months, Maxim has successfully onboarded its first batch of users, validating its model and paving the way for broader adoption.

The Maxim Credit Card offers seamless digital onboarding, exclusive membership perks, and smart financial tools that encourage responsible spending. 

Maxim is more than just a credit card provider—it is shaping a new credit culture in Africa, giving individuals the financial flexibility they need to thrive.

name: MoorAI
description: MoorAI is a Moroccan AI startup offering secure, locally-hosted Generative AI solutions through an AI-as-a-Service (AIaaS) platform. We address key challenges faced by businesses and government institutions, including data sovereignty, infrastructure costs, and the complexity of deploying large AI models. By partnering with Moroccan data centers and ensuring compliance with national regulations (DGSSN, CNDP, Law 09-08), we provide organizations with full control over their data. Our platform enables easy access to advanced AI tools, with flexible pricing and simplified deployment, making AI more accessible to startups, enterprises, and public institutions. Future offerings include a no-code builder for chatbots and ready-to-use AI agents, supporting Morocco’s digital transformation and economic growth.

name: Mon-assurance
description:
Led by Azur Solutions, Mon-assurance innovates by digitizing the comparison of offers, underwriting, and claims management.

1. Comparison of offers: The market lacks transparency regarding rates and guarantees. Mon-assurance allows customers to easily compare offers for an informed choice, also promoting healthy competition between insurers.

2. Digital underwriting: Thanks to a 100% digital process, users obtain instant quotes and subscribe in just a few clicks, without having to travel, thus simplifying access to insurance.

3. Claims management: Mon-assurance centralizes the reporting, tracking, and processing of claims, offering faster and more efficient support.

By combining these three services, Mon-assurance, developed by Azur Solutions, is revolutionizing the insurance market in West Africa.

name: MoraKaba
description:
Financial crime costs the global economy over $2 trillion annually, making compliance more complex than ever. Morakaba is an innovative RegTech platform helping banks, fintechs, and regulators streamline Anti-Money Laundering and Combating the Financing of Terrorism (AML/CFT) compliance through automation, real-time monitoring, and seamless risk assessment.

Our mission is to revolutionize financial compliance with a scalable, efficient, and modular solution. We provide: Automated KYC & Risk Scoring, Real-Time Monitoring & Sanctions Screening, Regulatory Compliance Across MENA & Africa, and Seamless API Integration for easy adoption.

Morakaba minimizes costs, strengthens security, and ensures full compliance. Let’s shape the future of RegTech together!

name: MORATEL
description:
La radiocommunication a été depuis longtemps la solution de communication la plus adaptée aux usages professionnels tel que les services de sécurité, les services d’urgence, les services aux citoyens ainsi que diverses utilisations industrielles.

Moratel propose des solutions de radiocommunication basée sur une technologie numérique de pointe, idéales pour les structures souhaitant fiabiliser leurs communications, augmenter leur productivité, optimiser leur coût d’organisation sur le terrain et maîtriser le déroulement de leurs opérations même en temps de crise ou lors des événements à forte saturation des réseaux téléphoniques conventionnels.
