Services de communication des solutions de communications MCX
Services de communication des solutions de communications MCX
Services de communications des solutions PMR TETRA

name: Morogo AI
description:
Morogo is an AI-powered travel platform transforming the way visitors explore Morocco. We create fully personalized itineraries based on each traveler’s interests, budget, and travel style—highlighting must-see attractions, hidden gems, transport options, and authentic experiences.

Beyond trip planning, Morogo leverages AI trained on thousands of local products to provide real price estimates and prevent tourist scams. Users can also shop securely from our network of verified local stores.

We're building an interactive 3D digital companion to accompany travelers during their journey, offering real-time information, nearby recommendations, and smart suggestions for places to visit or dine—tailored to their preferences.

Soon, Morogo will also offer the ability to book tickets for local events and activities directly through the platform, creating an all-in-one travel companion that’s smart, safe, and enriching.

name: Moroccan Investement & Export Developement Agency
description: Morocco’s Investment and Export Development Agency is in charge of promoting national and foreign investment as well as export of goods and services.

name: MOSCOW EXPORT CENTER
description:
Moscow Export Center is a unique platform for establishing international business relations, developing and enhancing mutual export/import capacity.

Moscow Export Center provides full information about companies and guarantees safe partnerships.
     
Moscow export center organizes business meetings in Match-Making format between Moscow exporters and potential buyers, and technology tours to company workshops and offices.

During business meetings, Moscow export center provides translators, transfers around Moscow, and conference rooms for free

name: Movements Inc.
description:
Movements Inc. is a technology-driven company specializing in Digital Twin-X (DTX) solutions for construction lifecycle management. Our innovative platform enhances underground utilities management, smart city planning, and infrastructure development by integrating AI, IoT, and geospatial technologies. 

We help governments, urban developers, and private enterprises digitize, monitor, and optimize their assets, reducing project risks and improving operational efficiency. Our expertise spans data-driven decision-making, real-time asset tracking, and predictive analytics, ensuring sustainable and resilient infrastructure.

With a strong presence in Vietnam, Southeast Asia, and beyond, Movements Inc. collaborates with government agencies, engineering firms, and technology partners to drive digital transformation in the built environment. Our mission is to redefine infrastructure management through advanced digital twin technology, shaping the cities of tomorrow.

name: Mouja
description:
Mouja is Morocco’s first all-in-one digital platform dedicated to surf tourism and the blue economy. Powered by AI, Mouja offers smart trip planning, real-time surf forecasts, and a seamless booking system for accommodations and water activities across 60+ Moroccan surf spots. 

The platform empowers local tourism businesses—such as hotels, surf camps, and tour providers—through digital profiles, marketing tools, and reservation management. Mouja also supports coastal cooperatives and artisans through an integrated e-commerce marketplace for selling local products. 

Our mission is to revolutionize surf travel while promoting sustainable tourism and digital inclusion. Mouja is trusted by over 200 tourism businesses and 80+ cooperatives across 9 of Morocco’s 12 regions.

name: Muqbis
description:
Muqbis is a tailored marketplace that revolutionizes the MEA handicrafts industry through tech, bridging artisans' unique creations to customers’ doorsteps.

We passionately champion the handcrafts industry, recognizing the immense potential within artisans' skilled hands. Our mission-driven platform empowers craftsmen and women, particularly home-based artisans, by providing digital tools, seamless onboarding, and global access—without the hassle of managing logistics.

Aligned with SDGs 8 & 12, we foster economic growth, gender equality, and sustainable practices, ensuring fair trade and cultural preservation. By blending tradition with innovation, Muqbis combats the fading of heritage crafts in a fast-moving, mechanized world.

Our AI-driven personalization, integrated logistics, and scalable marketplace make us unique.  We create impact-driven opportunities, empowering artisans, promoting sustainability, and celebrating creativity—one exquisite creation at a time

name: MTDS
description:
MTDS’s mission is to contribute to its clients’ success by providing them with innovative technological solutions and services tailored to their needs. The company strives to support its clients in their digital transformation by offering consulting, installation, maintenance, and IT infrastructure management services.

MTDS aims to help its clients achieve their objectives while promoting security, connectivity, and operational efficiency. MTDS is also committed to supporting development initiatives by providing appropriate technologies and working with local and international partners to contribute to social and economic progress.

name: MYCOPHYTO
description: MYCOPHYTO provides concrete solutions for regenerative agriculture. The company, founded in 2017, develops unique biological soil revitalization solutions to reduce water and chemical fertilizer inputs (up to 20% reduction in water and synthetic fertilizers) through the optimization of associations between plants and mycorrhizal fungi adapted to each territory and each crop.

name: My-Money SRL
description: My-Money is a pioneering fintech company revolutionizing digital payments with biometric, device-free transactions. By eliminating the need for cards, mobile phones, or PINs, My-Money ensures seamless, secure, and frictionless payments using only biometric authentication. Designed for everyday payments, it enhances accessibility for everyone, including those who may struggle with traditional payment methods. My-Money promotes financial inclusion offering a universal and intuitive solution that empowers individuals of all backgrounds to transact effortlessly, fostering a more inclusive and connected digital economy. Paying has never been easier—just yourself, no cards, no phones, no hassle.

name: N+ONE DATACENTERS
description:
N+ONE DATACENTERS is a leader in hyperscale data center infrastructure and colocation across Africa, N+ONE DATACENTERS delivers resilient and scalable solutions to address the mission-critical demands of modern enterprises. Our state-of-the-art infrastructure features next-generation Edge and Hyperscale Data Centers, enhanced by an integrated Multi-Cloud platform provided by our sister company OneCloud, connecting Africa with global cloud leaders.

N+ONE DATACENTERS offers a comprehensive ecosystem meticulously designed to facilitate digital transformation and ensure operational continuity for businesses of all sizes.
sectors: Design & Product Development - Digitizing of Components
Design & Product Development - Drawing & Document Management
Design & Product Development - Engineering and part design

name: Myriad
description:
Myriad fournit des plateformes intégrées, robustes, modulables, et sécurisées mais aussi des APIs ouverts. Nos plateformes voient transiter quotidiennement + de 75 millions de transactions, connectant ainsi + de 100 millions d’utilisateurs à des services financiers essentiels. 
Nous couvrons tous les canaux pour offrir une gamme complète et diversifiée.
Notre plateforme Myriad Fintech (Fintech-as-a-Service) offre une solution clé en main pour lancer rapidement des services financiers digitaux de pointe, sans avoir à développer une infrastructure complexe, de réduire le temps de mise sur le marché et s'adapter aux besoins variés des utilisateurs, tout en assurant la conformité aux régulations locales. 
Notre plateforme Myriad Connect (USSD) basée sur le cloud permet à nos clients de créer rapidement et facilement de nouveaux services pour connecter tous leurs utilisateurs mobiles à des services dans divers secteurs, auparavant inaccessibles aux clients non connectés à Internet.

name: Mymenu
description:
Mymenu allows restaurants to create their own ordering website in less than 5 min - No technical skills required.
It's a Saas model that charges 3 dhs per order.

name: NABADY
description:
Nabady is a leading healthcare platform dedicated to connecting patients with clinics and doctors through an innovative, AI-powered digital ecosystem.
Our platform streamlines appointment scheduling, enhances communication, and offers seamless access to medical services, empowering patients to take control of their healthcare journey. 
Healthcare professionals benefit from robust tools to manage appointments, optimize workflows, and improve patient engagement. Nabady also enables doctors to efficiently manage medical records and handle accounting tasks, providing an all-in-one solution for modern medical practices.
Committed to excellence and innovation, Nabady transforms the healthcare experience for both patients and providers, fostering efficiency, accessibility, and better health outcomes for all.

name: nabta.ma
description:
Nabta.ma is Morocco’s first AI-powered platform revolutionizing agriculture with cutting-edge technology. Our services include:

 - AI Plant Disease Detection: Instantly identify and diagnose plant diseases from over 33,000 possible conditions using advanced AI.

 - Satellite Services: Monitor crop health, soil conditions, and weather patterns through satellite data for better decision-making.

 - Instant Online Store Creation: Farmers can set up their own e-commerce store in minutes, selling products directly to customers.

Smart Agricultural Solutions: Access expert insights, strategic market support, and innovative tools to optimize farming operations.

Nabta.ma empowers farmers with technology to increase productivity, reduce losses, and connect with buyers easily. Join us in shaping the future of smart agriculture in Morocco!

name: NAJIM SYSTEMS
description:
NAJIM SYSTEMS is a premier provider of security and communication solutions founded in 2009. With years of experience and a diverse project portfolio, we have established ourselves as a leader in our industry, delivering innovative and reliable solutions to clients across various industries and regions.

Our commitment to delivering exceptional services has earned us recognition as a top player in our field. In 2021, NAJIM SYSTEMS was named among the best 60 internet , best 34 industrial, best 17 security, and best 11 IoT companies in KSA by BestStartup.asia. In 2022, we were honored to be recognized as one of the best 29 public safety companies and best 19 smart building companies in the Arab World by the same organization.

We offer a comprehensive range of services, including Robotics for customs applications, Voice Assistant and Virtual Avatars, Multi-vendor integration, biometric identification, Analytics, Tracking and Telemetry.

name: NAG
description:
NAG is a leading telecom and IT solution provider with 20 years of expertise. Since 2004, NAG has been serving customers in over 25 countries across the CIS and Middle East, offering a comprehensive range of solutions, including:
- Equipment for telecom operators
- L2 and L3 networking solutions
- SOHO WiFi routers and IPTV STBs
- Intelligent video surveillance systems with analytics
- Infrastructure and power supply solutions
- Container and full-scale data centers
- Precise cooling solutions for data centers
NAG is committed to delivering innovative and reliable solutions to meet the evolving needs of its clients.
sectors: Consumer Tech, Smart Home & Smart Workplace

name: Navwok Technology
description: Navwok is a pioneering social enterprise dedicated to empowering individuals with visual impairments through innovative assistive technology. Our flagship product, the Navwok smart cane, integrates AI-powered navigation, real-time object detection, and haptic feedback to enhance mobility and independence. The cane seamlessly connects with a mobile app, providing turn-by-turn voice guidance and situational awareness. Through partnerships with NGOs and accessibility organizations, we aim to distribute Navwok globally, ensuring affordability and accessibility. Our vision is to create a world where individuals with visual impairments navigate with confidence, security, and freedom, transforming lives through cutting-edge innovation.

name: Naseej for Technology
description:
Naseej for Technology is a leading solutions provider committed to harnessing digital transformation in learning and knowledge management. Serving academic institutes, cultural and knowledge centers, and government and corporate sectors, Naseej offers MEDAD Cloud Platforms, e-Services Platforms, Business Process Automation, and more. With over three decades of expertise, Naseej has developed deep insights into regional digital transformation needs and operational challenges. Its dedication to long-term partnerships makes it the trusted choice for 500+ organizations seeking innovative technologies and measurable ROI. At the forefront of digital transformation, Naseej delivers ecosystems that redefine how institutions learn, innovate, and operate. Through cutting-edge solutions, Naseej streamlines processes, enhances user experiences, and fosters sustainable growth—empowering institutions to thrive in an ever-evolving world.

For more information about Naseej please visit www.naseej.com

name: NATIONAL PORTS AGENCY
description:
A key player in the Moroccan port landscape, the National Ports Agency unites the entire port community around common objectives.
The National Ports Agency works to create a competitive port environment that fosters fair and sustainable development, characterised by fair competition, efficiency, transparency and good governance, and guarantees safe, high-quality services. 
The ports managed by the National Ports Agency occupy a privileged position as an instrument for promoting economic and social development, and play a key role in the country's foreign trade, over 98% of which is carried by sea. 
Given the strategic importance of this sector, the National Ports Agency has adopted a proactive policy aimed at consolidating its port facilities by developing and maintaining existing port infrastructures, both on the Atlantic and Mediterranean coasts, in ports of various sizes and activities.

name: Nazar Explorer
description:
Nazar Web Agency is a leading digital solutions provider specializing in immersive technologies for the tourism and hospitality industry. We create 360° virtual tours, VR experiences, and interactive content to enhance customer engagement and boost online visibility. Our services include virtual tour production, augmented reality (AR) solutions, website development, SEO & SEA and digital marketing tailored for hotels, resorts, and destinations.

Our flagship product, Nazar Explorer, is an innovative application designed to revolutionize the tourist experience. Featuring virtual reality, augmented reality, and an AI-powered virtual guide, it allows travelers to explore destinations remotely, access interactive cultural content, and navigate sites with real-time digital assistance. Nazar Explorer bridges the gap between physical and digital travel, offering an engaging and informative journey for users worldwide.

name: NELIS MAROC
description:
NELIS MAROC is a smart mobile platform developed by YAAZ Company, a female-led tech startup founded by Yousra Elazzouzi. NELIS connects users with top wellness, beauty, and entertainment partners in Morocco. The app offers exclusive deals and gives instant cashback in NLX points with every purchase. These points can be used for discounts or rewards. Users can easily compare services and access expert content. The NELIS Club unlocks VIP benefits like boosted cashback, exclusive events, and personalized offers.
NELIS runs on a win-win business model: clients save money and enjoy top services, partners gain loyal customers, and NELIS grows through high engagement and smart monetization. It's a scalable, inclusive, and profitable ecosystem.

name: NetGuardians
description:
NetGuardians is an award-winning Swiss FinTech helping financial institutions in over 30 countries to fight fraud. More than 100 banks and wealth managers, including 45 percent of all Swiss cantonal banks and three of the top 10 private banks as ranked by Euromoney, rely on NetGuardians’ 3D artificial-intelligence (3D AI) solution to prevent fraudulent payments in real time. 

Banks using NetGuardians software have achieved an 85 percent reduction in customer friction, enjoy more than 75 percent lower operating costs and have detected new fraud cases. NetGuardians is the fraud-prevention partner of major banking software companies, including Finastra, Avaloq, Mambu and Finacle. Headquartered in Switzerland, the FinTech has offices in Singapore, Kenya and Poland.

name: Netstratum Technologies
description:
Netstratum is a leading global software product company that delivers innovative IT & Payments Platform solutions across industries. Specializing in product development, we leverage the latest technologies to build cutting-edge products tailored to meet diverse business needs. With a focus on driving measurable value and tangible results, Netstratum integrates emerging technologies to solve complex challenges and create lasting impact.
With offices in eight strategic locations worldwide, Netstratum is positioned to provide both global reach and local expertise, ensuring adaptability to regional markets while maintaining a focus on innovation.

name: Newrest Facility Management Services
description:
Performance and productivity: this is the promise that Newrest Facilities Management Services (NFMS) is convinced it can keep for its partners in its Facility Management segment.

With control of the working environment as its key area of expertise, NFMS has reinvented FM management with an innovative offering combining technology, service quality, solid operational skills and resource optimization.

Choosing Newrest Facilities Management Services means choosing a partner who values the well-being of your employees, so that you can concentrate on your core business with complete peace of mind.

With an exhaustive range of service lines, our offers are tailor-made to meet your needs, from single-skills to global infrastructure management.

Our aim is to build, together, an integrated solution to manage and optimize the costs of your general services, in non-negotiable compliance with your strategic and economic vision.

name: NETOPIA SOLUTIONS
description:
Since 2004, Netopia has been driving E-Gov transformation in Morocco and Africa, specializing in digitalization and the dematerialization of essential services to bring administrations closer to citizens. Our solutions, centered on innovation and collective intelligence, ensure data sovereignty and enhance public services through advanced digital strategies.

description:
The National Office of Railways (ONCF), established in 1963, is a public institution with industrial and commercial character (EPIC), possessing legal personality and financial autonomy. ONCF is guided by five core values:
- Safety: Ensuring transport under the best possible conditions while respecting safety rules.
- Excellence: Constantly improving with the desire to surpass itself.
- Transparency: Communicating openly and fostering trust.
- Discipline: Ensuring compliance with all rules and procedures.
- Commitment: Focused on teamwork and stakeholder satisfaction.

In addition to passenger and freight transport, the ONCF Group comprises subsidiaries in areas such as equipment maintenance, road transport, parcel services, hospitality, and railway training.

name: Ootentik
description:
Ootentik is an innovative Digital Product Passport (DPP) solution that enables brands to ensure transparency and product authenticity. Using an NFC system or a unique QR code, each product gains a secure digital identity, easily accessible via our mobile application.

Available on smartphones, the Ootentik app allows consumers to instantly verify a product's authenticity, access its history, and retrieve key information such as origin, certification, repair, and recycling. The solution also serves as a powerful weapon against counterfeiting, giving brands enhanced control over their products.

Companies can enrich the customer experience with interactive content and build loyalty through personalized features. All data is hosted on our own secure servers, ensuring performance and confidentiality. With Ootentik, brands comply with the latest DPP regulations while strengthening consumer trust.

name: ORAMA-System
description:
ORAMA-System was founded in 2021 by an experienced team of investors and engineers who have worked in the field of maritime freight container tracking.
The mission is to respond to the massification of connected objects through a unique approach that does not symmetrically require the massification of the Telecom infrastructure, costly in terms of land, energy and financial resources.
To this end, ORAMA-System offers the wireless solution ORAMA-Net.
Based on world-renowned LoRa technology, ORAMA-Net can be installed on any existing LoRa sensor and actuator through a software stack called ON-Node, and deployable in the field via our ON-Spot micro-station.
The ON-Node firmware is available in license mode for IoT devices manufacturers, and the ON-Spot micro station, produced by ORAMA-System, is available for sale to integrators and operators.
Our priority markets are IoT stakeholders involved in agriculture and environment, mining & underground activities, industry 4.0 and Smart-City

description:
Notre Vision :
Construire une Afrique intelligente et digitalisée
L'Afrique est en pleine transformation, avec un potentiel immense pour devenir un leader mondial dans l'innovation et la croissance.
L'avenir est prometteur, et nous sommes là pour vous aider à le réaliser.

- Cyber Security Assessment
- Monitoring

- Optimisation des itinéraires (réduction des distances parcourues)
- Diminution des coûts (jusqu’à -25% sur les dépenses logistiques)
- Prédiction précise des délais (meilleure satisfaction client)

This unique approach enables OVHcloud to independently cover all the uses of its customers so they can seize the benefits of an environmentally conscious model with a frugal use of resources and a carbon footprint reaching the best ratios in the industry. Digital Transformation & Custom Software
Deployment of innovative SaaS solutions, including our proprietary software BPC-AI, designed for financial planning and strategic project analysis.

name: PayTic
description:
PayTic is revolutionizing card program management through its comprehensive SaaS platform that seamlessly integrates Operations, Finance, Risk & Compliance, and Business Intelligence modules. Founded in 2020, this processor-agnostic solution eliminates traditional integration barriers with innovative drag-and-drop functionality—a first in the industry. The platform automates critical processes through direct API connections with Visa and Mastercard rails, transforming traditionally manual tasks like reconciliation, dispute management, and compliance reporting.
PayTic has demonstrated remarkable impact across its global client base spanning North America, UK, EU, and North Africa. Clients have realized $4M in annual savings through scheme invoice optimization, reduced manual processes by 10,000 hours, and achieved 20-25% operational cost savings.
PayTic: PCI Level 1 Compliant, cloud-based global solution outperforming competitors.

name: Phenix GmbH
description:
Phenix GmbH is a licensed software development company based in the Federal Republic of Germany, specializing in delivering innovative solutions for business management.

Our flagship product, Phenix Enterprise Management System, has been under continuous development since 2003. Designed as a comprehensive administrative solution, it caters to businesses across diverse sectors, including commercial, industrial, and service industries.

Over the years, Phenix GmbH has earned the trust of more than 15,000 customers across the Arab world. We remain committed to providing exceptional service and support through our regional offices, ensuring our clients' success and satisfaction.

name: Phoenix AI
description: HYPEO is an AI-powered influencer marketing SaaS platform that connects brands, agencies, and content creators to streamline the end-to-end management of influencer campaigns. Through an intelligent brief assistant, HYPEO helps brands define goals, target audience, and content types. Its AI Matching engine scores and recommends the most relevant influencers based on audience quality, engagement rate, and brand alignment. Agencies can manage multiple brands under one interface, while brands have full control over content validation, even when campaigns are managed externally. HYPEO automates offer sending, negotiation, contracts with e-signatures, and production tracking. Once content is published, real-time performance tracking and AI-generated reports provide deep insights and optimization recommendations. HYPEO simplifies influencer marketing while maximizing ROI through automation, data intelligence, and seamless collaboration.

name: Pigmentoco
description: PigmentOCO is a North African deeptech startup redefining the future of textile dyeing. We develop a waterless, toxin-free dyeing technology for cotton that eliminates wastewater and toxic chemical discharge, solving one of fashion’s dirtiest problems. Our process is not only clean, but also cost and energy efficient, giving manufacturers a competitive edge while meeting rising ESG standards. Built on cutting-edge research, PigmentOCO is scaling its innovation to serve textile producers committed to sustainable transformation. We are actively seeking strategic investors and forward-thinking manufacturers to pilot our solution and co-shape the future of clean dyeing. Join us in reshaping how cotton gets its color in a cleaner, smarter, and designed for a sustainable future.

name: Phosphate Valley Finance - DeepDev
description:
DeepDev specializes in crafting tailored digital solutions for businesses across France, Morocco and soon the Saudi Arabia and the UAE. We believe that every challenge is unique, and so is every solution we develop. Our approach is centered on understanding our partners' specific needs and delivering custom-built, high-performance software that drives efficiency and growth.

At DeepDev, we are committed to excellence at every stage—from timely delivery and uncompromising quality to ongoing support and innovation. Our promise? You’ll never walk alone. We build more than just software; we build long-term partnerships based on trust, reliability, and a shared vision for success.

Furthermore, we offer Software-as-a-Service SaaS solutions designed to tackle the everyday challenges our customers face. By combining efficiency, scalability, and innovation, we provide high-value solutions at a competitive cost, empowering businesses to optimize their operations without compromising on quality.

name: PINGYANG FEELTECK ELECTRIC.CO., LTD
description:
Feelteck is a professional money counter manufacturer for more than 13 years. Our factory is located at Wenzhou, China. It covers more than 8000sqm with standardized plant areas. Our team consists of more than 200 workers and 20 senior engineers. With an annual capacity of 20,000 per unit and over 50,000 units exported every year, Feelteck known as a trusted supplier.
?
We are specializing in research, development, production, sales, and after-sales services of high-quality money counters. Feelteck exports different units to clients around the world including Asia, Europe, the USA, Africa, Australia, and more.
?
Our wide range of products include mini money counters, mixed money counters, high-speed bill counters, portable money counters, automatic bill counters, counterfeit bill counters, and more. Each can be customized according to your requirements.

name: Piilz
description:
Piilz is a smart connected pill dispenser that automatically delivers the right medication at the right time, ensuring accurate and timely intake. If a dose is missed, it instantly alerts family members or caregivers via SMS, providing real-time monitoring and peace of mind.

But Piilz is more than just a dispenser – it features an intelligent conversational assistant that can engage with the patient, offer daily cognitive stimulation, and detect signs of distress or unusual behavior. In case of a fall, discomfort, or concerning response, the assistant can immediately notify the appropriate contacts, whether it’s a loved one, healthcare provider, or emergency service.

name: Pixii Motors
description: Pixii Motors is building a next-gen smart mobility ecosystem centered around 5G- and AI-powered electric scooters. Our flagship vehicle, SHADOW, features a fully independent smart cockpit, advanced safety systems, and real-time connectivity—eliminating the need for smartphones while riding. Beyond hardware, our ecosystem includes PULSE, a SaaS fleet management platform with geofencing, predictive maintenance, and analytics. Our flexible subscription model makes access easy for individuals and businesses, while upcoming battery swap stations ensure continuous uptime. With a custom OS and seamless integration, Pixii Motors combines intelligent software and sleek engineering to deliver safe, sustainable, and connected urban mobility. We bridge the gap between affordability and innovation, setting a new standard in micromobility.

name: PIYES.PRO
description: Piyes.pro is a B2B and B2C platform specializing in recycled auto parts, connecting garages, insurers, leasing companies, and individuals with verified parts from trusted dismantlers and vendors. Operating in Morocco and expanding across West Africa, Piyes.pro brings quality, traceability, and sustainability to a traditionally informal market. With over 5,000 successful transactions and a growing catalog of verified stock, the platform simplifies sourcing with online tools, WhatsApp, and a dedicated call center. It offers payment facilities, warranties, and reliable logistics. Targeting a recycled auto parts market estimated at over $5 billion in West Africa, Piyes.pro is modernizing the sector through a digital-first approach and strategic partnerships. Its mission is to build a circular economy that supports repair networks, reduces costs, and minimizes environmental impact by extending the life of automotive components.

name: POGO
description:
POGO is the first multimodal EV sharing startup in Morocco. We provide B2B & B2C short and long term rental of our EVs (mopeds & kick scooters) through our mobile App. 
At POGO, we currently have a fleet of around 500 EVs operational across 5 Moroccan cities (Fez, Agadir, Casablanca, Rabat & Benguerir). We already have + 20 000 active users, 
+2 Million travelled Km and + 300 T of saved CO2 emissions. We plan to reach a total of 3 000 EVs by the end of 2025 and a total of  6 000 EVs by the end of 2026.

name: Pintalent
description: GEEKFACT is a tech company specialized in smart solutions for HR and product development. We offer "Pintalent", a next-generation AI-powered ATS designed to simplify and accelerate the hiring process through automation, visual candidate tracking, real-time collaboration, and full GDPR compliance. With "Pinjob", we provide an intelligent assistant that helps candidates quickly find opportunities that match their profiles. "Roadmap360" supports product teams by centralizing feedback, prioritizing features, and effectively managing roadmaps. Our mission is to deliver powerful, intuitive tools that address today’s recruitment and innovation challenges.

name: Polyconseil
description:
As a strategy and IT, data, and telecom expertise firm, Polyconseil supports its clients in designing and delivering state-of-the-art digital solutions. Our services span from strategic scoping to production deployment, in order to unlock the potential of your IT, data, DevOps, and digital infrastructure projects.
Polyconseil has intervened in projects in Ivory Coast, Mauritania, Niger, Togo, and Guinea.

FR : Cabinet de stratégie et d’expertises IT, data et télécom, Polyconseil appuie ses clients dans la conception et la réalisation de solutions digitales à l’état de l’art. Nos prestations couvrent du cadrage stratégique à la mise en production, afin de libérer le potentiel de vos projets IT, data, DevOps, et d’infrastructures numériques.

Polyconseil est intervenu en Côte d’Ivoire, Mauritanie, Niger, Togo et Guinée, aussi bien dans le déploiement d’infrastructures numériques, la réalisation de plateformes Web, et l’accompagnement d’acteurs dans leur transformation numérique.

name: Pointel
description:
Pointel is an HR management software (HRMS) designed to help companies automate and optimize their human resources processes. It offers a centralized, all-in-one platform with key features such as payroll management, time tracking, leave and absence management, onboarding, and internal communication tools.
By streamlining HR operations, Pointel enhances efficiency, reduces administrative burdens, and improves workforce management. Its intuitive interface ensures easy adoption for businesses of all sizes, making HR tasks more seamless and data-driven.
With a focus on automation, compliance, and employee engagement, Pointel provides a reliable solution to modernize HR processes. Whether for small businesses or large enterprises, it adapts to unique needs, offering flexibility and scalability.
Empower your HR teams with Pointel and simplify the employee lifecycle from recruitment to offboarding—all in a single, powerful platform.

name: Portnet S.A.
description: PortNet, en tant que guichet unique national du commerce extérieur du Maroc , incarne la volonté de doter les acteurs économiques d’un outil durable au service de la performance collective. Véritable levier de compétitivité, il renforce les écosystèmes logistiques et ceux liés au commerce extérieur, en leur apportant anticipation, proactivité, traçabilité et maîtrise des coûts. Avec plus de 90 000 usagers, PortNet s’appuie sur les meilleures pratiques internationales en matière d’interopérabilité et sur des synergies issues de projets régionaux. Il facilite ainsi l’échange sécurisé de données, l’intégration des chaînes logistiques et la simplification des flux commerciaux entre fournisseurs et clients à l’échelle internationale.

name: PowerDMARC
description:
PowerDMARC is a domain security and email authentication SaaS platform that helps organizations protect their domain name, brand, and emails against spoofing, impersonation, ransomware, and other forms of unauthorized use. PowerDMARC provides a complete suite of hosted email security protocols such as DMARC, SPF, DKIM, BIMI, MTA-STS, and TLS-RPT, along with simplified reporting integrated with AI-powered Threat Intelligence. It helps organizations gain visibility on their email channels, improve email deliverability, and combat cyber attacks. PowerDMARC supports over 2000 organizations, from Fortune 100 companies to governments spanning over 90 countries. 

The PowerDMARC platform is DMARC MSP/MSSP ready, with multi-tenancy support and Whitelabel. PowerDMARC has 1000+ channel partners worldwide and is SOC2 Type 2, ISO 27001 Certified, and GDPR compliant.

name: PPI
description:
The Progressive Policy Institute is a catalyst for policy innovation and political reform. Based in Washington, D.C., with offices in the United Kingdom, the European Union, and Ukraine, PPI’s mission is to generate radically pragmatic ideas for governing that can help elected leaders restore confidence in liberal democracy at home and abroad.

PPI advocates for economic policies that are pro-worker, pro-business, and pro-innovation; for fiscally responsible public investment and fairer tax burdens; for dramatically expanding apprenticeships, work-study opportunities, and career pathways for non-college Americans; for lower health care and housing costs; for center-ground solutions to immigration and crime; for a realistic clean energy transition; for modernizing America’s outdated public education system; and for resolute U.S global leadership in defense of liberal democracy.

name: Prestige Digital Solutions - PDS
description: Founded in 1994, Prestige Digital Solutions (formerly Prestige Informatique) is a leading Moroccan IT services company (ESN) specialized in the development and integration of digital solutions. We offer a complete suite covering Electronic Mail Management (GEC), Business Process Management (BPM), Electronic Document Management (GED), and Digital Signature solutions (DDS). Our client base includes government institutions, ministries, and major financial organizations such as banks and insurance companies. Backed by over 30 years of expertise, we have successfully delivered complex and large-scale digital transformation projects in Morocco and across both French- and English-speaking Africa. Our mission is to empower organizations by optimizing their processes through innovative, secure, and AI-enhanced solutions.

name: Premium-Line Systems GmbH
description:
Premium-Line Systems GmbH with its seat in Germany is a part of a manufacturing group with more than 20 years of experience in the field of networking market. The Premium-Line system is a comprehensive solution for the network infrastructure, mainly designed in Europe, with the complete product portfolio, including patch cords, patch panels, outlets, keystones and workstation components for Cat. 5e, Cat. 6, Cat. 6A, Cat. 7, Cat. 8, fiber optic based structured cabling systems and Data Center.
Since the beginning of the nineties we have been devoted to researching and developing the modern signal transmission cable and the joint hardware. Through almost twenty years of efforts, we succeeded in developing of high performance tested network transmission products.
Thanks to our experience, we know how to optimize all the processes, using the available opportunities all over the world. Because we are flexible, we supply the Premium-Line solutions that meet all German quality standards.

name: PRESIGHT
description:
About Presight? 
Presight is an ADX-listed public company with Abu Dhabi based G42 as its majority shareholder and is a leading global big data analytics company powered by AI. It combines big data, analytics, and AI expertise to serve every sector, of every scale, to create business and positive societal impact. Presight excels at all-source data interpretation to support insight-driven decision-making that shapes policy and creates safer, healthier, happier, and more sustainable societies. Today, through its range of AI-driven products and solutions, Presight is bringing Applied Intelligence to the private and public sector, enabling them to realize their AI strategy and ambitions faster.????? 

For more information: www.presight.ai

name: PROCRECHE
description:
ProCreche is an innovative platform designed to enhance communication between schools and parents while ensuring seamless daily monitoring of children. With real-time updates, parents stay informed about their child’s activities, meals, and progress. Schools benefit from an intuitive interface to streamline communication, share important announcements, and manage daily interactions effortlessly.

Our secure and user-friendly solution strengthens trust between educators and families, providing a digital space to share memorable moments and key developmental milestones. Whether for preschools, daycare centers, or early learning institutions, ProCrèche bridges the gap between parents and educators, fostering a more connected and engaged community.

Contact us: info@procreche.ma
Phone: +212 7 07 70 11 15

name: Private Discuss
description:
Private Discuss is a private cyber communication platform for governments and sensitive businesses.
Combining the robust features of US leaders with military-grade encryption and an integrated AI companion, Private Discuss is designed for organizations that demand total control over their data without compromising on collaboration capabilities.
Available in Saas or On Premise deployment, Private Discuss addresses the increasingly critical needs for strict business secrecy and secure communications for public and private international economic players.
With its unique encryption, 2025 ready ergonomics, and advance features – including AI Powered tools like subtitling and translation – Private Discuss can be deployed in just few days on client’s servers, offering it’s unique technology for millions of users, with the same scalabilty than the best US leaders (1000p in a single videoconference, 1 million in a Webinar…). On Premise deployment can include full white-label configurations.

description: Prod'Air is a company specializing in innovative solutions for network mapping, smart energy metering, public lighting diagnostics, and geo data management. It provides advanced technologies to improve the efficiency and management of urban infrastructure. Prod'Air’s solutions help optimize the management of utilities such as electricity, water, and sanitation. The company focuses on enhancing city operations through the digitalization of resources, offering tools for better decision-making and resource allocation. With a strong emphasis on sustainability and efficiency. Prod'Air supports the transformation of cities into smarter, more sustainable environments. Prod'Air is dedicated to supporting the development of cities that are better equipped to face the challenges of the future.

name: ProVerdy
description:
ProVerdy – AI-Powered Carbon Management

ProVerdy offers a user-friendly AI-driven platform that helps businesses accurately measure their carbon footprint, identify key emission sources, and implement cost-effective reduction strategies. Our solution provides real-time insights, compliance-ready reports, and tailored recommendations to optimize both sustainability and profitability.

With AI-powered accuracy, ProVerdy ensures precise calculations, helping companies stay compliant while uncovering cost-saving opportunities. Whether you’re an SME or a large enterprise, our scalable platform makes carbon management efficient, actionable, and impact-driven.

Join ProVerdy to turn sustainability into a competitive advantage. Let’s build a greener future together!

name: PROTEI
description:
Since its founding in 2009, Professional Telecommunications Incorporation (PROTEI) has been an industry pioneer in providing innovative telecom solutions on a worldwide scale. Based in Amman, Jordan, PROTEI offers an extensive portfolio, including core network services, roaming, messaging, value-added services (VAS), data management, and customer care solutions. With offices across the Middle East, Europe, Africa, Latin America, Central Asia, and the Commonwealth of Independent States (CIS), PROTEI provides world-class commercial and technical support to a global client base.

PROTEI operates development centers in Jordan, Europe, and CIS, ensuring that its innovative solutions meet the evolving needs of over 400 clients worldwide. With a team of 1,800 specialists—70% focused on research and development—PROTEI delivers scalable, reliable, and adaptable platforms aimed at enhancing customer experience, boosting revenue, and reducing operational costs.

name: PROTECOM
description:
?PROTECOM est une société marocaine fondée en 2006, spécialisée dans la distribution de câbles, de matériel et d'outillage liés aux installations de fibre optique, de téléphonie et d'assainissement. Basée à Casablanca, elle s'est imposée comme un acteur majeur dans les domaines de l'électricité, de la téléphonie et de l'outillage.
Activités principales
PROTECOM offre une gamme variée de produits et services, notamment :
Fibre optique : câbles, accessoires, fusionneuses, jarretières, tiroirs optiques, boîtiers d'épissurage.?
Électricité : outillage isolé, instruments de mesure.?
Téléphonie : câbles en cuivre, accessoires.?
Outillage général : clés, pinces, tournevis, outils de coupe, coffres à outils.?
Signalisation et protection : casques, gants, masques, protection des pieds et des yeux, vêtements de signalisation.?
Groupes électrogènes et motopompes.

name: PROMVR
description:
PROMVR is an innovative developer of VR and digital simulators for training employees of industrial enterprises and equipping educational institutions. Key activity: development of custom and universal software products based on immersive technologies. 
PROMVR's line of digital and VR simulators is a set of scenarios to train users to perform high-risk work from a safe environment. The introduction of digital tools into the business processes of enterprises reduces the number of accidents and the cost of organizing practical training for employees. Our software products are created with the involvement of specialized experts and are certified according to international ISO standards.

name: Prysmian

Prysmian is world leader in the energy and telecom cable systems industry. With over than 150 years of experience, sales exceeding €17 billion in 2024. about 33,000 employees in over 50 countries and 107 plants, the group is strongly positioned in high-tech markets and offers the widest possible range of products, services, technologies and know-how developed in 27 R&D centers around the world.
At Prysmian, innovation is the foundation of our CSR initiatives, driving this commitment towards sustainable and ambitious solutions.
At Prysmian, our Digital Solutions are realising the infrastructure of today and tomorrow, helping the world to meet its most pressing challenges. By pushing the boundaries of digitalisation, we will seize the opportunities offered by this new market trend and lead the digital transformation that is happening worldwide.
https://www.prysmian.com/en/markets/digital-solutions

name: Purple Education
description:
Purple Education aims to enhance elementary students’ understanding of global issues, such as environment, history, culture, and science, through a STEM-based curriculum combined with interactive learning tools, including textbooks, 3D puzzles, videos, and augmented reality (AR).

Its flagship educational series, Endangered Animals & World History, integrates both digital and analog learning approaches, focusing on critical topics like climate change-driven species extinction and the preservation of cultural heritage.

Additionally, Purple Education collaborates with countries that possess unique cultural heritage and endangered species to co-develop educational packages incorporating textbooks, 3D puzzles, videos, AR, and VR. This initiative enables the creation of distinctive, country-specific educational content.

By blending education with entertainment, Purple Education delivers engaging and impactful learning experiences.

products.name: Your own cultural heritage and endangered animal

name: Pullus Africa
description:
We are Africa’s first poultry-focused supply chain platform using technology to boost local poultry production and supply chain by facilitating farmers’ access to guaranteed market, finance, quality input, advisory, and production services, for poultry farmers in Africa.

Our goal is to create the best supply chain system in Africa that will positively impact the poultry sector through collaboration between suppliers, producers, and consumers.

OUR VISION
To become a reference point for the poultry supply chain in Africa.

 OUR MISSION
To build the largest network of productive and profitable poultry farmers.

name: PSYNARIOS
description:
Psynarios stands as the pioneering scientific solution developed by behavioural science experts to promote a collaborative and constructive management. 

It serves as a virtual role-play studio that empowers managers to confront challenging work situations while safeguarding their mental wellbeing.

The immersive scenarios enable managers to measure existing behaviours, develop constructive behaviours and anchor progress overtime.

name: Raspberry Pi
description:
Since 2012, we’ve been designing single-board and modular computers, built on the Arm architecture, and running the Linux operating system. Whether you’re an educator looking to excite the next generation of computer scientists; an enthusiast searching for inspiration for your next project; or an OEM who needs a proven rock-solid foundation for your next generation of smart products, there’s a Raspberry Pi computer for you.

That’s not all we do. For lower-power and real-time applications, Raspberry Pi Pico boards, and the growing RP2 family of Raspberry Pi silicon products, bring our signature values of high performance, low cost, and ease of use to the microcontroller space. Our high-quality accessories ensure you get the best performance from your Raspberry Pi products. Raspberry Pi publications provide support and inspiration to makers and professionals alike.
Raspberry Pi is an engine for creativity, learning and innovation.

Computer and Mobile Hardware, Storage & Peripherals

name: RASPIRE
description:
RASPIRE is a Mobile Security as a Service (MSaaS) platform offering No-Code security solutions for hardening mobile apps and defending them against malicious attacks, data breaches, and unauthorized access. 

At RASPIRE, we streamline the security process by offering seamless integration with No-Code and No-Configuration required, allowing developers and security teams to focus on innovation while we handle the heavy lifting of app security.

Our platform provides multiple layers of defence that work seamlessly to shield apps from a wide range of threats—whether static or dynamic—ensuring compliance with the highest security standards and regulations.

RASPIRE Shield protects against Reverse Engineering, Rooted/Jailbroken Devices, App Tampering/Cloning, Debugging, Hooking, Memory Hacking, Man-in-the-Middle Attacks.

With RASPIRE, mobile app security is simplified, robust, and always evolving.

name: Rebillion
description:
Rebillion is a revenue-driven payment platform built for online businesses that want to scale globally, increase profitability, and stay in control. 

Our solution connects merchants to a curated network of global PSPs and boosts performance at every step of the payment flow. With conversion-optimized checkout features like one-click upsells, recurring payments, smart payment routing, and secure tokenization, Rebillion helps drive more sales and simplify operations. 
Integration is fast, no-code, and CMS-compatible—allowing merchants to go live in minutes without developers. 

Rebillion was born from years of firsthand ecommerce experience, where we faced serious payment limitations as merchants. 
We built what we wish existed: a solution that empowers online businesses to convert more, get paid faster, and expand internationally with confidence. 

Our early users have reported significant revenue growth after switching to Rebillion, thanks to the impact of our full payment solution.

name: RecyclingMarket
description:
Company Name: RecyclingMarket
Founded: 25/09/2024
Headquarters: Morocco
Industry: Environmental Tech, Waste Management, Circular Economy

Overview:
RecyclingMarket streamlines Morocco’s recycling by linking businesses, municipalities & recyclers via a transparent platform for trading & managing materials. With real-time insights & auctions, we empower stakeholders to boost waste value & Morocco’s circular economy.

Mission:
Advance sustainable waste management via digital solutions. Reduce waste, boost recycling, and provide data insights to accelerate Morocco’s green transition.

Key Features:

    Transparent auctions for recyclables trading

    Real-time analytics for smarter decisions

    Streamlined logistics for waste transport

    Compliance tools for sustainability

name: Recorded Future
description: Recorded Future is the world’s largest threat intelligence company. Recorded Future’s Intelligence Cloud provides end-to-end intelligence across adversaries, infrastructure, and targets. Indexing the internet across the open web, dark web, and technical sources, Recorded Future provides real-time visibility into an expanding attack surface and threat landscape, empowering clients to act with speed and confidence to reduce risk and securely drive business forward.

name: RED ALERT HEALTHCARE
description:
Red Alert Online is a premier healthcare third-party administrator (TPA), providing seamless corporate medical management solutions. With over 20 years of expertise, we enable cashless treatments at panel clinics, offering real-time claims processing, consolidated billing, and employee health analytics through our web-based platform and mobile app.

We serve clients by streamlining healthcare administration, reducing costs, and enhancing employee well-being. Our system ensures efficient claims processing, fraud prevention, and compliance with medical standards.

As a subsidiary of MBf Holdings Berhad and WR Carpenters Group - multinational conglomerates, we leverage strong corporate backing to expand internationally. This strategy accelerates market penetration while maintaining service excellence.

Committed to innovation, we redefine corporate healthcare accessibility through technology-driven solutions, making medical benefits more efficient and transparent for businesses worldwide.

name: Refactory Academy
description: Refactory Academy is a software skills training academy dedicated to preparing tech talent for employment in Africa and the world at large.

name: reGenesis
description: The story of reGenesis is inspired by the concept of “Mario Kart Economics”—a principle that emphasizes supporting those who need it most to level the playing field. Just as in the game, where resources are distributed to help those struggling at the back of the race, reGenesis focuses on enabling smaller players to access tools, technology, and markets usually reserved for the largest companies. Globally, small businesses and producers often lack resources but are critical contributors to the economy and supply chain. reGenesis aims to bring these smaller enterprises closer to the resources they need, providing them with technology, traceability, and market access that position them for long-term success. This approach makes reGenesis a driving force for equitable growth and sustainability across industries.

name: Relab.ma
description: Relab is a responsible and sustainable high-tech solution that revolutionizes the second-hand electronics market. With the rising cost of new devices and risks associated with used products, Relab digitizes the trade-in process through an instant valuation tool with 60,000 possibilities and a streamlined verification system. The company sources devices through trade-in programs with retailers, refurbishes them using a 50-checkpoint process, and resells them with up to a one-year warranty and financing options. Relab ensures affordability, convenience, and security, offering invoices and quality assurance. With a growing customer base and strong market traction, it aims to expand through AI-driven diagnostics, a marketplace, and physical stores across Morocco. Additionally, Relab promotes sustainability by reducing electronic waste and CO2 emissions. Seeking investment for national expansion, the company envisions a fully digitized, eco-friendly trade-in ecosystem.

name: Regula
description:
Regula is a global developer of forensic devices and identity verification solutions. 
With our 30+ years of experience in forensic research and the most comprehensive library of document templates in the world, we create breakthrough technologies for document and biometric verification. Our hardware and software solutions allow over 1,000 organizations and 80 border control authorities globally to provide top-notch client service without compromising safety, security or speed. 

Regula was repeatedly named a Representative Vendor in Gartner® Market Guide for Identity Verification.

Learn more at www.regulaforensics.com.
sectors: Authentication User, Biometric Authentication and PKI

name: QIT Solutions
description:

We develop cutting-edge solutions driving innovation in healthcare, automation, and enterprise AI. Our expertise spans AI, machine learning, embedded systems, and cloud computing, empowering businesses to harness intelligent technology. At QIT, we create impactful AI-driven applications, including QuantumDoctor—an AI-powered medical chatbot for real-time diagnostics. Our team of software engineers, AI specialists, and cybersecurity experts builds secure, scalable, and efficient solutions tailored to industry needs. With strong R&D focus, we revolutionize industries by integrating AI automation and smart systems. Through innovation, collaboration, and passion for technology, QIT is shaping the future of intelligent solutions worldwide.

description: Quest Software delivers cybersecurity, data performance, directory and identity, and modernization solutions that simplify enterprise IT management. Business challenges, stormy economies and market changes are going to happen. But it’s how your organization prepares, withstands and responds that makes the difference. See how our portfolio can elevate your IT resilience.

name: Quoqo Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description: Quoqo Technologies (P) Ltd., founded in April 2021, is a cutting-edge legal tech firm specializing in AI-powered SaaS solutions that redefine legal workflows and support digital transformation across sectors. Leveraging Generative AI, Quoqo offers comprehensive tools for contract management, automated due diligence, and document reviews, providing critical insights and streamlined processes. Key products include Quoqo Fusion for end-to-end contract management, QSign for secure e-signatures and digital signing, Q-Legacy for contract repositories, and QBots for advanced legal research. With these solutions, Quoqo empowers organizations to achieve efficiency, accuracy, and security in their legal operations.

name: Qurmi
description: Qurmi is a medical simulation startup that helps medical students and universities improve clinical reasoning, decision-making, and soft skills through realistic and interactive virtual patients. Our platform uses advanced AI to simulate diverse clinical scenarios, allowing learners to ask questions, make diagnoses, and receive instant, personalized feedback. Qurmi reduces the need for physical resources, standardizes training quality, and empowers medical institutions to scale education effectively. With a user-friendly interface and analytics dashboard, educators can track progress and identify learning gaps. Qurmi’s mission is to make medical training more immersive, accessible, and impactful—preparing the next generation of doctors for real-world challenges.

name: RIZEWARE | PCHALLE
description:
Rizeware Solutions and PC Halle are strategic partners collaborating to help forward-looking businesses across Africa achieve their growth objectives in 2025 and beyond by embracing the power of digital technologies. Each company plays a key role in that objective:

Rizeware provides a comprehensive suite of strategic planning, professional services, and software solutions tailored to the unique needs of each business.
- PC Halle is focused on digital transformation consulting, helping businesses innovate and optimize their operations. In addition, PC Halle offers a breadth of technology solutions that include ERP integration, AI-powered software, stronger cybersecurity, and scalable cloud solutions to ensure a secure, high performance digital infrastructure.

description:
Ruptela, a global leader in telematics, develops high-quality GPS tracking devices and fleet management solutions. Our innovative technology ensures efficiency, safety, and sustainability, empowering businesses worldwide with precise and reliable insights.
At the GITEX, Ruptela showcases our most advanced GPS tracking hardware. Featuring state-of-the-art telematics technology, these devices deliver exceptional real-time tracking, precise geolocation, and robust data analytics. Developed by Ruptela's in-house R&D team, devices are designed for diverse environments to enhance operational efficiency, safety, and connectivity, serving customers in more than 120 countries. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer-centric values ensures these solutions set new benchmarks in the ITS industry.

name: Royal Air Maroc
description:
Royal Air Maroc (RAM) is the national airline of Morocco, founded in 1957. Headquartered in Casablanca, the airline operates from its main hub at Mohammed V International Airport (CMN). RAM serves a global network of over 90 destinations, covering Africa, Europe, North and South America, and the Middle East.
As a member of the Oneworld alliance since 2020, Royal Air Maroc enhances connectivity between Africa and the rest of the world. 
Royal Air Maroc (RAM) has consistently embraced innovation to enhance its services, improve operational efficiency, and elevate the customer experience. The airline integrates cutting-edge technology across various aspects of its operations, from fleet modernization to digital transformation.
By leveraging technology and adopting forward-thinking strategies, Royal Air Maroc continues to strengthen its position as a leading African carrier, offering passengers a more convenient, efficient, and enjoyable travel experience.

name: Ruwad Apps Company
description: Ruwad Apps Company is a Saudi company in the field of smart business based on cloud computing and artificial intelligence, we contribute to making operations smoother and easier. We work to enhance productivity and support growth for large and small companies. Our goal is to enable digital transformation and simplified business through our digital platforms designed for ease and flexibility.

name: SaasPro Health
description:
SaaSPro Health automates clinical workflows using Generative AI to capture medical conversations and generate structured clinical notes. Our AI-powered solution listens to doctor-patient interactions, extracts key medical insights, and automatically generates SOAP notes, billing codes, and orders—saving clinicians valuable time.

With a focus on HIPAA compliance, seamless EHR integration, and specialty-specific templates, we empower healthcare providers to enhance productivity and reduce administrative burden.

Currently used by 500 clinicians, SaaSPro Health is transforming how doctors document patient encounters. Our mission is to revolutionize healthcare documentation, ensuring efficiency, accuracy, and scalability in clinical settings.

name: S7 Labs
description:
Our mission is simple: Catch tomorrow's disease in today's data, addressing the annual loss of millions of lives due to late diagnostics. 

We detect diseases before symptoms appear by uncovering hidden patterns across fragmented medical histories. We address three critical healthcare barriers: the impracticality of universal screening, the siloed nature of specialist care, and the messy state of medical data.

Through federated learning and meta-learning, we analyse medical data where it lives - without ever moving it - and extract meaningful insights from inherently chaotic electronic health records.

Our solution processes various medical data types (scans, blood tests etc) and turns fragmented information into unified diagnostics.

By enabling precise risk stratification of the general population, we shift healthcare from reactive to proactive, preventing costly hospital stays, and empowering doctors to diagnose more people, more accurately and faster. Finding clarity in complexity

name: SAFARI INSTITUTE
description:
L’Institut Safari est un établissement de référence dans la région de Tétouan et Tanger, dédié à l'éducation STEM pour les jeunes de 5 à 18 ans. Nous proposons des formations en technologie, programmation et robotique, en utilisant des programmes reconnus à l’international.

 Grâce à nos instructeurs qualifiés, nous offrons des expériences d’apprentissage interactives qui stimulent la créativité, la pensée critique et le développement intellectuel. 

Chez Safari Institute, nous préparons la nouvelle génération d’innovateurs et d’ingénieurs en cultivant la curiosité et l’excellence.

name: Reme-D
description:
Reme-D was founded in Dec. 2022 to tackle testing shortages exposed during the COVID-19 pandemic. In Egypt & much of Africa, widespread testing only became available by late 2020 due to a lack of locally developed molecular diagnostics. This dependency on imported kits complicates availability, aligning it with international demand & foreign currency needs, while costs are inflated by shipping/import duties. More importantly, the imported kits are unsuitable for low-resource settings due to refrigeration requirements, making them unstable in hot climates.
Utilizing our expertise in nanotechnology & biotechnology, we have developed a patented technology that overcomes these limitations. Reme-D's tests that are stable at room temperature, easier to use & 6 times more affordable than competitors. Since our inception, we have launched over 30 testing products, including those for Hepatitis C/B, HIV, Tuberculosis,& Human Papillomavirus, selling nearly 300,000 tests across four countries.

name: Renovely Solutions
description: Renovely is Morocco’s first digital platform dedicated to connecting homeowners with trusted, qualified renovation and construction professionals. Our solution simplifies what is often a stressful process: homeowners post their projects online and quickly receive personalized bids from contractors, enabling easy comparison and informed decision-making. For contractors, Renovely represents a unique opportunity to access a robust database of  high-quality project leads, expanding their business opportunities and streamlining their growth. With transparency, convenience, and quality at its core, Renovely transforms home renovation into an enjoyable experience, positioning itself as the go-to solution for homeowners seeking reliability, and contractors seeking growth and exposure.

name: RIFL Biometrics
description: RIFL, a French company specialized in security technologies, biometric identification, and RFID chips, markets high-value-added solutions in the fields of access control, intelligent video surveillance, and time and attendance management. Founded in Morocco in 2006, RIFL Biometrics aims to expand its presence across Africa, which has become an essential market for security technologies and human resources management applications.

name: Ribatis
description: Ribatis is a global digital transformation operator, dedicated to empowering public and private organizations with the technology and expertise they need to successfully navigate the digital age. We specialize in providing comprehensive solutions that streamline business processes, improve operational efficiency, and enhance user engagement. From implementing cutting-edge digital infrastructures to offering strategic guidance, we help our clients transform their operations and drive sustainable growth in an increasingly connected world.

name: RhinoTerrain
description:
The development of your territory is at the heart of our concerns.
Improving the habitat, streamlining transportation, preserving vegetation, safeguarding natural resources, using renewable energy... all your projects start the same way: with maps, plans, measurements... too often in 2D.
Having a 3D digital model means increasing your capacity to integrate new projects, facilitating consultation between the various stakeholders and immediately understanding the interactions between existing and future infrastructures.
At RhinoTerrain, we develop the RhinoTerrain, RhinoCapture, RhinoCity and RhinoSolar software that enable the creation of digital models.
They are not just software. It's also a team of specialists ready to support your transition.
Major French cities but also Monaco, Geneva, Montreal, and more recently Qatar have modeled their territory in 3D using our solutions.
Do as they have done, meet with us, and together we can give your territory a new dimension.

name: RITEK Corporation
description:
RITEK Corporation primarily manufactures blank storage media, which includes various types of optical and electronic storage products. Their product line consists of:

Optical storage media: This category includes CDs, DVDs, BD Blu-ray discs, and Millennium Disc M-DISC. These discs are used for storing digital data, such as music, movies, software, and other files.

Electronic storage media: RITEK also produces electronic storage devices, such as flash memory cards, USB flash drives, portable HDD mobile hard drives, and SSD solid-state drives. These devices are used for storing and transferring digital data between devices, such as computers, cameras, smartphones, and tablets.

name: Sahl Financial
description:
Sahl Financial provides AI-powered tools to help businesses in emerging markets access and understand financial data. 

While we leverage traditional bank data, we go beyond it—recognizing that in many regions, a large portion of transactions happen outside banks through mobile wallets, telcos, and alternative payment systems.

Our platform aggregates these fragmented data sources, enabling businesses to verify users, manage consent, and gain real financial insights—all through a simple, secure API.
sectors: Asset Management / Personal Finance / Wealth Management

name: Salesforce
description:
Salesforce is the #1 AI CRM, where humans with agents drive customer success together. Through Agentforce, our groundbreaking suite of customizable agents and tools, Salesforce brings autonomous AI agents, unified data from any source, and best-in-class Customer 360 apps together on one integrated platform to help companies connect with customers in a whole new way.

Salesforce is democratizing AI agents for businesses of every size and industry so every company can embrace a workforce without limits. Our low code, open, and secure platform helps companies build and customize Salesforce fast so they can safely scale AI-powered work to every customer and employee experience and transform their business.  

Salesforce is proud to be the market leader, but we’re even more proud to lead in philanthropy, innovation and culture. Guided by core values of trust, customer success, innovation, equality, and sustainability, Salesforce is more than a business — we’re a platform for change.

name: Samaking
description:
Samaking is a tech-enabled company transforming Africa’s fish value chain by improving sourcing, processing, and distribution. We tackle inefficiencies like post-harvest losses, supply inconsistencies, and limited market access for fish farmers and fisherfolk.
Our B2B model supplies fresh and processed fish to hotels, restaurants, supermarkets, and export markets. We ensure quality through a traceable, cold-chain-enabled network. To stabilize supply and enhance product quality, we aggregate fish directly from farmers, improving their incomes while ensuring consistency.
With a mission to make fish the #1 protein on African plates, Samaking is building a scalable, climate-resilient distribution network that enhances food security, increases farmer profitability, and ensures a steady supply of high-quality fish for consumers across Africa.

name: Riverbed - StarLink
description: Today, in our digital lives, every click, is everything. It’s the heartbeat of the enterprise. Whether it’s in the office or anywhere, and at any time day or night, that action comes with intent and an expectation of a flawless digital experience. Since its inception in 2002, Riverbed has helped the world’s largest organizations empower the digital experience and drive enterprise performance. With two industry-leading solutions – Riverbed Unified Observability and Riverbed Acceleration – Riverbed transforms data into actionable insights across the entire digital ecosystem and accelerates performance for a seamless digital experience.

With a strong focus on AI, analytics, and sustainability, SAP enables organizations across industries to streamline processes, enhance decision-making, and improve customer experiences. Its solutions cover ERP, supply chain, finance, HR, and more, serving over 400,000 customers worldwide. As a trusted partner in digital transformation, SAP continues to shape the future of intelligent enterprises through cutting-edge technology, seamless integrations, and a commitment to sustainability and business resilience.

name: SCASCO ASSURANCES
description:
SCASCO Insurance has built a strong reputation over more than 20 years of expertise in the Moroccan insurance market. With a network of five points of sale, we are strategically located in Casablanca, Kenitra, and Tangier, allowing us to serve a broad range of clients across the country.

Our firm has grown to support more than 20,000 individual and corporate clients, including some of the most prominent businesses in Morocco. These include ‘PLASTIMA’, the leading manufacturer and processor of plastic materials in the country; ‘SDTM’, a dominant player in the distribution and transport of goods and courier services; ‘ENOSIS GROUP’, the market leader in hygiene solutions; and ‘RATP DEV’, the global leader in public transport, which manages the Casablanca tramway system.

At SCASCO Insurance, our mission is clear: we strive to deploy all available resources human, financial, and technical to help our clients navigate the complex landscape of insurance products.

name: Sauki
description: We are a French-Nigerien fintech startup committed to transforming Africa's financial landscape. Our flagship product, Sako, is a neobank designed for the Nigerien diaspora, offering seamless cross-border banking. With SaukiPay, we empower Africans to tap into the global software services market by providing a digital wallet and virtual cards for transactions in multiple currencies (EUR, USD, etc.). Users can easily top up their wallet via local mobile money and send funds across different mobile money providers—something previously unattainable. Developers can also integrate our Stripe-like SaukiPay API to accept payments both online and in person. Additionally, our Sauki BRS app simplifies bus ticket booking for users in Niger, all powered by AI-driven innovation to create a connected and inclusive financial ecosystem.

name: SaveDirectly
description:
SaveDirectly empowers individuals to save and pay for essential products like insurance, through flexible, automated installments. Our platform, GakeGake, simplifies payments, boosts financial discipline, and ensures individuals get insurance covers they need.
With Auto-Debit, we’re making savings effortless, starting with moto taxi drivers securing critical essential insurance covers. Real transactions, real impact; SaveDirectly is redefining financial access.

Our flagship product, Curri AI, helps teachers create high-quality, curriculum-aligned lessons in seconds. name: Schoolify
description: Schoolify is a digital school management platform designed to streamline administrative processes, enhance communication between schools, teachers, students, and parents, and improve academic tracking. Present in 11 countries across Africa, France, Belgium, and Canada, it addresses key challenges such as student dropout rates, particularly among girls in Africa. With features like real-time transport tracking, automated school operations, and secure data management, Schoolify empowers educational institutions to modernize efficiently. The platform integrates blockchain technology to ensure data security, transparency, and traceability in academic records. To scale its impact, Schoolify has established a subsidiary in France and collaborates with governments to integrate its solutions into national education systems. Backed by funding from the Hashgraph Association by Hedera, Schoolify continues to expand across Africa and Europe, driving innovation in education.

name: SES - LU
description: SES has a bold vision to deliver amazing experiences everywhere on earth by distributing the highest quality video content and providing seamless connectivity around the world. As the leader in global content connectivity solutions, SES operates the world’s only multi-orbit constellation of satellites with the unique combination of global coverage and high performance, including the commercially-proven, low-latency Medium Earth Orbit O3b system. By leveraging a vast and intelligent, cloud-enabled network, SES is able to deliver high-quality connectivity solutions anywhere on land, at sea or in the air, and is a trusted partner to the world’s leading telecommunications companies, mobile network operators, governments, connectivity and cloud service providers, broadcasters, video platform operators and content owners.

name: SERAPAY
description: Serapay is a social commerce payment gateway designed for social media platforms, enabling seamless, secure, and low-cost mobile money transactions for SMEs in Africa. Through our platform, Slide, businesses can easily process payments directly on WhatsApp, Instagram, and other social channels, reducing friction in online sales. With a 1.8% transaction fee model, we eliminate costly subscriptions, making digital payments more accessible. Our dropshipping feature connects wholesalers with social commerce SMEs, lowering entry barriers and driving new income streams. We have onboarded thousands of merchants and processed millions in transactions, showcasing strong market traction. Key partners include Carrefour, Naivas, and Quick Mart, aligning with our strategy to serve high-volume general merchandise enterprises. With a clear growth roadmap, Serapay is set to transform digital payments for Africa’s booming social commerce sector.

name: ShareCARD
description:
Company Profile

ShareCARD is a data intelligence platform that bridges the last-mile visibility gap, enabling organizations to track, manage, and analyze resource distribution in real time. By connecting organizations, field agents, and beneficiaries through seamless data sharing and verification, we enhance traceability, accountability, and decision-making for more effective project implementation.

Key Assets & Value
Organizational Dashboard: Monitors resources, beneficiaries, and project metrics.
Agent Mobile App: Enables real-time data collection and reporting for field agents.
Beneficiary Card Infrastructure: Secures identification and tracking for improved service delivery.
Admin Dashboard: Centralized control for managing operations, user accounts, and data integrity.
Centralized Database & Client Management System: Integrates data for seamless project and beneficiary management.
Our technology drives efficiency, transparency, and impact at scale.
