The mobile application rewards every eco-friendly action by tracking the points accumulated by users and allowing them to locate sorting stations. Our impact platform, accessible to industries, helps optimize recycling, reduce ecological footprints, and enhance the sustainable commitment of businesses. The waste collection service and access to the platform are paid for by the industries, providing them with a key tool to manage their recycling and improve their environmental impact.

Smart Compliance is also integrating artificial intelligence to deliver a comprehensive legal assistance service. This feature  allows users to obtain accurate responses to legal and regulatory queries, and facilitates direct access to up-to-date legal information.

name: Solichain Green
description:
Solichain Green is building the future of energy finance.
We are developing a blockchain-powered “energy bank”  a tokenized marketplace for carbon credits and green energy
Our platform combines blockchain for transparency, AI for real-time ESG compliance, and Zero-Knowledge proofs to ensure data privacy and verifiability.
Producers of renewable energy and certified carbon credit issuers can tokenize their assets and trade them securely and automatically. Buyers  from corporates to governments  can acquire verified green assets to meet ESG targets, stake them for yield, or monetize their environmental impact.
Solichain Green provides the digital infrastructure for a liquid, compliant, and trusted green economy  where sustainability meets programmable finance.

name: Sophos Ltd
description: Sophos is a global leader and innovator of advanced security solutions for defeating cyberattacks. bringing together two pioneers that have redefined the cybersecurity industry with their innovative, native AI-optimized services, technologies and products. Sophos is now the largest pure-play Managed Detection and Response (MDR) provider, supporting more than 28,000 organizations. In addition to MDR and other services, Sophos’ complete portfolio includes industry-leading endpoint, network, email, and cloud security that interoperate and adapt to defend through the Sophos Central platform. Secureworks provides the innovative, market-leading Taegis XDR/MDR, identity threat detection and response (ITDR), next-gen SIEM capabilities, managed risk, and a comprehensive set of advisory services. Sophos sells all these solutions through reseller partners, Managed Service Providers (MSPs) and Managed Security Service Providers (MSSPs) worldwide.

Data & Analytics: Our certified Data Scientists and Engineers advise on the selection and integration of Data Science, Data Visualization, Smart BI, and IT architecture solutions.

Finance & Performance: Our certified consultants assist you in enhancing business processes and guide you in choosing and integrating performance management solutions (from planning to consolidation).

name: Sommalife Limited
description: Sommalife is an agritech addressing the systemic exclusion of women smallholder farmers living in remote areas of West Africa who lack access to essential support services. Through technology, we create value for smallholder farmers and the stakeholders who engage them. We digitize the operations of farmers, connect them to markets- mainly food and cosmetics manufacturers, and resource them to become agents of conservation. Our proprietary software, Treesyt, is shifting agriculture from error-prone paper systems to digital tools for transparency and traceability, allowing clients to track the origin and quality of their commodities. Our platform combines farmer profiling, purchase transactions, and tree management into a cohesive digital ecosystem. Since our inception in 2020, We have digitized over 140,000 farmers (91% women), 30,000 women farmers have earned 22% additional income through market linkages, and 1,500 acres of parkland have been demarcated, protecting over 27,000 trees.

name: South African Electro Technical Export Council

Our members are South African registered companies that are manufacturers and providers of products and services in the Electrotechnical sector:

Electronics
Electrical Engineering
Information Technology
Telecommunications

Our Focus:

To address trade opportunities and issues by capitalising on our combined strength
To assist our members in growing their exports by:
• Identifying and facilitating export opportunities
• Influencing trade policies
• Providing operational and logistical support.

digital signage as a service solution, developed by us from scratch.

Speech Technology Center is focused on creating B2B and B2G AI solutions, with more than 5,000 AI projects completed around the world, including national-scale projects in Mexico, Ecuador, and the Middle East.

Moreover, they are being used to introduce the Safe&Smart city concept. Speech Technology Center’s voice forgery detection and speech recognition technology are on top of the global rankings.

name: STUDIRIUM
description:
STUDIRIUM SAS est une entreprise innovante dédiée à la transformation numérique de l’éducation. 

À travers sa plateforme intelligente STUDIRIUM, elle modernise la gestion scolaire en introduisant un matricule unique pour un suivi sécurisé des élèves, l’automatisation des inscriptions, des notes et des paiements, ainsi qu'un suivi parental accentué, une orientation personnalisée et une analyse des performances scolaires via l’intelligence artificielle. 

Soutenue par Orange Cameroun et financée par WIDU Africa, l’entreprise a été finaliste de POESAM et NABIKO 2024 et championne nationale du Roadshow OSIANE 2025. 

En discussion avec les ministères de l’Éducation du Cameroun et du Tchad, elle vise une expansion internationale, notamment via une présentation au salon Vivatech Paris. 

Avec un marché de plus de 450 millions d’élèves d’ici 2050, STUDIRIUM SAS s’impose comme une solution clé pour moderniser l’éducation africaine, en la rendant plus accessible, inclusive et efficace.

name: STULZ
description: STULZ is a global provider of innovative, mission-critical cooling solutions. Founded in 1947 and with its headquarters in Hamburg, Germany, it is represented by 24 subsidiaries, a network of more than 140 partners and nine production sites worldwide. Its solutions provide precise temperature and humidity control, as well as reliable cooling capacity, to safeguard the operation and longevity for data centers, telecom infrastructure and industry. STULZ prioritises energy efficiency and sustainability in its product development and manufacturing processes to deliver future proof cooling solutions. STULZ employs 3,500 people worldwide, with annual sales in excess of €700m.

name: SUNDIST IT SERVICES FZCO
description:
SIS IT is a leading IT hardware distributor and third-party maintenance provider, specializing in high-end datacenter infrastructure. We supply new and refurbished servers, storage, networking, security, and telephony equipment from top brands like IBM, HPE, Dell, Cisco, Juniper, NetApp, and more.

We help businesses optimize their infrastructure costs by offering cost-effective hardware solutions, IT maintenance contracts, and end-of-life (EoL) support services. Our expertise allows enterprises, resellers, and system integrators to extend the life of their IT assets while ensuring uninterrupted performance.

Headquartered in Dubai, UAE, with a primary warehouse hub in Dubai and an additional warehouse operation in Atlanta, USA, SIS IT Solutions serves a global customer base with a strong focus on Africa. We have established sales and warehouse operations in Morocco and Ivory Coast, ensuring local availability and rapid fulfillment for our clients across the region.

At Sumic IT Solutions Ltd, we believe in harnessing the power of technology to address some of the most pressing challenges faced by underserved communities and businesses in emerging markets. Additionally, we release 2-3 new models annually.

name: Suprema
description:
Suprema is a leading provider of innovative solutions, dedicated to delivering high-quality products and exceptional services. We focus on reliability, efficiency, and customer satisfaction, ensuring that our solutions meet the evolving needs of businesses and individuals.
With a strong commitment to excellence, Suprema leverages cutting-edge technology and industry expertise to drive success for our clients. Our team works passionately to create smart, effective, and sustainable solutions tailored to various industries.
At Suprema, we believe in continuous improvement and strong partnerships, helping our customers stay ahead in a fast-changing world. Trust us to provide solutions that make a difference.

name: SVB DEV
description:
SVB Dev is a PropTech innovator revolutionizing real estate and construction management with cutting-edge digital solutions. Our two flagship suites empower the industry:

SVB Smart Construction Suite – Optimizes project management, site document management, tenders, site supervision, BIM, and quality control.

SVB Smart Building Suite – Enhances asset management, leasing, commercialization, and facility management.

As Africa and the Middle East accelerate their digital transformation, SVB Dev offers scalable solutions to boost efficiency, reduce costs, and maximize asset value.

We are seeking strategic investors and partners to expand our footprint and drive innovation in these high-growth markets. Let’s shape the future of real estate and construction together!

name: TECHSO GROUP
description:
Its offer is structured around the following themes: Security consulting, Development and implementation of secure architectures, Implementation of cybersecurity solutions, Compliance support in relation to regulatory projects (PCI-DSS, CSP SWIFT, ISO 27001, DNSSI and law 05-20, GDPR ).
Our consultancy approach, with its global vision of cybersecurity, is aimed at operators of critical infrastructures, as well as industrial and financial sectors facing new threats and new regulatory and compliance constraints.
Our aim is to make our customers' information systems cyber-resilient.
Our mission: 
- Advise and support our customers in managing their risks
- Help our customers implement cybersecurity solutions
- Support our customers in operational security management (MSSP/SOC)
- Support in building cybersecurity skills
Techso Group has been chosen by SWIFT for the CSP program and as a PCI QSA by the PCI SSC, acknowledging their expertise in securing SWIFT and electronic payment platforms.

name: The Korea-Africa Foundation
description:
The Korea-Africa Foundation (The KAF), established in 2018 under the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Korea, is dedicated to fostering partnerships between Korea and Africa in economy, culture, and academia. One of our key missions is to support Korean businesses in expanding into African markets by providing structured business ecosystem support tailored to different growth stages. This includes programs for early-stage and mid-stage startups, as well as SME support initiatives.

For GITEX Africa 2025, The KAF is supporting 7 innovative Korean startups across various sectors: ICT, construction, environment, agriculture, education, and hospitality. These companies offer cutting-edge solutions such as smart display technology for mobile devices, AI-driven construction management, sustainable water and energy systems, precision livestock farming, digital education content, smart tourism solutions, and AI-powered smart farming.

name: TEMET
description: TEMET is a revolutionary e-commerce platform designed for the Sahel, offering users a seamless way to order a wide range of products, from restaurant meals and groceries to electronics and essential everyday items. Whether you're craving a delicious dish from your favorite restaurant, need fresh produce, or are looking for the latest tech accessories, TEMET makes shopping effortless with just a few clicks. Designed and developed by SHAAWA MEDIA, a leading digital agency based in Niger, TEMET is built to meet the unique needs of the region, ensuring fast, reliable, and convenient service. Our platform is committed to empowering local businesses by providing them with a digital marketplace to reach more customers and grow their sales. With TEMET, shopping in the Sahel has never been easier—bringing convenience, choice, and efficiency to your fingertips. Experience the future of e-commerce with a platform made for you, by experts who understand your needs!

name: The Siemon Company
description:
The Siemon Company, a US-headquartered global leader in network infrastructure, boasts over a century of legacy and industry leadership. Established in 1903, Siemon™ is a pioneer in high-quality, high-performance IT infrastructure solutions for Data Centers, LANs, and Smart Buildings. Operating globally through offices and partners, Siemon provides a comprehensive range of copper (unshielded and shielded twisted-pair) and fiber cabling systems, racks, cable management, automated infrastructure management and high-speed AI-ready cables. 

Siemon Labs, with over 400 active patents, emphasizes R&D and industry standards development, reaffirming its commitment to customers and innovation. A Nvidia partner, Siemon has a robust ecosystem for data centre, AI and Smart Building projects. Over 200 top Global 500 companies, including NASA, IBM, Amazon, Bosch, Deloitte, Microsoft, Twitter, and more, trust Siemon’s solutions. Learn more at info_africa@siemon.com or visit www.siemon.com.

name: Theodo
description:
We build successful products that scale, in record time.

Our clients range from startups to corporates to governments, we help them design and launch digital products that solve their business problems and we do that in record time (weeks not months). We are able to pull this off thanks to our deep expertise in Web, mobile and data technologies and our unique understanding of agile ways of work.

We succeed in what we do thanks to our multidisciplinary expertise.

As a firm but also as individuals, we have a consistent track record in developing digital products. Our expertise covers all relevant areas, technology of course but also strategy and design.
sectors: Design & Product Development - Engineering and part design

name: Thinkable
description: Thinkable is pioneering the Agentic Economy with a no-code platform that builds and manages intelligent teams of AI agents to automate complex tasks. Powered by our proprietary Framework for Automated Task Execution (F.A.T.E), Thinkable enables enterprises to design, deploy, and refine multi-agent workflows with transparency, control, and efficiency. Our platform is LLM-agnostic, integrates with hundreds of third-party tools, and ensures enterprise-grade data privacy with on-premise deployment. Features like Human-in-the-Loop planning, self-improving agents, and framework-agnostic execution empower businesses to scale AI adoption without needing deep technical expertise. Thinkable transforms AI from individual tools into collaborative systems—unlocking automation, innovation, and true organizational intelligence.

name: TIMELAPSE Lab
description: TimelapseLab produces smart industrial devices for remote construction site management, paired with an innovative software based on artificial intelligence. Thanks to a wide range of cutting-edge and customizable products and services, we combine the production of high-definition plug and play devices, resistant to all critical issues, with a functional management platform for remote control of jobs. The innovative platform also integrates software developed by TimelapseLab, based on neural networks and data security, which allows the blur of faces, bodies, license plates, vehicles or entire areas. We invent before it becomes necessary, always thinking long-term, focusing on the creation of tailor-made products for a user-friendly experience. Our field of investments are different, from shipyards and construction sites, to industrial installations, real estate industry and investors in order to remotely monitor each stage of the construction site through photos via a single link.

name: Tandeem
description: Tandeem helps companies rethink employee compensation with a next-gen benefits platform designed for modern workplaces. Our solution enhances engagement, well-being, and loyalty by making rewards more meaningful and accessible.

name: Todify Digital
description: Todify is a comprehensive Moroccan platform specializing in a unique "Brand on Demand" concept, enabling entrepreneurs, creators, and influencers to launch their own custom brands effortlessly. We provide end-to-end solutions, including custom-printed clothing, art pieces, gym products, and accessories, without upfront investment, inventory management, or production hassles. Our platform integrates seamlessly with major e-commerce solutions (Shopify, WooCommerce, YouCan) and handles production, packaging, and fast local shipping under our client's brand identity.
sectors: Consumer Tech, Smart Home & Smart Workplace

name: TANGER MED SPECIAL AGENCY
description:
Tanger Med Group operates and develops ports, logistics and industrial platforms. It manages Tanger Med port complex, the leading port in the Mediterranean and Africa. Through «Marsa Maroc», it also manages 25 container and bulk terminals. The total volume handled by the Group is 187 million tons of goods and 11,44 million TEUs.?  
The Group is also the planner and developer of more than 3000 hectares of economic activity zones which host more than 1400 companies and generate a business volume of 17,4 billion dollars in the automotive, aeronautics, textile, agribusiness and logistics sectors.

name: Timlog Solutions
description: Timlog Solutions is a pioneering company in the field of professional training. We believe that learning goes beyond the simple transmission of knowledge; it should be a strategic lever for innovation and performance. Our services include customized solutions such as in-person and e-learning training, gamified solutions, seminars, conferences, and team-building programs. Through our i-Learn platform, we provide an engaging learning experience accessible at any time. Our hybrid and interactive approach ensures a real and measurable impact on the performance of your teams and the sustainable growth of your organization.

name: Tomovit
description: TOMOVIT.com  is a leading car rental platform in Morocco, active in 76 cities with a fleet of 10,000 vehicles. Designed for locals and tourists, TOMOVIT offers a fast, transparent, and user-friendly booking experience. Users can compare prices, car types, and availability, then reserve instantly via WhatsApp, SMS, or phone call—no in-person visit needed. The platform features advanced filters and clear pricing to help users find the best car easily. By partnering with local agencies, TOMOVIT offers a wide range of vehicles from economy to luxury. In its first month, TOMOVIT attracted 10,000+ visitors with a 9–12% conversion rate. As demand grows, TOMOVIT aims to expand across Africa and support Morocco’s Vision 2030 by making car rentals more accessible, digital, and efficient.

name: Tawadoo
description:
Tawadoo is an innovative marketplace revolutionizing local buying and selling. 
Users can list items in three ways: classic sales with non-negotiable prices, negotiable sales allowing buyer offers within set limits, and auction rooms for competitive bidding.

Transactions are facilitated using Tawadoo Coins, enhancing security and simplicity. These reward coins can be earned and redeemed through direct purchases, referrals, watching promotional videos, or reviews.

Excitingly, Tawadoo will unveil a major feature at GITEX 2025, enhancing user experience and driving growth. With versatile sales options, secure transactions, and upcoming innovations, Tawadoo is poised for success in the evolving marketplace landscape.

name: Tawqi3i
description:
Tawqi3i is a leading provider of digital signature solutions, offering a secure and seamless Freemium eSignature SaaS for individuals and businesses. Our platform includes a website, mobile app, and REST APIs, alongside Advanced Trust Solutions designed for enterprises, governments, and banks.

With robust encryption, identity verification, and system integration, Tawqi3i ensures compliance with the highest legal and security standards. We support qualified digital signatures through trusted local Certificate Authorities like SANAD (Jordan), UAE PASS (UAE), and Absher (Saudi Arabia).

Trusted by top enterprises and government entities, Tawqi3i has processed 250,000+ digital signatures, helping organizations streamline workflows, cut costs, and enhance trust in digital transactions.

name: TausiApp
description: TausiApp is an AI-powered beauty-tech platform revolutionizing how beauty services are accessed and delivered. We connect clients with skilled, verified beauticians for at-home, in-booth, and corporate beauty services. Our platform empowers beauticians with financial tools, including loans and insurance, while providing a marketplace for beauty products. With a strong focus on safety, convenience, and quality, TausiApp partners with over 100 beauty colleges for skill verification and collaborates with organizations like ILO to support refugee and disadvantaged beauticians. Backed by investors like Marl 5G and Adanian Labs, we’ve onboarded 6,000 beauticians and served 32,000 clients. Our vision is to transform the beauty industry with AI-driven personalization, innovative service models, and financial empowerment.

name: Taxi Sahbi App
description: Taxi Sahbi is a fully Moroccan app revolutionizing urban mobility through an innovative digital solution that is secure & tailored to daily commuting needs. Designed for simplicity, it offers quick and transparent booking of private or shared taxis, providing an intuitive & user-friendly experience thanks to its smooth, accessible interface. Taxi Sahbi stands out by rigorously selecting professional drivers, offering complete visibility of rides in real time & providing flexible payment options. Fully aligned with the smart cities dynamic, the app promotes connected & sustainable urban mobility, supported by 24/7 customer service. With Taxi Sahbi, every ride becomes more pleasant, safe & personalized, showcasing Moroccan technological excellence committed to user satisfaction. Taxi Sahbi contributes actively to financial inclusion, empowering thousands taxi drivers by facilitating secure payments, enhancing their income stability & providing digital tools for greater financial autonomy

name: TechAffinity
description:
TechAffinity is an IT Services and Consulting company providing solutions to businesses across the globe. With 24+ years of IT expertise and 300+ skilled IT experts, TechAffinity is a one-stop IT solution provider.

TechAffinity is a technology-driven custom software consulting firm delivering solutions to companies ranging from #Startups to #Fortune500. Headquartered in the USA, with regional centers in India, Rwanda, and El Salvador, we focus on innovation and solving customer problems with technology-driven solutions.

name: SVT North Africa
description:
Smart Vision is a dedicated Cloud, Data and AI Solutions and services provider covering the EMEA region. We are a GOLD IBM business partner and a SELECT tier AWS partner. We proved effectivenness in understanding our customer base and staying ahead of the technology curve. our mission is to drive the widespread use of data analytics and infuse AI in the business processes. We help organizations to accelerate their journey to AI with a prescriptive approach. We are focused in adopting IBM Data & AI technology when it comes to Data Management, Data Governance, Data Privacy, Data Catalogue, Machine Learning, AI Modelling, AI tuning, Reporting and Business Intelligence.
We boost the customer's migration to Cloud through leveraging AWS services. We are specialized in Migration Services, Cost Optimization, and Well-Architecture.

name: Techpulse FZCO
description:
TECHPULSE, Founded in 2023 in Dubai, AE, has emerged as a leading importer and distributor of premier mobile brands such as Xiaomi, Samsung, and Apple Products, alongside a diverse range of digital accessories. Our journey began with a clear vision: to cultivate enduring relationships with our valued customers while delivering unparalleled quality service.

From our inception, our primary goal has been to cultivate robust and enduring relationships with our esteemed clientele. Through unwavering dedication to this vision, we have consistently delivered unparalleled quality service, earning us a reputation as an industry leader.

Our reach extends far beyond regional boundaries, with a global presence spanning the Middle East, USA, Europe, and Asia. At TECHPULSE, we adhere to the guiding principle of Win-Win partnerships, ensuring mutually beneficial collaborations with our partners across the globe.

description: As the official representative of Switzerland, the Embassy of Switzerland in Morocco carries out a wide range of activities covering all thematic areas of diplomatic relations between Switzerland and Morocco. It represents Switzerland's interests in politics, economics, finance, law, science, education and culture.

name: Synera
description:
Synera is focused on developing state of the art cybersecurity solutions to create complex projects for access management, digitalization and E-gov. We specialize in projects and solutions to ensure information security and digital trust for enterprises, governmental agencies, banks, transport systems, energy and mining companies. 

We also excel in cybersecurity services: 30 years of experience in cybersecurity empowers us to offer penetration tests, compliance, security audit of companies, govenmental bodies or even whole countries. 

Our expertise does not end on this, we also offer Guardant, an all-encompassing solution to solve all issues connected to software monetisation and licensing.

name: Systhen
description: At Systhen, we are a value-added distributor, solutions integrator, and provider of professional training! Our mission is to reduce costs, streamline processes, and offer more efficient document management.

name: SYGMA.AI
description: SYGMA.AI is transforming auto insurance claims with cutting-edge AI solutions. Our platform automates damage detection, cost estimation, and fraud prevention, streamlining claims processing for insurers, repair shops, and policyholders. By leveraging advanced computer vision and machine learning, SYGMA.AI reduces manual workloads, minimizes fraud, and enhances accuracy in repair cost assessments. Our end-to-end claims automation improves efficiency, lowers costs, and delivers a seamless experience for all stakeholders. Designed for the Moroccan market with global scalability, SYGMA.AI empowers insurers with real-time data insights, helping them optimize decision-making and enhance customer satisfaction.

name: Tadwir Plastik
description: Tadwir Plastik structures the recycling value chain in Morocco through door-to-door recyclable waste collection and recovery. Our digital platform, plastik.ma, connects waste producers—including households and businesses—to informal collectors, who are empowered and integrated into a formal economy. Collected materials are routed directly to partner recycling facilities, ensuring efficient and transparent processing. Tadwir Plastik provides full traceability of the collected materials, improving accountability and enabling recycling companies to source consistent, high-quality recyclables. Beyond environmental benefits, our model generates stable income opportunities for formerly informal collectors, fostering social inclusion and economic development within local communities. Currently operating in pilot phase, Plastik is optimizing operations in Agadir before scaling nationally, starting with Casablanca.

name: T8 LLC
description:
T8 is the leading Russian vendor of wavelength-division Multiplexing telecommunication equipment (DWDM). Headquartered in Moscow, the company is one of a few companies in the world, designing and manufacturing a line equipment with channel rate up to 800 Gbit/s.

T8 offers integrated solutions for building DWDM systems for metro or long-haul core networks, data-center interconnections and other carrier-grade high capacity bandwidth networks including the infrastructure of 5G networks.

For many years T8 is listed among Russian high-tech innovative leaders, provides expertise to clients in network optimization and analytics for most efficient use or scalability of network resources.

name: TACHRONE
description:
Notre plateforme facilite la mise en relation des acteurs du BTP en connectant entreprises, fournisseurs et prestataires. Elle permet aux utilisateurs de trouver facilement les matériaux et services nécessaires à leurs projets de construction. Grâce à une interface intuitive, nous simplifions l’accès aux ressources et favorisons des collaborations efficaces pour optimiser chaque chantier. 

Voici les services que nous offrons via notre plateforme :

? Profils détaillés des entreprises et prestataires, avec mise en avant de leurs projets réalisés.
? Dashboard intuitif pour demander et recevoir des devis en toute simplicité.
? Marketplace dédiée aux matériaux, facilitant le sourcing.

Nous simplifions la mise en relation et optimisons la gestion des projets BTP grâce à des outils digitaux performants.

name: TAMWILCOM
description:
TAMWILCOM is a Moroccan limited company governed by banking laws, boasting 75 years of experience in guaranteeing and financing enterprises within the country. 
TAMWILCOM has forged robust partnerships within the financial sector to offer a diverse range of financing mechanisms tailored for startups, VSMEs as well as large companies, both publicly and privately owned.
The institution offers a comprehensive suite of products for the entire business lifecycle. It provides credit guarantees for the establishment, expansion, and ongoing operations of Moroccan companies of all scales. It also provides collaborative financing with local banks for investment and restructuring initiatives in key government- prioritized sectors.
Since 2017, TAMWILCOM is actively involved in equity financing for startups and innovative entrepreneurs, supporting them from the ideation phase through to investment, thereby significantly fostering private initiative and meeting the needs of the local economy.

name: Taiden
description:
TAIDEN INDUSTRIAL CO., LTD, founded in 1996 in Shenzhen, China, is a global leading provider of conferencing technology. We have world-wide sales and service network covering all the provinces of China and over 130 countries across six continents.
TAIDEN's in-house R&D and production center ensures its complete supply chain from product developing, manufacturing and delivery.
TAIDEN trademark and patents have been registered in 130 countries and regions. TAIDEN products have been sold in 120 foreign countries and regions such as the USA, UK, Russia, Italy and many more. Thousands of TAIDEN installations were completed for governments, hotels, conference centers, enterprises and colleges all over the world. Some of the prestigious projects include: The United Nations Headquarters, Council of Europe (COE) Headquarters, G20 Summit, APEC Summit, IMF-World Bank Annual Meetings. TAIDEN has shaped up as one of the most competitive brands in global conference system market.

name: Touch To Learn
description:
**TOUCH: Digital Inclusion at GITEX Africa**

TOUCH (www.touch.africa) breaks digital barriers with offline-first access to education and entertainment. At GITEX Africa, TOUCH showcases technology that removes data costs and connectivity issues, unlocking opportunities for businesses, educators, and communities.

### **Our Solutions**
- **Offline Content:** Short-form educational and entertainment videos accessible without internet.
- **Interactive Learning:** Gamified quizzes and surveys enhance engagement and insights.
- **Multilingual Access:** Content in multiple languages ensures inclusivity.
- **Enterprise Partnerships:** Scalable distribution for businesses, NGOs, and governments.
- **Data Insights:** Real-time analytics for smarter decisions.

### **Why TOUCH?**
- **No Data Costs** for users
- **Scalable & Inclusive** technology
- **Monetization** through brand partnerships

Join TOUCH at GITEX Africa and shape the future of digital access!

name: TP-Link
description:
Founded in 1996 and headquartered in Shenzhen, China, TP-Link is a global leader in networking products and smart home solutions. The company offers affordable, high-performance devices such as routers, switches, range extenders, and smart home products, providing secure and reliable connectivity for both consumers and businesses worldwide.
TP-Link started by producing network cards and expanded into broadband routers by 2005. Its breakthrough came in 2008 with reliable wireless routers, helping the company become the global leader in Wi-Fi product sales by 2015. Today, TP-Link continues to innovate, adding smart home and IoT products to its portfolio.
Routers & Mesh Systems: TP-Link’s routers, including Wi-Fi 6 models and Deco mesh systems, offer fast, reliable internet with expanded coverage.

name: Tractics
description:
Navleb provides GPS tracking and fleet management solutions designed to meet the needs of businesses worldwide. Our innovative platform offers a range of products, including real-time vehicle tracking, Logistics planning, dispatching solutions, fuel monitoring, driver behavior analysis, Personal tracking, and asset management solutions.

Focusing on empowering resellers, Navleb’s user-friendly software integrates advanced analytics, customizable dashboards, and scalable solutions for industries such as logistics, transportation, and construction.

Headquartered in Lebanon, and with a growing presence in Africa and the Middle East market, Navleb combines cutting-edge technology with exceptional customer support to help businesses enhance operational efficiency, reduce costs, and improve decision-making.
 
Discover how Navleb's products can drive your success at www.navleb.com

name: TransNumerik
description:
TransNumerik, a two-time Microsoft Partner of the Year (2022 & 2023), delivers AI and Cybersecurity solutions for African enterprises, enabling seamless digital transformation.

DIGITAL TRANSFORMATION:
- Cloud migration, business process automation, and unified collaboration tools.
- Maximize efficiency with Microsoft apps.

STRATEGIC CONSULTING:
IT strategy, training, and cost optimization via SAM.

CYBERSECURITY:
Security assessments, Zero Trust, penetration testing, and secure architecture.

ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE:
Microsoft Copilot, AI-powered virtual assistants, and advanced video/image analysis.

Together, let's unleash your digital potential with TransNumerik!

name: Trend Micro DMCC
description:
About Trend Micro 
Trend Micro, a global cybersecurity leader, helps make the world safe for exchanging digital information. Fueled by decades of security expertise, global threat research, and continuous innovation, Trend Micro's AI-powered cybersecurity platform protects hundreds of thousands of organizations and millions of individuals across clouds, networks, devices, and endpoints. As a leader in cloud and enterprise cybersecurity, Trend’s platform delivers a powerful range of advanced threat defense techniques optimized for environments like AWS, Microsoft, and Google, and central visibility for better, faster detection and response. With 7,000 employees across 70 countries, Trend Micro enables organizations to simplify and secure their connected world. www.TrendMicro.com.

name: TradePulse
description: TradePulse is an agricultural raw material sourcing platform for Agro-processors such as millers. Sourcing raw material is a key success factor for both agro-processors and raw material suppliers. We provide raw material suppliers and agro-processors with three critical services. 1) Matching service: we match raw material suppliers to agro-processors, ensuring a large network of suppliers and buyers; 2) Escrow payment service: we connect raw material suppliers and agro-processors with an escrow wallet to manage payments and deliveries; 3) Market Insights: we provide both agro-processors and raw material suppliers with farm gate and market price, variety, quantity and quality data for various agricultural raw material.

name: Truck Your Kitchen (TYK)
description: Street food in Morocco faces major challenges in quality, hygiene, and regulation, leading to unsafe food practices, lack of consumer trust, and limited opportunities for entrepreneurs. Many vendors struggle to formalize their businesses due to complex regulations, lack of funding, and no structured support. TYK is transforming urban food mobility with electric, smart, and fully equipped food bikes, optimizing logistics and mobility while ensuring clean, compliant, and efficient street food operations. By integrating real-time tracking and data reporting, we plan to support ONSSA and authorities in regulating food safety and vendor operations. Beyond food safety, TYK offers a dynamic marketing solution, allowing brands to deploy custom-branded mobile food units at high-visibility events such as the World Cup, GITEX, business summit, and other events. Our IoT-powered application delivers real-time sales data, temperature monitoring, GPS location tracking, and vendor compliance insights.

name: TRUE DELTA

name: Trenderz
description: Trenderz is an AI-powered influencer marketing platform designed for African businesses. We help SMBs easily connect with the right content creators, manage impactful campaigns, and track performance in real time—all in one place. Our platform uses smart matching algorithms, fraud detection, and content optimization tools to ensure businesses maximize their visibility and return on investment. With a mobile-first approach and a freemium model, Trenderz makes digital marketing accessible, especially for companies with limited resources. We also empower local influencers—65% of whom are women—by increasing their access to brand collaborations and monetization opportunities. Our services include influencer discovery, campaign automation, UGC ad performance tools, and real-time analytics. Trenderz is revolutionizing digital marketing in Francophone Africa by combining technology, local insight, and inclusive growth.

The company is also the producer of the TTlink brand. Through transparency, consistent service, and a strong commitment to quality, TTH Company has built a solid and reliable reputation as a trusted value-added supplier. Integrity is a fundamental principle, ensuring that every approach is centered on customer needs, striving for complete satisfaction, anticipating expectations, and exceeding them.

name: Turtle Rewards Club
description:
Turtle Rewards is revolutionising customer loyalty with an innovative multi-vendor platform. We enable businesses of all sizes to create customized loyalty programs while giving customers a single app to earn & manage rewards across multiple stores.

* Leveraging WhatsApp AI integration allowing customers to discover businesses, check point balances, and redeem offers through familiar chat interface
* Scalable SaaS App designed for global expansion
* Analytics for businesses with customer purchase patterns
* One-stop loyalty management reducing "wallet fatigue" for consumers
* Easy setup process taking just minutes for businesses to join
* Cost-effective subscription model making loyalty programs accessible to SMEs

A win-win ecosystem where businesses gain powerful customer retention tools and valuable insights, while consumers enjoy a simplified, rewarding experience across various stores.

We are making reward programs more accessible, engaging, and effective for everyone involved!

name: TSS Ltd.
TURKUAZ CABLE
description:
TURKUAZ CABLE, Inc.
Turkuaz Cable, Inc. has been a leading telecommunication cables manufacturer, serving both the domestic and international markets, since 2000. We contribute in the telecommunication industry through the production of fiber optic cables, copper insulated telecommunication cables and data LAN cables. Turkuaz Cable brought a modern manner to the Turkish cable industry by combining flexible operations with high quality products. We provide superior products and services through our manufacturing plant and headquarters based in Gebze, Kocaeli, Turkey. Turkuaz Cable combines the modern developments in the cable industry at its manufacturing plant of 20000 m² closed and 30000 m² open area by 100 skillful personnel. It is our core to respond our customer's requests by offering remarkable products and services. Our employees are the most valuable asset of our company. Each individual has a long-standing experience in the industry.

name: Ubicentrex
description: Ubicentrex is a leading SaaS provider specializing in telephony, scheduling, messaging, and AI-powered virtual receptionist services. Our all-in-one cloud platform enhances call center productivity with seamless communication management, real-time analytics, and secure VoIP technology. Designed for flexibility and efficiency, Ubicentrex integrates with third-party applications to streamline workflows. Our AI conversational agents improve customer interactions, while our high-quality telephony solutions ensure reliability. With a commitment to innovation and user experience, Ubicentrex empowers businesses to optimize their operations and deliver outstanding service.

name: TwinLink
description: TwinLink is pioneering the next generation of digital engagement with Conversational Video Agents (CVAs)—AI-driven digital twins that replicate human interactions through video. Unlike traditional chatbots, our avatars detect emotions in real-time, adapting responses to deliver empathetic, face-to-face conversations. This approach significantly reduces operational costs, boosts customer satisfaction, and increases conversions. TwinLink serves sectors including financial services, e-commerce, education, and government, notably improving financial inclusion in markets like Morocco. With advanced capabilities such as emotion analytics, multilingual support including Moroccan Darija, continuous AI retraining, and seamless CRM integrations, TwinLink empowers organizations to humanize digital interactions globally.

description:

learning experience for teachers, parents, and students. We are headquartered in Bengaluru, India. Kidvento was founded in May, 2017 by Sumanth Prabhu and Nikhil Bhaskar and since then has impacted over 1.5million students through it's products and services. 

Some of the major brands under Kidvento are

- Science Box - Innovation lab setup in schools

With the team size of 150+, Kidvento is present across India and ventured into middle east and Africa. The team consists of seasoned academicians, L&D professionals, educationists etc. Till now, Kidvento has raised over 5 million USD in funding.

name: UiPath
description: UiPath (NYSE: PATH) develops AI technology that mirrors human intelligence with ever-increasing sophistication, transforming how businesses operate, innovate, and compete. The UiPath Platform™ accelerates the shift toward a new era of agentic automation—one where agents, robots, people, and models integrate seamlessly to drive autonomy and smarter decision-making. With a focus on security, accuracy, and resiliency, UiPath is committed to shaping a world where AI enhances human potential and revolutionizes industries.

name: Ulefone
description:
Ulefone is a global leading brand renowned for rugged smartphones and terminal devices, and we have 15 years of history in manufacturing smartphones and mobile devices. Our products have many breakthroughs in the industry and won high value from customers and the press, such as the industry's first huge battery rugged phone, intercom rugged phone, 5G rugged phone, flagship photography rugged phone, thermal imaging rugged phone, outdoor rugged phone. 
In 2025, we will keep moving to enrich our product ecosystem and bring out more phone accessories like uSmart series accessories and other terminal devices like Armor Pad. Let our users experience more playability and lead a better life and work easier with richer features and accessories.
In addition, we have full R&D, production and manufacturing capacity, and can also provide customized services for industries and large enterprises.

description: ULAK Communications Inc. was founded by SSTEK on April 20, 2017, to ensure Türkiye’s technological independence. ASELSAN acquired 51% of shares in 2018, and HAVELSAN took over 25% in 2020. ULAK develops sustainable, reliable, and national communication infrastructure products using local resources. With thousands of 4.5G sites and SDN nodes, it plays a key role in ICT, defense, and technology industries. Its expanding ecosystem fosters collaboration and innovation to strengthen Türkiye’s technological competencies. With the motto “Communication Power for 5G and Beyond,” ULAK carries out high-value R&D for 5G and Beyond, contributing to global standards. It prioritizes end-to-end national network technologies, patents, and intellectual property rights. Committed to shaping the future of communication, ULAK continues to develop impactful projects, foster cooperation, and enhance Türkiye’s presence in the global market.

name: Umg Alholo Co
description:
SingleView is a leading open banking platform designed to revolutionize corporate banking by providing businesses with seamless financial management, real-time insights, and secure transactions. Our platform integrates with multiple banks, enabling companies to access, monitor, and control their finances from a single, unified dashboard.

With SingleView, businesses can streamline payments, manage beneficiaries, track account statements, and enhance financial decision-making with real-time data. Our secure API-driven architecture ensures compliance with open banking regulations while offering a user-friendly experience.

We empower enterprises to optimize their financial workflows, reduce operational complexities, and gain full visibility into their cash flow. By bridging the gap between businesses and financial institutions, SingleView enhances efficiency, transparency, and security in corporate banking.

name: Valiance Analytics Pvt Ltd
description:
Valiance is redefining digital transformation with AI-powered video intelligence, data engineering, and cloud innovation. Our cutting-edge solutions go beyond optimization—they save lives, enhance security, and drive social impact. From preventing human-wildlife conflicts to revolutionizing public safety, we harness AI for good, making a real difference. With 150+ experts across India, the US, and Singapore, we’ve delivered 100+ projects. We have collaborated with multiple governments and enterprises and fortune 500 companies as well, across verticals, delivering high-impact AI solutions that transform the way organizations operate.

Valiance has earned prestigious accolades, including recognition by PM Modi for Wildlife Eye in Mann Ki Baat and multiple awards from AIMA, NASSCOM (AI gamechangers award), Aegis Graham Bell Winner, AICRA, and AIM. Our AI innovations in public safety, healthcare, and data engineering have been globally recognized, reinforcing our leadership in deep-tech.

description:
Univers AP est un partenaire " Build & Value-Added Reseller " de SAP, avec le statut Gold depuis 2018. 
Nous sommes les seuls dans la région Afrique Francophone à proposer nos services sur les trois ERP de SAP, à savoir : SAP S/4HANA, SAP Business ByDesign et SAP Business One, qui sont dédiés aux grandes, moyennes et petites entreprises, respectivement. 

Nous proposons une palette de services qui s’articulent autour de : 

* L'Intégration des solutions SAP en Premise et en Cloud 
* Upgrade des solutions SAP 
* La Tierce Maintenance Applicative (TMA) 
* L‘Assistance à la Maitrise d‘Ouvrage (AMOA) 
* Centre de Support et de Maintenance (CMS)

description: Mohammed VI University of Health Sciences (UM6SS) is committed to training healthcare professionals in a human-centered environment. It offers an inclusive and dynamic learning space where student diversity fosters enriching exchanges. Through innovative, experience-based teaching methods, UM6SS prepares its students to tackle healthcare challenges in Morocco and the MENA region. By collaborating with national and international institutions, the university aims to shape future leaders and redefine the healthcare sector, positioning itself as a key driver of change for local and global communities.

name: Velo Volt SARL
description: ChatAI GPS transforms fleet management with AI and natural language tools that work through your favorite messaging apps—no platforms, no learning curve. Ask questions, automate tasks, and control your fleet with simple messages. Our solutions are hardware-agnostic and work for both pros with large fleets and individual users. For those needing hardware, we offer plug & play GPS trackers that are ultra-easy to install and require zero technical skills. Simple, smart, and scalable.

name: Velours3D
description:
Velours3D is a platform that transforms the way furniture is sold and showcased using 3D and AI.
We enable furniture sellers to quickly create realistic, customizable visualizations of living spaces. Our current focus is on traditional Moroccan salons, where design is culturally rich but still reliant on manual methods like sketches and verbal explanations.
By offering an immersive and interactive experience, Velours 3D helps sellers close deals faster, reduce errors, and boost customer confidence.
Tailored to the specific needs of the Moroccan market, our solution is also built to scale with future plans to support modern living rooms and complete home layouts.
Velours3D is on track to become the leading interior visualization tool in Morocco, with the ambition to expand across emerging markets and bring digital design to sellers everywhere.

name: VEONE
description:
VEONE Corp is a multinational leading IT company in West Africa, renowned for its expertise and innovation. The group provides tailored solutions to meet the needs of both local and international businesses.  

The company stands out for:  
- Its status as an Odoo Gold Partner, a recognition of its excellence in implementing Odoo solutions.  
- A wide range of services, including software integration, hosting, custom solution development, training, and strategic support.  
- A commitment to innovation and digital transformation, helping clients grow and address the region's specific challenges.  

VEONE Corp is a key player, empowering businesses to achieve their goals with cutting-edge tools and top-tier expertise.

VENTlON is derived from the word"invention," symbolizing the brand's continuous creativity. Upholding the concept of innovation, we constantly explore new fields, driven by technology and led by design. We consistently develop more innovative and forward-thinking products, providing users with a more comfortable, efficient, and convenient experience, ensuring technology truly serves life.
We are deeply invested in the intelligent 3C accessories field, with a passion for and pursuit of a better life. We are dedicated to transforming every ounce of creativity into the potential to improve lives.

name: VelyVelo
description:
VelyVelo is a startup founded by Moroccan entrepreneurs, first launched in France to reinvent last-mile delivery. We are the Neo Leaser of delivery vehicles: e-bikes, e-cargo bikes, tricycles..
We finance where others won’t. Our model enables couriers and delivery operators to access high-performing fleets without upfront costs, bank loans, or traditional leasing.
Our solution combines long-term rental, predictive maintenance, fleet management, and energy hubs.
With VelyVelo, it’s One bike, one job. We empower thousands of riders with the tools they need to work—50% cheaper than a scooter, 90% cheaper than a van.
Present in France and Morocco, and Spain, we work with major last mile delivery platforms & players. .
As part of the Endeavor network and backed by leading investors, VelyVelo scales inclusive and sustainable urban logistics across Europe and MENA.

name: VESENSE / MAJJANE
description: Since 2003, Majjane Agency has been a leader in digital innovation, providing tailored web, mobile, digital marketing, and design solutions that empower businesses in today's connected landscape. With 21 years of proven expertise, we turn your ideas into impactful digital realities that captivate audiences and deliver measurable results. From custom-developed websites and intuitive mobile apps to targeted digital marketing campaigns and compelling designs, our approach addresses your unique goals and challenges. Complementing our digital mastery, Vesens, part of our group, brings specialized expertise as an ESN (Digital Services Company), providing IT consulting, software engineering, and digital transformation solutions. Together, Majjane Agency and Vesens blend creativity, technology, and strategic insight to drive your digital success.

name: Verve Technologies
description: Verve Technologies is an innovative startup specializing in IoT, AI, and software development. It transforms ideas into smart solutions, optimizing energy management, construction, and industrial processes. Verve’s flagship products include DariWatt/ProWatt, an advanced energy monitoring system using AI for consumption analysis and optimization, and SSKonstruct, a BIM platform enhancing project collaboration and efficiency. The company focuses on automation, real-time data processing, and user-friendly solutions to drive sustainability and operational excellence. Verve delivers high-performance, scalable solutions tailored to client needs.

name: Vesicash Innovative Technologies
description: Vesicash Innovative Technologies was founded in 2018 with a mission to transform the African digital economy by empowering African businesses to make and receive secure digital payments in a seamless, customized, and bespoke manner. At the core of our offering is our patented digital escrow technology, which ensures secure transactions and has helped over 5,000 businesses grow and scale. In addition to this, we have expanded our services to include Merchant of Record (MoR) services, where we manage compliance, payment collection, and risk on behalf of both local and global businesses. Our comprehensive payment processing solutions further simplify the process of accepting and processing payments, making it easier for businesses to operate across local and global markets. Through these innovations, Vesicash is driving growth, reducing friction in digital payments, and facilitating seamless cross-border transactions.

name: VIC IT Consulting
description: Vic IT Consulting is a leading technology solutions provider, specializing in five key pillars to help businesses succeed in a digital-first world. Our Security Services (Cyber, Data, Pentest, Vulnerability & Networking monitoring) ensure robust protection against cyber threats, offering network security, threat detection, and risk mitigation. Through Digital Services, We have combined infrastructure, audit and Enterprise DevOps & SecOps professionals to create a formidable team to deliver our wide array of testing capabilities. Our Infrastructure Services provide businesses with scalable and reliable IT infrastructure to support growth and high performance. With Consulting & Professional Services, we offer strategic IT advice, content management, patch management helping businesses align technology with their objectives. Finally, our Governance & Compliance Services help organizations with ISO certificates and IT audits to stay compliant with industry standards, managing risks.

name: VINSIGHTE TECHNOLOGY
description:
Vinsighte designed an AI assistive reading technology known as Visis which aids the visually impaired, and persons with ADHD and dyslexia to read books and identify scenes and colors independently. 

Founded in 2020 and operating from Lagos, Nigeria, our vision is to aid the blind access to quality education through digital technology. Since inception, we have been able to impact about 15,000 visually impaired persons with $205,000 in revenue. 

Our product is being used in Visually impaired schools across 4 states in Nigeria, as well as in visually impaired communities such as LAWSNAID and the Nigeria Association of the Blind. 

We have partnered with the likes of MIT, Facebook, Halcyon, and Mastercard Foundation to scale our solution across Africa, and we are actively working to expand our impact to 50,000 persons.

Avec une présence de près de 15 ans en Afrique, nous accompagnons les organisations dans leur démarche de digitalisat ...

name: VOCALCOM MAGHREB
description:
Vocalcom is a French publisher of contact center software, international leader in omnichannel customer engagement solutions in private or public cloud. For more than 28 years, Vocalcom has had a strong international presence in 47 countries around the world with more than 1,200 customers. We have been supporting leading European outsourcers and brands to manage customer interactions, predictive omnichannel campaigns across all channels (customer service, sales, telemarketing and collections).
We bring the best of innovation to Vocalcom's customers by relying on a selective ecosystem of leading partners who complement our offers. 

Our expertise in CRM integration allows us to manage customer engagement centers for optimal control of the journey.

Using data and AI, our platform Hermes360, leverage customer knowledge to simplify interactions across all channels and create more seamless journeys that meet customer expectations, ensuring customer and agent satisfaction.

name: VISA
description:
Visa Inc. is a trusted world leader in digital payment technology . Founded in 1958  by Bank of America, it was rebranded as Visa in 1976. 
Visa operates the world's largest retail electronic payments network and is dedicated to facilitating electronic funds transfers through Visa-branded credit, debit, and prepaid cards. The company's mission is to connect the world through its innovative, reliable, and secure payment network, enabling individuals, businesses, and economies to thrive. Visa's extensive infrastructure includes advanced processing networks, such as VisaNet, which manage more than 65,000 transaction messages per second. The company emphasizes security and fraud prevention, leveraging technologies like EMV chip cards, tokenization, and biometric authentication. Visa collaborates with financial institutions, merchants, technology partners, and government entities worldwide, striving to expand financial inclusion and drive the evolution of digital payments globally.

name: Vision IT
description:
Créée en 2018, Vision IT est une startup spécialisée dans la formation, la conception de solutions numériques et l’accompagnement des entreprises en TIC. Nous nous sommes démarqués dans le domaine de la santé numérique avec notre projet phare MEDICSYS (https://medicsys.live/), un écosystème de plateformes interconnectées visant à améliorer l’accès aux soins médicaux grâce aux technologies numériques.

Outre MEDICSYS, nous avons expérimenté plusieurs autres projets comme Écogestion (gestion scolaire), Tayani (location de véhicules ), et Tare Shop (vente en ligne), avant de nous concentrer pleinement sur la modernisation du secteur de la santé.
Aujourd’hui, avec des applications comme MedicRdv (prise de rendez-vous et téléconsultation) , MedicPharma (gestion pharmaceutique), MedicBoutique (vente de produits médicaux et paramédicaux) et MedicInfo (actualités sanitaires), nous nous imposons comme un acteur clé de la transformation numérique du secteur médical au Niger.

name: VOIX OFF
description: Voixoff.ma is the #1 voice-over platform in Morocco, trusted by hundreds of agencies, video producers, and brands. We specialize in providing high-quality, professional voice-over services in Arabic (Darija, Classical), French, English, and other languages.

name: VOVE ID
description: At VOVE ID, we believe identity verification should be simple, secure, and built for real growth. That’s why we’ve created a trusted solution tailored for startups and SMEs across MENA & Africa. From KYC and AML compliance to advanced fraud detection, our tools help businesses onboard customers faster, stay compliant, and scale with confidence. Whether you're a fintech, mobility platform, or online marketplace, we make it easy to build trust with your users from day one. Backed by cutting-edge technology and a team that cares, VOVE ID is here to be your growth partner, because we know what it’s like to build from the ground up.

name: WANA CORPORATE
description:
inwi est un opérateur global. Il offre des solutions de télécommunications à la pointe de la technologie mais également des solutions numériques de premier plan, des centres de données aux normes internationales (Tier-3), des services cloud et de cybersécurité entre autres services aux entreprises. 
Fort de ses investissements, fruit de sa confiance en la nécessité de développer l’infrastructure de télécommunications du Royaume, il déploie par ailleurs et avec succès des services internet pour les foyers et les entreprises, en utilisant un mix technologique, allant de l’ADSL pour le plus grand nombre, au FTTH pour des débits les plus élevés du marché, en passant par la Box 4G dont les performances s’ajoutent à sa mobilité et enfin le VSAT pour les zones les plus reculées. Opérateur engagé, innovant et inclusif, inwi se donne pour mission d’accompagner le développement et l’inclusion numérique du pays.

name: VunaPay
description: VunaPay enables instant payments to smallholder farmers upon produce delivery to their cooperative. Our platform helps cooperatives manage produce and farm inputs, calculates farmer payouts in real-time (net of any credit), and works with financial partners to disburse payments instantly. Cooperatives repay once the produce is sold, and we collect our fee at that stage. We don’t offer loans. Just faster, fairer payments.

description: Washminute is a disruptive, tech-driven startup revolutionizing the way vehicles are cleaned. By blending innovation with sustainability, we offer an on-demand platform that connects users to professional, eco-conscious car care services in minutes—all at the tap of an app. Our model leverages cutting-edge technology to streamline bookings, reduce water waste, and deliver fast, affordable washes right where you park. Think Uber convenience meets green innovation, empowering users to care for their cars and the planet without compromising speed, quality, or cost. Welcome to the future of car care—simpler, smarter, and sustainable.

name: Wanma
description:
Wanma Technology Co., Ltd. is a leading innovative enterprise specializing in intelligent information technology solutions, committed to empowering digital transformation across industries. Founded in 1997, headquartered in Hangzhou, China, the company focuses on R&D, manufacturing, and integration of cutting-edge technologies such as 5G communication, IoT, big data analytics, and cloud computing.

With a customer-centric approach, Wanma delivers tailored solutions for sectors including smart cities, industrial automation, and smart transportation. Its core products and services encompass IoT terminals, network infrastructure, data management platforms, and AI-powered applications, enabling clients to optimize operations, enhance efficiency, and drive sustainable growth.

Wanma boasts 200+ patents, certifications like ISO9001,  ISO14001 and ISO18001 and other Management System Certification. In addition, some products passed the National CCC Certification, UL and CE Certification.

name: Wasit
description:
Wasit empowers small-scale farmers in emerging markets by providing access to capital through a revenue-sharing model, backed by LLM-powered risk assessments for sustainable growth. 

Farmers gain the resources to expand their projects, while investors benefit from automated transactions and transparent, real-time project updates.

With plans to scale across Africa, our goal is to drive sustainable agricultural growth through technology and a commitment to impact.

name: Waterfall Security Solutions Ltd.
description:
Enabling critical OT operations with hardware-enforced protection
Waterfall Security makes hardware-enforced cybersecurity products that are used for protecting the OT networks of critical infrastructures around the world. For nearly 20 years, sensitive industries and critical infrastructures have trusted Waterfall to guarantee safe, secure, and reliable operations. Waterfall’s global install-base includes power plants, nuclear reactors, onshore/offshore oil & gas facilities, refineries, manufacturing plants, water utilities, railways, airports, casinos, data centers, governments, defense companies, and mining operations. Waterfall’s patented technologies leverage the benefits of combining hardware with software to deliver Engineering-grade security that enables industrial operations to continue running in the ever-evolving OT threat environment.

name: WaterSec by Istidama
description: WaterSec is a climate-tech startup founded in Tunisia that provides intelligent water management solutions using IoT and AI technologies. Our platform enables industries and large buildings to monitor water consumption in real time, detect anomalies such as leaks, and receive dynamic, personalized recommendations to reduce water waste and improve operational efficiency. WaterSec follows a hybrid business model based on hardware leasing and a SaaS subscription, with ongoing development of a data product (WSBIG) to support predictive analytics. With traction in the MENA region and early leads in Europe, we are now preparing to scale internationally. Our diverse founding team combines expertise in engineering, software, cybersecurity, and sustainability. WaterSec is committed to accelerating the transition to sustainable water use across industries and regions most affected by climate change.

name: Woliz
description: Woliz is a fintech-powered ecosystem transforming nano stores into digital hubs. Built on the foundation of FMCG.ma, a proven AI-powered order taking solutions with a universe of 50k nano stores, Woliz integrates loyalty rewards, digital payments, and AI-driven operations to connect nano stores, consumers, and FMCG brands in a smarter, gamified way.

name: Winu Consulting
description:
We are a people-centered technology company that values proximity, trust, and adaptability. With over a decade of experience in the IT sector, we support organizations across industries by delivering tailored and scalable digital solutions that meet their operational and strategic needs. Our commitment is to provide efficient, secure, and high-performance services, while building long-term partnerships rooted in transparency and technical excellence.

Our product suite reflects this mission, combining innovation and real-world impact. From intelligent automation tools to next-gen AI platforms, we help companies streamline processes, gain insights, and stay competitive. Among our flagship solutions is Operators, an AI-as-a-Service platform offering customizable AI agents for accounting, HR, IT support, legal, and more. Designed to be accessible and flexible, Operators exemplifies how we turn complex technologies into practical, value-driven solutions for modern businesses.

name: Wise Market

consumers by offering a structured mobile phone buyback and recycling program. Pakistan has around 170 million mobile phone users, including
130 million smartphone users and 40 million feature phone users. Our goal is to refurbish old phones and provide an effective solution to the
growing e-waste problem.

A fast-paced and cutting-edge company, WB Technologies Co. is dedicated to bringing innovative products and providing outstanding services to customers around the world.

XAYone, a leading Moroccan provider of digital identity, trust and cybersecurity services. We develop and deploy advanced CIAM, e-signature, KYC and cybersecurity solutions, to help businesses stay secure and compliant.  

Our CIAM platform provides comprehensive identity and access management solutions, It enables businesses to verify, monitor, and automate identity and access-related processes, ensuring secure and seamless user interactions. 
 
Our e-signature platform helps businesses securely sign, verify, streamline, and manage document flows, ensuring compliance. 

Xayone supports companies in their KYC journeys with innovative solutions like Passenger ID Check for rigorous identity verification and a better onboarding experience. 

We also deploy cybersecurity technologies to strengthen security postures, ensuring businesses benefit from best-in-class protection across their digital ecosystems.

Contact us at sales@xayone.com for more information.

name: WEJHA
description:
At WEJHA, we turn every digital sign into a smart sensor, providing valuable insights that help businesses make informed decisions. We are a leader in digital signage innovation in Saudi Arabia, offering top-tier software, advanced hardware, and exceptional customer service. Our platform allows businesses to communicate powerful messages across various locations, such as airports, malls, and healthcare facilities. With a team of skilled professionals, WEJHA is committed to delivering innovative solutions that enhance brand recognition and drive growth under our motto: «Your Destination for Excellence. »
With a commitment to excellence, WEJHA set out to redefine digital signage. Each display serves as a canvas for storytelling— whether in bustling malls, vibrant airports, or serene corporate offices—bringing spaces to life and sparking engagement.

name: Yakeey
description:
Yakeey is an end-to-end transactional marketplace that radically simplifies the experience of buying, selling and renting real estate. We leverage on data and technology to connect all real estate market players through a state of the art platform, create a chain of trust and powerful network effects and accelerate transactions. Yakeey is built on a community of RE advisors, YakeeyPRO, to deliver a continuous professional and tailored service at every step of the transaction.
The 7 pillars of our value proposition are:
- The largest local transactional marketplace for seamless customer journeys
- A secure, professional platform ensuring reliable and legally compliant listings
- The largest and most trusted network of RE brokers in Morocco
- A strong lead provider network leveraging ground-level insights
- Unique solutions for developers to unlock their inventories for intermediaries and buyers
- AI-driven valuation for transparency
- A fintech platform simplifying real estate financing

name: Welearn
description:
Welearn – Pioneering EdTech for Building & realestate

As a trailblazer in Moroccan EdTech, Welearn specializes in the construction and building sector, as a first step, leveraging innovation across content, pedagogy, and technology to transform learning. Recognized as a Young Innovative Company in Morocco (2020) and France (2023), we empower professionals through cutting-edge eLearning and in-person programs, including Masters, certifications, and white-label academies.

We lead in developing skill ecosystems for individuals and organizations, with expertise in Materials, Energy Efficiency, BIM, Project Management, and Real Estate. By merging knowledge and technology, Welearn bridges the gap between education and industry—driving progress in Morocco and beyond.

name: Whalebone
description: Whalebone is a cybersecurity company developing user-centric products for telcos, ISPs, and enterprises. It provides millions of internet users a seamless digital life protection, keeping them safe from malware, phishing schemes, ransomware, and other malicious digital attacks without the need to download anything. The company has repeatedly proven its potential by enabling T1 telcos to effectively protect their customers, while significantly raising their revenue. Whalebone has more than 400+ customers in telecommunications and corporate sectors around the globe and 100 team members with representation worldwide. Whalebone's mission is to bring cybersecurity to 1 billion people.

name: Whale Cloud Technology Co., Ltd
description: Whale Cloud is a leading technology company that specializes in the digital transformation of telecommunication service providers and other verticals. We provide mission-critical solutions and services in Telecom, FinTech, and E&G sectors. At Whale Cloud, we're passionate about creating frictionless experiences for customers and empowering their digital ambitions.

name: Yinkozi
description:
Yinkozi is a leading cybersecurity company dedicated to protecting mobile applications from advanced threats. Our flagship product, YinkoShield, is an advanced mobile security SDK that defends against tampering, reverse engineering, overlay attacks, and accessibility exploitation.

Developed by Yinkozi, YinkoShield seamlessly integrates with OpenTelemetry, enabling real-time monitoring and forensic analysis. Designed for scalability, our solution supports 12,000 different devices and currently protects over 30 million people across Africa.

Unlike traditional security solutions, YinkoShield offers a zero-trust approach while maintaining a seamless user experience. By bridging the gap between performance, security, and user support, YinkoShield empowers developers and businesses to secure their applications without compromising speed or usability.

Trusted by global enterprises, YinkoShield continues to ensure resilient protection in an evolving digital landscape.

name: YAKO ICT HUB
description:
YAKO ICT-Hub is a project under YAKO U Ltd, focused on developing and operating Uganda's first Special Economic Zone (SEZ) dedicated to the export of IT services. This initiative utilizes the Freezone Act to tackle challenges within the sector and promote the creation of high-quality jobs, particularly for educated, unemployed youth and women in technology.YAKO ICT-Hub is committed to establishing a world-class Special Economic Zone for technology services. 

Our goal is to accelerate investment and promote the establishment of offshore offices by providing state-of-the-art infrastructure and auxiliary services that enhance operational efficiency.

SANC controls its own research and development, production and sales departments, which allows net assets to grow over 50 times and annual revenue 100 times during its 18 years' operation.
SANC headquarters in Shenzhen and has a 100,000 square meters' manufacturing base in Yibin, Sichuan. 
SANC has a world-leading automated injection workshop, industry-leading production machines and a 12,000 square meters' dust-free workshop, which enables the assembly of LCD modules by automatically transferring units from the module workshop to the assembly workshop via a seamless connection.  
SANC has been recognized as a National High Tech Enterprise and passed ISO9001, IS014001, BRA, CCC, TUV, UL among with other related certifications.

name: WIALON
description:
Gurtam is a global software development company that specializes in creating fleet management solutions for diverse niches and businesses, leveraging telematics and IoT technologies. It is headquartered in Vilnius, Lithuania, and has offices in Boston, Dubai, and Tbilisi.

With over 20 years of experience in the market, Gurtam has established itself as a leading player in the industry with a robust portfolio of products designed to meet diverse business needs. The company's solutions are Wialon, flespi, and GPS-Trace.

Gurtam’s flagship product, Wialon, is the ultimate platform for GPS tracking and IoT. It offers robust functionality, including real-time vehicle tracking, driver behavior monitoring, and fuel control, making it an ideal solution for fleet management and digitalization. With Wialon, fleet owners can gain deep insights into their vehicles or machinery and make well-informed decisions, streamlining operations and enhancing efficiency.
sectors: Data, IoT, Ai,  RFID, Embedded Systems

name: YolPak
description:
YolPak is an innovative on-demand delivery platform designed to streamline C2C and B2B package transportation. With a focus on speed, security, and affordability, we connect individuals and businesses with trusted couriers for seamless deliveries. Our unique night delivery service optimizes efficiency and cost-effectiveness, ensuring timely shipments.

Leveraging smart logistics and AI-driven route optimization, YolPak minimizes delays and maximizes convenience. Our revenue model is commission-based, with subscription options that reduce fees for couriers, boosting participation.

We aim to disrupt the Turkish logistics market, starting in Istanbul, with future expansion into high-potential regions. With a strong technical team, experienced advisors, and a clear execution roadmap, YolPak is positioned to scale rapidly and attract major investments.

name: Zavgar Online
description: Zavgar.Online is the cloud service for fleet management. Its major tasks are fleet management digitizing, timely troubleshooting, and management based on figures and not feelings. The system helps keep track of all the fleet costs, allows the user to manage the maintenance process: knows what spare parts, by which manufacturer, and at what price were used during each repair, and much more. As a result, the person in charge gets the key figures: 1-km travel and operation costs. The person responsible for vehicles gets a digital assistant that organizes his work and removes 70% of routine tasks. The driver gets rid of all the paperwork.

name: Zazu
description:
Zazu is a next-generation SME banking platform designed to empower African founders and businesses with seamless financial management tools. 

More than just a bank account, Zazu integrates invoicing, bookkeeping, and cash flow insights, enabling SMEs to manage their finances effortlessly. 

Through smart automation, embedded services, and marketplace integrations, we simplify banking. With an AI-first approach, and a commitment to financial inclusion, Zazu is redefining SME banking across Africa, starting in South Africa.

name: zcare
description: Zcare is a healthtech startup revolutionizing orthopedic surgery with AI-driven 3D surgical guides. Our platform transforms medical imaging into patient-specific 3D models, enabling surgeons to enhance precision, reduce risks, and optimize surgical outcomes. We leverage advanced additive manufacturing, AI-based generative design, and cloud computing to provide efficient, regulatory-compliant solutions. With deep market expertise in the MENA region, Zcare collaborates with industry leaders to integrate cutting-edge technologies into clinical practice. Our mission is to empower surgeons with innovative, data-driven tools that improve patient care while streamlining workflows.
