name: Zinki AI
description:
Zinki AI offers AI-powered solutions for Arabic document processing, including:

Zinki OCR Engine: Converts printed and handwritten Arabic texts into machine-readable content.
SEbr (Digital Assets Management System): AI-driven platform for managing, searching, and processing large text collections.
Zinki IDP: Extracts structured data (JSON) from documents.
Speech-to-Text (STT): Transcribes Arabic audio and video into searchable text.
Automatic ML Fine-Tuning: Continuously enhances OCR accuracy.
Semantic Search Engine: Enables phrase, keyword, and contextual searches.
Text Processing Services: Summarization, classification, entity recognition, tagging, and indexing.
Flexible Export Options: Supports DOCX, TXT, and searchable PDFs.
These solutions help digitize manuscripts, civil records, real estate archives, and more while ensuring seamless integration with DMS and digital libraries.

name: Zoho Corporation
description: For more than 25 years, Zoho has been committed to building software and technology that help businesses excel. From small companies to large organizations, 100M+ users worldwide rely on Zoho to get work done. Zoho is privately held and profitable with more than 15,000 employees. Its privacy-first approach, long-term thinking, deep engineering focus, and customer-centric philosophy make it one of the world's most prolific technology companies. Headquartered in Chennai, India, Zoho has additional offices in the United States, Japan, China, Canada, Singapore, Mexico, Australia, the Netherlands, Brazil, Saudi Arabia, and the UAE. description:
ZIWO is an AI-Powered Cloud Customer Experience Platform providing straightforward cloud contact center services through our unmatched software that helps businesses save time and money while increasing their customer experience performance.

AFRICHARGER
description: Africharger is a leading AI-powered platform based in Côte d'Ivoire, specializing in sustainable energy, green mobility, and intelligent transport solutions. We develop electric bike-sharing networks, electric motorcycle programs, battery swapping stations, and renewable energy infrastructures, all enhanced by AI for smart data management, predictive maintenance, and optimized user experience. Africharger’s mission is to accelerate Africa’s transition to clean and intelligent mobility by offering affordable, reliable, and eco-friendly solutions. Our innovative models, such as daily repayment systems for electric motorcycles, are designed to promote economic inclusion, especially for youth and women. With deep local expertise, strong partnerships, and a commitment to social impact, Africharger is building a future where African cities are greener, smarter, and more connected, leveraging the power of electric transport and AI technologies.

name: Agenz
description: Agenz is Morocco’s leading digital real estate platform, transforming how second-hand property transactions are done. By combining proprietary data, AI-powered tools, and a certified network of real estate agents, Agenz delivers a fully streamlined, end-to-end buying and selling experience. The platform allows users to access accurate property valuations, personalized recommendations, and high-quality listings — all supported by a team of agents handling visits, negotiations, and closing. In a fragmented and opaque market, Agenz brings trust, efficiency, and scale. With second-hand real estate representing over 70% of market volume and a growing demand from the middle class, Agenz is building the infrastructure to modernize and accelerate property transactions across Morocco and beyond.

name: Al Houbara Travel and Tourism Company
AlgaePool
description: At  Algaepool , we transform end-of-life shipping containers into modular, IoT-driven units for efficient and sustainable microalgae production. Our solution is designed to minimize water usage, reduce labor requirements, and endure environmental challenges, making it ideal for scalable algae cultivation. By recycling containers, we not only reduce waste but also address the increasing demand for sustainable protein alternatives like spirulina. Our IoT-powered system ensures optimized performance, offering real-time data to improve operational efficiency. We serve current and future microalgae producers, as well as industrial players seeking eco-friendly, innovative solutions for sustainable food production. Algaepool is dedicated to advancing a circular economy and shaping the future of sustainable agriculture with accessible, cost-effective technology.

name: Alliance Pharma
description: ALLIANCE PHARMA is a West African-based startup whose goal is to bring peace to populations throughout their healthcare journey. In West Africa, countries import more than 90% of their medications and frequently experience drug shortages that cost the lives of many patients. ALLIANCE PHARMA helps its users obtain this critical availability information with one click, greatly reducing the burden on users. It also provides several other types of information and has services that allow populations to speak to doctors via a call center. In Burkina Faso, ALLIANCE PHARMA covers three cities with its advanced features and impacts more than 1,000 people per day. It has been choosen to become the official health app of the militaries and their families because of the leadership position that its have in the country.

name: ATAREC
description:
ATAREC is a Cleantech start-up that aim to reduce the humanity environmental footprint and promote its green energy autonomy through its innovative solutions in renewable energy, especially its patented solution in wave energy Wave Beat.
WAVE BEAT is a patented wave energy solution, present in more than 70 countries around the world, that makes benefit from existing infrastructures exposed to sea from breaking waves to producing green energy, such as Ports, Desalination Plants, Offshore platform.
WAVE BEAT energy is three time more continuous than solar, with a high space occupation efficiency (1 unit equivalent to 15000 m² of solar), using existing infrastructures makes 70% of its investment already paid by the asset owner, which make it one of the most competitive wave energy around the world.

name: AWARINO
description:
AWARINO is a cybersecurity company specializing in awareness and human risk management. Through our SaaS platform SENSIPRO, we help organizations meet legal and compliance requirements (ISO 27001, GDPR, PCI DSS…) while building a strong internal cybersecurity culture. Our platform offers personalized learning paths, automated phishing simulations, behavioral metrics, and compliance-ready reporting.

What sets us apart is the leadership of our CEO, a globally recognized cybersecurity expert with a strong international track record. AWARINO leverages years of consulting and integration experience to deliver scalable, impactful, and context-aware solutions.

As regulations tighten and human error remains the #1 attack vector, the need for engaging, human-centric awareness platforms is skyrocketing. AWARINO is uniquely positioned to lead this growing market and scale its impact globally.

name: bagpoint information technology
description: Bagpoint is a global baggage service platform redefining the travel experience through decentralized luggage handling solutions. We offer smart, secure, and seamless baggage services such as home check-in, bag drop at hubs, and airport delivery, allowing passengers to travel baggage-free. Our platform integrates directly with airline and airport systems and comply with aviation industry standards. Backed by a scalable ecosystem, Bagpoint connects travelers, logistics partners, airports, and airlines to simplify baggage processes, reduce congestion at terminals, and improve travelers experience. Bagpoint is committed to enabling smarter journeys while supporting sustainability and operational efficiency in the aviation industry.

name: Blink Pharma
description:
Revolutionizing Pharmacy Management with AI

Company Overview
Blink Pharma is a Health Tech company specializing in pharmacy management. We have launched a scalable AI-powered agent that adapts to any market. This AI assistant supports pharmacists and managers in optimizing their daily operations through real-time data analysis and actionable insights.

Key Features & Competitive Advantage
Our AI agent is designed to:
Analyze pharmacy data (sales, purchases, stock) to provide real-time strategic recommendations.
Assist the pharmacy team in recommending high-margin products based on patient symptoms.
Help managers allocate daily and monthly targets to pharmacy assistants.
Aggregate market data to benchmark pharmacy performance against competitors.
Unlike traditional solutions, our AI is independent of pharmacy ERPs and can integrate with any data source. Additionally, it features a conversational interface that simplifies complex analytics by delivering insights in natural language.

name: BRICOP
description: Bricop is a digital platform designed to transform the user experience in the construction and home improvement sector. Bricop uses artificial intelligence to optimize and personalize the purchasing journey, facilitating the management of renovation and construction projects. Many users abandon their shopping carts or cannot find the products that exactly match their needs due to unintuitive navigation or a lack of relevant recommendations. Furthermore, managing purchases by project can be complex and time-consuming without the right tools. Bricop aims to solve these problems by providing personalized suggestions, facilitating the discovery of products adapted to users' needs, helping them organize their purchases by project, and proposing precise quantities of materials based on the dimensions provided.

name: CarbonX
description:
CarbonX transforms climate action into financial value.

We help businesses measure, certify, and monetize their carbon reductions through turnkey solutions: carbon audits and roadmaps, certification of climate actions, carbon credit generation, brokerage services, and access to international markets for carbon credits and renewable energy certificates (RECs).

Our mission is to make decarbonization more accessible, fair, and rewarding, especially in regions like Africa where the potential is high but underutilized. By reducing market entry barriers and structuring a robust regional ecosystem, CarbonX ensures that every tonne of CO? avoided becomes a driver of sustainable growth and climate justice.

Combining technical rigor, financial expertise, and local insight, we bridge the gap between local action and global climate finance. We're also laying the foundation for a regional carbon trading platform tailored to the African context.

Cut emissions. Boost value. Build the future.

name: CloudTDMS
description:

If a company or organization is still using real data during project’s dev & test phases, the question is not IF but WHEN they will face a data breach ? 

Join us in creating a world where data works for you, not against you !

Présent dans plus de dix (10) pays de la sous-région, INTER CLAP GROUP est une fintech qui s’impose

Passerelle de paiement incontestée, nous vous offrons à travers ClaPay les meilleures offres sur nos moyens de paiement. Integrez nous sur vos differentes plateformes (e-commerce, trading, paris sportifs etc). Nous disposons de solutions simples et adaptées pour la satisfaction de toutes vos opérations.

name: Crédit Agricole du Maroc
description:
With a presence spanning over 60 years, our history is marked by a series of transformations and evolutions that have made Crédit Agricole Du Maroc a universal bank invested with a public service mission that forms its DNA.

We are proud to honor, every day, our commitment to rural areas and farmers, in service of our country's food sovereignty, through supporting national agricultural strategies and assisting operators and stakeholders in the sector.

As a universal bank, we play an important role in financing other sectors of the national economy, such as individuals and professionals, services, real estate, and more.

Crédit Agricole Du Maroc will continue to consolidate and develop the values that have shaped its history while ensuring a balance between its universal banking mission and its public service mission, which is dedicated to the socio-economic development of rural areas and agriculture, thanks to its human capital and the trust of its partners and clients.

name: Deepecho
description:
DeepEcho is a healthtech startup revolutionizing prenatal care through AI-powered software integrated directly into ultrasound machines.
Our deep learning solution mimics the expertise of trained sonographers, enabling both radiologists and frontline health workers to perform accurate, real-time prenatal scans. DeepEcho automatically captures fetal biometric measurements and significantly reducing screening time while improving diagnostic accuracy. Designed to work even in low-resource settings, our technology bridges critical gaps in maternal care — helping detect complications early, prevent birth defects, and reduce maternal and newborn mortality.

name: Fmcg.ma
description: FMCG.ma is an innovative startup based in Casablanca, specializing in AI-powered retail solutions for the fast-moving consumer goods (FMCG) sector. Our mission is to empower brands to grow sales, reduce operational costs, and build strong relationships with traditional local retailers. We offer a comprehensive suite of solutions including Sales as a Service, Analytics as a Service, a Merchandising App, and a gamified Engagement App. These tools help brands streamline commerce, gain data-driven insights, ensure in-store excellence, and empower merchants. Trusted by industry leaders, FMCG.ma combines deep sector expertise, agile methodologies, and culturally aware AI technologies to deliver impactful results. Committed to social responsibility, we actively support environmental sustainability, local communities, and employee well-being. At FMCG.ma, we are more than a service provider—we are your partner in driving retail excellence across Morocco and beyond.

name: FILAHI
description:
FILAHI is an AgriTech startup advancing agriculture through AI-driven drone and satellite technology. Our mission is to empower smallholder farmers with affordable, data-driven insights that optimize yields, reduce resource waste, and promote sustainability.

Our platform combines aerial imaging, predictive analytics, and weather data to deliver actionable insights for remote field management. Services include pest detection, crop yield estimation, weed identification, and real-time weather analytics , enabling farmers to address challenges like resource inefficiency and climate uncertainty.

FILAHI’s team of agronomists, AI experts, and data scientists collaborates with partners like DRONE Maroc and local cooperatives to scale impact. By 2026, we aim to support 100,000+ farmers, driving economic growth and climate resilience through smarter, greener practices.

name: ForeScout - StarLink
description:
"We envision a world where every cyber asset is seen, secure and compliant.
Forescout Technologies, Inc., a global cybersecurity leader, continuously identifies, protects and helps ensure the compliance of all managed and unmanaged cyber assets – IT, IoT, IoMT and OT. For more than 20 years, Fortune 100 organizations and government agencies have trusted Forescout to provide vendor-agnostic, automated cybersecurity at scale.

The Forescout Platform delivers comprehensive capabilities for network security, risk and exposure management, and threat detection and response. With seamless context sharing and workflow orchestration via ecosystem partners, it enables customers to more effectively manage cyber risk and mitigate threats."

name: fygurs
description: Fygurs is an AI-enhanced product management platform that unifies the entire product lifecycle – from idea capture and prioritisation to roadmapping, execution tracking, and outcome measurement – in one place. It bridges the gaps between strategy and delivery by linking top-down objectives with day-to-day development work and real-time results.

name: German Federal Ministry for Economic Affairs and Climate Action
Gobeba
description:
GoBEBA is the leading e-commerce utility platform providing safe, convenient access to essential bulk utilities like cooking energy and water. In Kenya and across urban Africa, where reliable gas and clean water infrastructure is lacking, GoBEBA ensures families enjoy seamless, high-quality utility access, bringing peace of mind when it matters most.

GoBEBA operates on a distributed logistics model powered by micro-warehousing, allowing fast, reliable last-mile delivery. By sourcing products directly from trusted brands, we guarantee authenticity and quality while optimizing supply chains for efficiency. Beyond direct-to-consumer sales, GoBEBA supports B2B2C solutions, enabling brands to sell directly to consumers through branded apps with integrated fulfillment.

With a broader ambition to create a fulfillment solution that brings customers closer to a near real-time utility supply experience, GoBEBA is advancing access to essential utilities across Africa.

name: Disklosure
description: Sectorial Sub-Topics,  Collect and consolidate Sustainability, Single and Double Materiality, Measure, track and improve sustainability metrics.

name: DeepLeaf
description:
DeepLeaf is an AI-driven agritech company transforming crop health monitoring. Our technology detects over 700 crop diseases, pests, and nutrient deficiencies with 96% accuracy by analyzing a single image of an infected leaf or fruit. We empower farmers with early disease detection, optimized pesticide use, and improved yields, reducing food loss and enhancing agricultural sustainability.

Our Mission
To revolutionize agriculture with AI-powered crop diagnostics, enabling farmers to minimize losses, maximize productivity, and meet global export standards while promoting sustainable and data-driven farming.

name: Doctify Health
description:
Doctify Health is the All-in-one EHR solution powered by AI for aesthetic and anti-aging doctors. We help doctors reduce administrative workload, automate clinical documentation, and enhance patient management allowing them to focus more on patient care and less on paperwork.

Our ambition is to become the leading aggregator of medical AI APIs in the EMEA region. We aim to continuously train our own specialized models and integrate the best available AI to automate data entry and enrich patient records with highly structured and actionable data.

By focusing on intelligent data capture and clinical decision support, we help doctors save time, improve accuracy, and unlock new levels of patient care. Built from day one with real-world feedback from practitioners, Doctify Health empowers clinics to grow faster while staying at the forefront of medical technology innovation.

With Doctify Health you are more than a doctor.

name: EKLECTIC
description: EKLECTIC is a leading provider of digital solutions and value-added services (VAS) for telecom operators across Africa and the Middle East. As a trusted aggregator, EKLECTIC connects mobile users to innovative content and services, including games, infotainment, and utility payment platforms. The company partners with major telecom operators such as Orange, Ooredoo, and Tunisie Telecom, and has active connections with over 25 operators worldwide. With a focus on user engagement, revenue generation, and seamless integration, EKLECTIC empowers operators to expand their digital portfolios while delivering added value to their subscribers. EKLECTIC is also ISO 9001 certified, reflecting its commitment to quality and operational excellence.

name: EPITOMEA

name: Enso Arabia ( For Saudi Premium Residency )
Illigo
description:
illigo is a technology start-up aiming to accelerate the development of electric mobility in emerging economies by installing and operating fast charging infrastructure and EV fleet management solutions integrated into a proprietary IOT platform.

illigo offers energy companies, landowners and commercial and industrial customers a turnkey solution to deploy EV chargers powered by the grid or a combination of solar power and batteries, whichever is the most cost effective.

Fleet electrification saves users up to 80% in operating costs all the while reducing their carbon footprint by 75-80% typically.

illigo was founded in Côte d'Ivoire in 2023 and is now expanding across Africa.

name: IMPACT Plus
description: Impact Plus est un entreprise qui intervient dans le domaine du numérique en lien avec l'inclusion financière et l'autonomisation des femmes .

name: INDRA
description:
Indra stands out as one of the leading global defense, space and technology companies. It is also a leader in digital transformation and information technologies in Spain and Latin America through its subsidiary Minsait. With a business model based on innovation and the comprehensive offer of its own high-value products, Indra is positioned as the technological partner par excellence for the digitization and key operations of its customers around the world. Sustainability is not only part of its business strategy, but also of its culture, responding to present and future social and environmental challenges.

In 2023, Indra recorded revenues of €4,343 million and has a workforce of more than 57,000 employees. With a local presence in 46 countries and business operations in more than 140 countries, Indra is positioned as a global company with a significant impact in various sectors.

name: Kenz'up
description: Launched in September 2020 Kenz’up is operating as a multi-brands retention and payment platform . Kenz’up has built an ecosystem of acceptance of more than 40 brands all over Morocco (with 1000 accepting POS).

name: LABDEV IT
description:
Labdev IT is a forward-thinking technology solutions provider, delivering scalable platforms for CRM, Supply Chain, E-Health, Agri-Tech. We offer custom web/mobile app development, secure hosting, and robust network infrastructure, optimizing digital ecosystems for performance and growth. Our expertise spans hardware/software security, cloud integration, and VoIP systems, ensuring seamless communication and data protection.  

As trusted IT consultants, we design ERP solution to streamline operations and integrate AI-driven services for automation, predictive analytics, and intelligent process optimization. Labdev IT blends cutting-edge technology with a client-centric approach, delivering agile cloud platforms and intuitive applications.  
Partner with Labdev IT to transform challenges into opportunities—where technology meets vision, and your success is our code.

name: Layer Data Consulting
description:
Layer Data is a consulting firm specializing in Data Governance, Data Quality, and Master Data Management (MDM). The company is made up of 50 consultants and has experienced a 30% annual growth since its creation five years ago.
It supports companies such as LVMH, Total Energies, HSBC, Airbus, EDF, the Central Bank of Morocco, Coca-Cola, and many others in their data transformation journey.
Its services include the creation of data governance and quality frameworks, strategic and architectural data consulting, as well as benchmarking, POCs/MVPs, and the implementation of Data Management platforms (Data Catalog, Data Quality, MDM), with strong partnerships with leading market vendors.
Layer Data operates in Europe (France, Italy, Belgium), Africa (Morocco, Algeria), and North America. With the creation of its Moroccan entity, Layer Data MEA, the company is planning an expansion into Africa.
Its core values are commitment, excellence, and respect.

name: Korpus LLC
description:
The company was established in 1992 by the top researchers of the Institute of Economics and Industrial Production Organization of the USSR Academy of Sciences.

We provide a software suite KorpusGIS for developing and managing water networks and/or we offer a turnkey solution through our consulting service:

1. Technical inspection and examination of the existing water supply and sewerage, incl. storm sewer systems, identification and documentation of their bottlenecks.
   
2.   Digital model based on KorpusGIS, which allows to: 
- create mathematical models of networks? 
- conduct topological analysis? 
- complete hydraulic calculations.
 
3. Reporting? detailed interpretations of results and practical recommendations for the modernization of existing networks and development of new systems.

name: Madasauto
description: DASAUTO specializes in advanced technological solutions for vehicle fleet management. It offers geolocation and fuel management tools that allow companies to monitor and optimize their vehicle usage in real time. With precise GPS tracking, DASAUTO helps reduce operating costs, prevent fuel losses due to leaks or theft, and improve route efficiency. In addition, the company offers driver behavior monitoring systems that detect dangerous behavior, thus reducing the risk of accidents and insurance costs. DASAUTO also aims to reinforce vehicle safety through features such as geo-fencing and alerts for unusual driving behavior. By providing driver training and detailed analytics, DASAUTO is committed to improving overall fleet management, increasing profitability, and making a positive contribution to the environment.

name: MAP
description: Maghreb Arabe Presse (MAP) is the official news agency of the Kingdom of Morocco, established in 1959. As a state-owned entity, MAP provides comprehensive, real-time news coverage on national and international affairs, with a focus on political, economic, social, and cultural developments. Headquartered in Rabat, the agency operates a vast network of correspondents across Morocco and worldwide, ensuring accurate and timely information. MAP offers multimedia content, including text, photos, videos, and infographics, serving government institutions, media outlets, businesses, and the public. The agency also manages strategic partnerships, press services, and digital platforms to enhance news dissemination. With a commitment to journalistic excellence, MAP plays a key role in shaping Morocco’s media landscape while adapting to evolving communication trends.

name: MATTERS
description:
As a leading Product Studio in France, with 17 years of experience, we turn bold ideas into market-ready digital products. Already active in Morocco, we are expanding across Africa, bringing expertise in product, design, and tech with a partner-first mindset.

We provide Product Strategy & Design, shaping winning products with market insights, user research, and experience-driven design. Our MVP & Scalable Solutions enable rapid development using no-code, low-code, full-code, and AI-powered approaches for efficient and scalable execution.

We help businesses accelerate growth and innovation, turning startups into scale-ups and enabling corporate teams to launch and incubate new ventures. Our Strategic & Technical Execution drives success across diverse industries: fintech, AI, IoT, transportation, and more. We also help investment funds with technical due diligence and guide scale-ups through hypergrowth.

Let’s build the future—together. Come to meet us

name: Montréal International
description:
Montréal: The best city for entrepreneurs and startups

You’re an entrepreneur and you’re planning to launch a company in an innovative sector such as artificial intelligence, video games, life sciences, cyber-security, “deep tech” or fintech? You’ve found the right place!

Take advantage of a vibrant ecosystem that drives startup success, with a wealth of incubators, accelerators, and venture capital investors ready to offer the support you need.

name: Moscow Export Center
description:
Moscow Export Center is a unique platform for establishing international business relations, developing and enhancing mutual export/import capacity.

Moscow Export Center provides full information about companies and guarantees safe partnerships.
     
Moscow export center organizes business meetings in Match-Making format between Moscow exporters and potential buyers, and technology tours to company workshops and offices.

During business meetings, Moscow export center provides translators, transfers around Moscow, and conference rooms for free

name: Mystery Gifts
description:
Mystery Gifts is an AI-powered platform that revolutionizes the gifting experience by offering personalized gift recommendations based on the recipient’s personality, interests, and occasion. Whether it’s for birthdays, anniversaries, holidays, or corporate events, Mystery Gifts ensures each gift is thoughtful, meaningful, and unique.

We provide a wide range of gift options, including personalized items, themed gift boxes, experience-based gifts, and locally crafted artisanal products. Our goal is to create memorable gifting experiences that make gift-giving easier and more enjoyable.

Additionally, we offer custom gift wrapping, handwritten messages, and fast delivery options. Through our easy-to-use platform, customers can quickly browse, select, and send gifts to loved ones or colleagues. At Mystery Gifts, we aim to make the traditional gift-shopping process fun, personalized, and surprising, enhancing the joy of both giving and receiving gifts.

name: MyTeam Solution
description:
MyTeam is an advanced digital platform designed for professional football clubs, federations, and academies. It centralizes key areas such as player performance, medical data, administrative management, video analysis, and AI-driven insights. Our solution enables coaches, analysts, and medical staff to optimize training, track workload, and prevent injuries.

Key features include AI-powered training load prediction, real-time GPS tracking, RPE monitoring, and scientific performance dashboards. Players can access personalized data, while clubs benefit from structured analytics to enhance decision-making.

MyTeam also offers a tailored SaaS solution for independent professionals and teams, expanding its reach beyond clubs to individual athletes and trainers. With continuous innovation and a data-driven approach, MyTeam is shaping the future of football performance management.

name: Najda
description:
Najda provides patients with a comprehensive and reassuring solution for their healthcare needs through home medical visits.

Najda revolutionizes access to medical care by adopting an Uber-like model, instantly connecting patients with the nearest available doctor while centralizing healthcare stakeholders for better coordination and efficiency.

By using Najda, patients know they can always rely on a trusted partner, available 24/7—whether for an emergency consultation in the middle of the night on a Sunday or the comfort of a home visit on a Tuesday morning.
This ensures a constant sense of security and peace of mind, both for themselves and their loved ones.

What makes Najda unique?
?  24/7 availability
?  Fast response time
?  Transparent pricing
?  Easy access
?  High-quality service
?  Comprehensive patient care

name: PCS AGRI
description:
PCS AGRI is an agritech startup revolutionizing agriculture through AI, computer vision, and machine learning. Our flagship solutions, Track Seeds and Track Tom, help nurseries and farmers optimize operations with real-time data and predictive analytics.

Track Seeds is an AI-powered ERP for nurseries, ensuring traceability and efficiency in grafting, sorting, transplanting, and delivery.

Track Tom provides AI-driven yield estimation, helping farmers maximize profitability with accurate harvest predictions.

With 90% yield estimation accuracy and 35% increased nursery productivity, PCS AGRI is scaling across Europe and Africa, empowering agribusinesses with intelligent, data-driven decision-making.
